1.content: Well, first introducing the beginning of the story. I will put a wide variety up, so you won't be forced to pick just one. Just to tell you, I am having one slot at least for myself. For the others, first come first serve.
1.title: Starting Out

11.content:
So, you chose a dude. Well hello fellow dudes! I have four choices for ya, but the first one is mine(sorry). Also, you can write in first person if it helps.

Taylor
Taylor is an Average Joe. He is 5' 9", and slightly overweight. He has messy brown hair, brown eyes, and a necklace that has an odd symbol on it. He is caring, respectful, and kind. He does not like to fight, but when he gets really mad, look out! He is pretty intelligent, but has trouble in English. Taylor is a guy that can get along with just about anyone. However, if he is threatened or scared of someone, he will almost do anything they say. Once he is surrounded by friends, Taylor can overcome anything.

Jeff
Jeff is a very tall skinny boy. He stands at a height of 6' 10". He has pale skin, freckles, blue eyes, and blonde hair. He is very gentle, and will not hurt anyone. He is extremely intelligent. Jeff is a main target for bullies. Although, he is very sweet and kind.

Matthew
Matthew is a fat, funny guy. He is around 5' 6", orange hair, and blue eyes. Matt can make anyone just about laugh. This tactic helps him escape trouble from teachers and bullies. He is smart and dumb at the same time. No matter what you are feeling, Matt can always perk you up.

Chris
Chris is the most violent of this group. He stands at 5' 8", has brown hair, green eyes, and a slight tan. Chris picks on kids constantly, and always wants to fight. However, he is nice to his friends and sorta nice to the teachers. He has trouble in every single class except for Gym, where he can show off his athletic capabilities.
11.title: Dudes

111.content:
I woke up earlier than I was supposed to. I got up, got dressed, and began to pack my clothes. Today was a Saturday, but today was also the day I was going to a new school. A boarding school to be more precise. That ment that I am living there for the next few years. I packed just enough to last about a two week stay, then I could wash my clothes afterward. After I got packed, I decided to change my outfit to make a better statement. I wore my blue shirt with stripes on it, my tan cargo pants, and my all black shoes. I grabbed the necklace that my dad gave me and put it on. It is a family heirloom. It wasn't very valuable, but it was to me. I grabbed the suitcase, and met my parents outside. My mom was crying, but she still managed. They drove me to my new school; Pokey High School, or PHS for short. It was really big than other boarding schools, but this one had many students attending. I walked out of the car, and we were greeted by the principal. He wore a strange red and blue suit, and a light blue tie. His hair was a strange blue tinted white, and was up in a goofy fashion.

"Hello Taylor!" said the man. "I am the principal of PHS, but you can refer to me as Principal D."

My parents talked to him while I gazed up at this magnificent school. The main gates almost looked golden, and had statues of strange creatures on top of them. They seemed rather familiar. My mom hugged me for the last time, and I shook hands with my dad. They drove off, and I followed Principal D inside. The inside was greater than the outside! The walls looked like they were completely made of marble. Although, I was quickly pushed into his office. He closed the door, and wiped his forehead.

"That took longer than I have expected" he said. "Now I can switch back."

Before I said anything, Principal D pressed a button on his watch. He became distorted, and then he changed shape. When it stopped, I couldn't believe my eyes. Standing in front of me, was a Deoxys! A living, breathing, Pokemon! His arms unfolded into tentacles and he slowly walked towards me. I was slightly scared, but thrilled at the same time.

"Now then Taylor" said Principal D. "What are you thinking right now?"

"I am thinking that I have no clue what is going on!" I said.

"That's understandable. After all, you are the only human here."

"Wait, what!?"

"PHS really stands for Pokemon High School. Pokemon gave been going to this school secretly for years. Although, some Pokemon are what you humans call...anthros. Here, we have a combination of school classes and popular Pokemon activities. But my question is this; Do you want to attend?"

"Who wouldn't attend such a beautiful school" I said. "I don't care that I'm the only human here, I couldn't be happier!"

Principal D smiled as he floated over to the door. "Very well then" he said. "Let me introduce you to your guide."
111.title: Taylor's New Adventure

1111.content:
A Gallade walked though the door. He was taller than average, because he was taller than me. He towered over me by about a foot. I couldnt help but to notice that the ends of his arms were longer as well. He stretched out his hand, and I shook it.

"Taylor, I would like to introduce you to Steven" said Principal D. "He will be showing you around."

"I am honored to meet a human" said Steven. His voice sounded very brave.

"Oh believe me, the honor is all mine" I said. I might have sounded a little too excited.

Principal D gave me my schedule and a map of the school. He gave me a "hand" shake and we left.

"So" started Steven, "What's your first class?"

"Looks like Geometry" I replied.

"Ah, Mr. Zam is very intellectual. You might like him."

"Mr. Zam?"

"He's a Alakazam. He is possibly the smartest Pokemon in the entire school. I am his star pupil."

"I can't wait for that class!"

"Sorry Taylor, but today's Saturday. No learning classes today. Only Pokemon classes."

"What are Pokemon classes?"

"Pokemon classes are battling and contests, as well as Pokemon sports and relays too. The weekends here are always filled with excitement!"

"Alright then, looks like I do get a break on the weekends."

"But I better show you to your dorm."

Steven walked down a series of hallways, and passed though a weird-looking door. When I passed through it, the entire scenery changed. Everything now looked like something from a hotel. There was an elevator and everything! Steven grabbed my paper and looked at it.

"According to your schedule" said Steven, "Your room is 12O." Steven smiled after he saw the room number. We got to the room, and I stopped. Steven handed me his rooms number before he left. I took in a deep breath, and put in the key. I went through the door, and saw my roommate.
1111.title: Gallade

choices: Stay in the room and unpack
11111.content:
I stopped and my jaw nearly dropped to the floor. Standing in front of me, was a anthro Absol; and it was female. She had a wide chest and wide hips. Her skin was dark blue, and her fur was white. She had a horn out of the right side of her face, long pointed tail, and claws on her hands and feet. She looked at me with the same possible reaction as me. A few minutes past, and I finally decided to say something.

"H-Hello" I mumbled.

"...Hi..." she said back.

I stook my hand out, "I-I'm...T-Taylor..."

She reached out and grabbed my hand. Her claws were kinda long, and her hand was slightly bigger than mine. "My name is Zasha" she said. Her voice seemed more calm this time. "Might I ask what you are doing here human?"

Human, there was that word, human. I felt kinda bad, and I was going to feel worse when I was supposed to answer her.

"I am the new student here" I responded. "And this is where I am staying."

Zasha looked shocked at this. "You!? You're the new student!? What is a human doing here!"

I now felt worse than I ever had. I just walked over to the empty bed, and sat down. I didn't expect anyone to actually like me here, although Steven was just about the only one. I fely a paw on my shoulder, and I looked up. I saw Zasha. She looked kinda worried now.

"I'm sorry" she said. "I didn't mean to be offensive."

"It's fine" I replied. "I thought this school was a normal school, that's why my parents signed me up for it. But when I got here, I found out that this place was a school for Pokemon. Then and there, I hoped that some Pokemon would be nice to me. Steven was already nice, so I thought that others would do the same."

"Don't worry, there are bound to be other students. I'm so sorry that I treated you a little unfairly."

"It's okay. We will get to know each other soon, since we are roommates. Although, I have never shared a room with a girl before."

"And I have never shared a room with a hu..I mean boy."

Zasha was about to say human, but she didn't. I was glad she did not.
11111.title: My Roommate

111111.content:
I placed my suitcase on the bed and began to unpack. There was a dresser right next to my bed, so it wasn't that hard. I noticed that Zasha had a dresser as well, but she wore no clothes. I also just noticed that she was skinnier than I have realized before. She looked at me, and I looked back at my suitcase.

"You're probably wondering why I have a dresser but I wear no clothes" she said. "Well, I will explain later."

I continued to unpack. I placed the bag full of my games beside the suitcase. I saw Zasha move closer. "So, how old are you?" I asked.

"I'm 16" said Zasha. "I recently turned 16 in March."

"I'm about to turn 16 in June. So..."

I saw her pick up my bag of games and grabbed a game out of it. I realized what it was, but it was too late.

"They make a Pokemon game?" she asked.

"Yes" I sighed. "You see, to humans, Pokemon are not real. Pokemon are a video game, card series, and cartoon series. I have watched nearly all the episodes of the cartoon, and nearly own or have played every game known. That's one reason I was disliked in my old school. I was considered a nerd."

"That seems a little unfair. You seem like a nice kid."

"Thanks. But, everyone is kinda stereotypical. Once they find one thing about you that is embarrassing, they constantly make fun of you for it."

"Now that is harsh." Zasha kept looking at the game. "So, is there anything in here about me?"

"Well, I know a lot about most Pokemon. Absols are Dark-type Pokemon that have the ability to sense natural disasters."

"You got it right so far."

"Although they can sense natural disasters, they are blamed for it. Absols usually go to the site of the disaster, and are mistakingly blamed for the cause."

"I am a little offended by that."

"Don't worry, you are not the worst."

I finished unpacking, and looked around the room again. There was a desk with a computer. I brought my laptop with me, so Zasha could use that one. There was also a small room for the bathroom. We heard some commotion outside, and someone knocked on the door. Zasha opened it, and a anthro Lopunny came in. She had just about the same body figure as Zasha. Her cream colored fur on her ears reached down farther.

"Zasha! The battle is about to start!" said the Lopunny. Her voice was high. She reminded me of o cheerleader. She looked at me and tilted her head. "Who's that?" she asked.

"Oh, sorry" said Zasha. "Lily, this is Taylor. He is the new student here at PHS."
111111.title: A Small Explanation

1111112.content:
Lily ran up to me and picked me up. She hugged me tightly against her soft brown fur. It felt really warm.

"Oh my gosh!" she said. "You are so adorable! Are all humans this cute?"

"Uh..." I was speechless.

"Lily, I think you hugged him long enough" said Zasha.

Lily put me down and blushed. I knew why. She was much bigger than me, so I looked like a doll to her. "Sorry" said Liliy. "I get a little carried away sometimes. anyway, someone challenged someone else!"

"Who is it?" asked Zasha.

"I don't even know! Come on!"

Lily and Zasha ran out the door. I tried to run after them, but I ran into somebody. It was Steven.

"Sorry Steven" I said.

"It's fine" he replied. "So, are you ready to see what a battle here looks like?"

"Sure. The only time I ever seen a Pokemon battle was in the game."

Steven looked like he knew, and he led the way. As I ran through the school, I saw a wide variety of Pokemon. Some were anthro, others were normal. Steven led me to the arena, and it was huge! The stadium had large sets of seats, a large screen, and everything else! I followed Steven, trying not to get lost. I sat down beside Steven, and I saw Zasha sitting beside me.

"Oh hey!" she said. "Sorry about leaving you back there. I get kinda excited when a battle begins."

"It's fine" I replied. "I am a little excited too."

A Loudred walked onto the middle of the arena. "Hello everyone!" he yelled. He didn't seem like he needed a microphone. "Welcome to another exciting battle! As always, I wil be annoucing the competetors. In the blue corner, is the challenger! He is the the master of songs, the bug of all time, Klark!"

A anthro Kricketune walked out. He had no hands, but longer arms. He seemed nervous.

"And now for the red corner! The reining champion of PHS for years! The short but powerful, Thorn!"

A Weavile walked onto the battlefield. It was surprising, because that Weavile looked smaller than what it should be. He looked kinda evil. I saw Steven's and Zasha's expresion, and they each had the same reaction.

"Who's Thorn?" I asked.

"Thorn is a bully" said Steven. "He usually always wins. If he doesn't, he finds the Pokemon that beated him and tries to kill them. He usually plays dirty though."

A buzzer sounded, and the battle began. Thorn took in a deep breath and released a Blizzard attack. Klark just covered his face and took the attack. Thorn then ran forward and readied his claws. Klark's wings turned orange and shook. Klark was using the attack Bug Buzz. Thorn stopped running and covered his ears. Klark stopped, but Thorn hit him with another Blizzard attack. Klark was forced back and landed on the ground. Everyone was silent. I could clearly hear Thorn's laughter.

"Why don't you just give up?" he said. "Do it so I do not have to embarass you anymore!"

I felt mad. I knew somne tough and annoying bullies in my old school, but Thorn was something else. I stood up and yelled.

"Come on Klark!" I yelled. "You can do it! Don't let that bully win!"

Thorn turned to me and looked mad. I saw that I got Klark's attention as well. I thought that I was the only one trying to fight against Thorn. I was even on the main screen! I ignored the difference between me and everyone else and started to chant Klark's name. Steven and Zasha started as well, and everyone else joined in. Thorn was looking around the arena, staring at everyone. Klark slowly got up, and crossed his amrs. They glowed blue, and he ran at Thorn. Thorn turned, and he was slashed in the face with a X-Scissor attack. Thorn was knocked back greatly. It seemed that Thorn wasn't as strong as I thought he was. Thorn got up, but he was slashed by another X-Scissor. He was knocked back into the wall, and he looked like he couldn't battle anymore.

"Klark from the blue corner is the winner!" said the Loudred. Everyone cheered, and Klark looked happy. we all parted out, and I followed the others to the blue end of the arena. I met up with Klark and shook "hands" with him.

"T-Thank you" he said. "But, now Thron will go after me."

"Hey, I might be a human" I said, "But I will help you."

He smiled at me, and we walked out. A paw grabbed my neck and slammed me against the wall. I looked up, and saw Thorn. Two other Pokemon were behind him. One was a Gengar, and the other one was a anthro Skuntank. I could smell the Skuntank from here.

"You have a lot of nerve interferring with my battle!" he said. "I think you need to be taught a lesson!"

Now I was scared. I always tried to be brave against bullies, but I could never finish it. I saw his right fist glowing light blue, and ready to attack. Suddenly, Thorn was wiped out by a Shadow ball move. I turned and saw A Mismagius. She wore some glasses. I fell to the floor, and she helped me up. Thorn was accompanied by the Gengar and Skuntank.

"You will regret this!" he said.

He ran off with his croonies. I bowed at the Mismagius. "Thank you" I said.

"It is not a problem" she replied. "My name is Maggie. I once ran into Thorn myself. But, someone brave like you came and helped me. I swore to help anyone like me in that situation."

"That is very kind of you."

Zasha and the others ran up to me. I felt faint, and I fell over.
1111112.title: Thorn tha Bully

11111121.content:
I slowly opened my eyes, and saw another Pokemon. It looked like an anthro Chansey. She was slightly chubby, but she looked the part.

"What a relief!" she said. "I thought you were not going to make it!"

I tried to get up, but a sharp pain stopped me. "Wha..What happened?" I asked.

"Poison Barb. Every Pokemon is allowed to use one item in battle. He never used the item in battle, and must have used it on you. The poison wasn't too dangerous, so you will be fine."

I was so relieved. I heard a knock, and several Pokemon came in. Thankfully, they were the ones I knew.

"Are you alright?" asked Lily.

"Thorn is really going to pay now!" said Zasha angrily.

"Man, tough luck for your first day" said Steven.

"Well, high school is tough" I replied. "I'll manage."

I was now able to get up. The others helped me, but I was fine. I glanced at the other students and saw that I was getting more attention now. Some looked at me oddly, others did a wierd emotion.

"What's going on?" I asked.

"You gained some attention when you stood up today" said Maggie. "now, everyone is now aware of the human."

"I wonder what is going to happen now" said Steven.

A small noise was heard through the school, "Maggie, Zasha, Steven, and Lily, please come to the Principal's office immediately."

"What's wrong?" asked Steven.

"We need to get there though" said Maggie.

"You will be okay by yourself?" asked Zasha.

"I'll be fine" I replied.

They walked off, and I continued down the school's hallway. I grabbed the map Principal D gave me, so I couldn't get lost. According to the map, I was in the creative arts section. I bumped into somebody, and I glanced up.
11111121.title: Survival

111111211.content:
I glanced up at the creature that I ran into. I was almost certain that I wish I hadn't. A anthro Seviper was on the ground. She had an appearance of a naga more than a human. It was a female due to the appearance of breasts. She had the yellow markings on her back, and other markings on her face. Her eyes were blood red, and her fangs were very white. She got off the ground and stood up straight. She was about 7' tall, and her tail was nearly twice her size. A long, blade-like tail was at the end. She slithered towards me, and I slowly backed up.

"Please don't hurt me!" I yelled. "I'm sorry and it will never happen again!"

The Seviper lady stopped and looked at me strangely.

"Hurt you?" she asked. "Why would I do that? It was my fault. Please forgive me."

She reached her hand down, and I grasped it. She tried her best not to hurt me with her claws either. I got up, but I kneeled back down. There were papers everywhere; probably hers. Each one had an amazing picture of a Pokemon. Each was colored and Drawn with incredible skill. I handed all of the papers to her, and she bowed.

"Thank you" she said. "My name is Jasmine."

"Nice to meet you Jasmine" I replied. "My name is Taylor. I'm the new...student here at PHS." I was trying to find the word that didn't make me sound different.

"I know you, you are the one who stood up during Thorn's battle."

"You saw?"

"No, I only heard. Honestly, I don't really like battling. I'm not bad at it, but I just don't like to watch. It seems like everyone is obsessed."

"Well, this may come from s human's point of view, but I do not think the same. Sure, some people are insane about being the best(Thorn). However, battling should be more of a fun activity, to increase the skills of all of the competetors."

"That makes much more sense. You seem like a very reasonable human."

There was that word...again. Well, I guess that is what you should expect. I tried to change the subject.

"So..." I said, "Did you make those yourself?"

"Why yes" she replied. "I did draw these. Are you interested in art?"

I nodded, she grabbed my arm, and dragged me into a room. I was surprised how strong Jasmine was. The room was splatted with different colors. Some other Pokemon were in there drawing and painting, but Jasmine pulled me to her area. The desk that she had was covered in different drawings. Most of them were unfinished though.

"These are amazing!" I exclaimed. "I wish I had your art skills!"

"Oh, these are not that great" she said. I saw Jasmine blush.

"No really! These are good! I'm a good artist myself, but I lack in comparison to you."

Jasmine's face was bright red. I thanked her and left the room. A few doors down, I heard the sound of clanging metal. I walked to the door, and opened it. I saw what looked like a blacksmith workshop. I turned my head, and saw two Pokemon. One was a Machoke, and the other was a Magmortar. The Machamp was using a hammer and bending a piece of metal, while the Magmortar was using his hands and heating the metal. I felt a poke on my shoulder, so I turned around. Behind me, was a Scizor.

"What are you doing here?" it asked. By the sound of it's voice, it was a guy. He said that loud enough to catch the attention of the Macoke and Magmortar. They walked up behind me, and the Machoke grabbed me. I froze in fear. He turned me around so he could state into my eyes. He kept me like that for a while, but then turned to the Magmortar.

"It doesn't look like it is Daryl" he said.

"Don't you remember anything?" asked the Magmortar. "This is our new student!"

The Machoke nearly dropped me. The Scizor grabbed me with one of his claws, to prevent me from hitting the floor. Machoke and Magmortar towered over me. The Scizor was just above my height.

"Sorry for this misunderstanding" said the Magmortar. "I am Mr. Heat. My partner is Mr. Strong. We are in charge of the Metal Shop. The boy behind you is Zang, our star pupil."

Zang crossed his arms at the sound of their comment. I looked at my schedule.

"I have Metal Shop as a class" I said. "I might see you later on."

"Can ya work with metal?" asked Mr. Strong.

"We will find out soon enough" said Mr. Heat. "But now it is time for lunch. Zang, could you show our new student here to the cafeteria?"

"Sure" he replied.

We walked out of the room and up a flight of stairs.

"My name is Taylor by the way" I said.

"Nice to meet you" replied Zang.
111111211.title: Creative Arts

1111112111.content:
The smell of different foods flew through the halls. The cafeteria was just a few doors down. I walked into a very large room. The walls were decorated with different designs. The cafeteria was sort of like a buffet style. Almost every lunch food I could think of was there. There were many Pokemon already here, but majority of them were just talking.

"Almost every kind of food that you can think of is served here daily" said Zang. "You name it, they serve it."

"I can see that" I replied.

I headed to the lunch line and grabbed a tray. You were allowed to grab no more than five items. I grabbed two slices of pizza, a soda, and some fries. I walked out and looked for a table. Thankfully, I saw a table with nearly everyone that I knew. There was Steven, Klark, Zlily, and Jasmine. I walked over and sat down.

"Hello everyone" I said.

"Nice to see you again" said Jasmine.

We sat down and ate. Klark was saying how Thorn never went after him, but I said nothing. I did not want him to feel bad. After I finished my lunch, Steven gave me a tour of the rest of the school. The gym was huge, the science labs were very complex, and the teachers I met seemed thrilled to have me here. By the end of the day, I was exhausted. It was nearly 10:00pm. I went to my dorm, and finished my unpacking. There, I set up the rest of my items and I headed for my bed. Zasha was getting ready as well.
1111112111.title: The Greatest School ever

11111121112.content:
My cell phone was ringing from inside my dresser. I grabbed my phone and opened it.

"Hello?" I asked.

"Hi sweetie!" said my mom. "How was school today?"

"Everything is perfect. Almost everyone is nice to me here. I even have some friends!"

"That's what I wanted to ask. I knew you would make some friends; you're very lovable."

"Mom!" I caught the attention of Zasha.

"Anyway, I would like to meet you're new friends."

"Mom, its like 10:00!"

"No, not by phone, in person!"

I froze up, Zasha saw my reaction, and sat down beside me.

"Y-You want to meet them in person?"

"Of course I do! I would like to meet the new friends that you have made. Tomorrow around dinnertime. Alright?"

"I'll see if we can."

"Goodnight honey."

She hanged up, and I put my phone down.

"Whats wrong?" asked Zasha.

"My mom wants to meet you and my new friends tomorrow night" I replied. "What should we do?"

"We have to ask Principal D for permission first. We also have to stop by somewhere before we go."

"Where?"

"You will see tomorrow."

She got up and went to her bed. I fell asleep into mine quickly. The next day, I woke up even earlier than I expected. I waited patiently for Zasha to wake up before I got ready. We visited Principal D's office before we continued with today. He approved, and we then searched for the rest of them. They all agreed, and we went through a "normal" Sunday. There were more battles today, and for once they didn't include Thorn. However, I learned that there are two sides in the entire school. The Red Team is Thorn and everyone who is with him. All the rest are the Blue Team. I also learned that the Blue Team is losing a lot of members. Besides that bad news, the battles were great. This school even had some Pokemon from the Unova series, and they came out a few months ago! I also stayed for a contest, which Lily was in. She was stunning! Sure most of the other girl competitors looked good, but the way Lily used her moves only enhanced her beauty. Around 6:30, my parents said they would pick us up. I met everyone by this one room. Everyone was there: Zasha, Steven, Klark, Maggie, Lily, and Jasmine. Strangely, they all wore clothes. We entered the room, and there was a very large machine. There was a single glass casing that could fit one of us. Near the control panel, sat a...
11111121112.title: Parent Premeeting

choices: Mom ran out of the car and hugged Taylor
111111211122.content:
Sitting at the control panel, was a Porygon-Z. It was a regular one, not an anthro. It floated out of his chair and approached us.

"Hello again Zasha" it said. It's voice sounded like it was generated from a computer. "What are we doing today?"

"Hello Qwerty" replied Zasha. "Allow me to introduce you to Taylor."

I walked forward and we shook hands. "I always wanted to meet a Porygon-Z" I said. "Although, why is your name Qwerty?"

"Qwerty is the first six letters on the top row of a keyboard. My creator gave me that name." Qwerty turned to Zasha and them. "Now then, who is first?"

Zasha walked towards the machine. Qwerty opened the glass casing, and Zasha entered. The case closed behind her, and then Qwerty pressed a few buttons. The machine started to hum.

"What is this machine Qwerty?" I asked.

"This is the PokeHuman Transformer" he replied. "We Pokemon have a device that gives us the appearance of a human. We use this machine to actually make us human!"

The humming got louder, and the case was glowing. Qwerty pressed a few more buttons, and then the machine stopped. The case opened, and Zasha walked out. She looked just like a human! Her eyes were red, and her hair was white. She had a black streak on the right side of hair; probably the horn. Her skin had a dark tint to it, and her teeth looked slightly pointed. She was wearing a white T-shirt with a black heart on it, blue jeans, and black shoes. Her nails were painted black, and Zasha also had a black belt. She walked down and stood next to me.

"How do I look?" she asked.

I couldn't stop staring, but I eventually answered. "Y-Tou look beautiful..." I said.

Lily hopped into the machine and Qwerty did the same procedure. Lily stepped out with a whole new appearance. Lily's hair was cream colored, and was put in the sane style as one of the fur tufts on her ear. She had blue eyes, and dark skin. She wore a pink blouse, a white skirt, and pink heels. She had cream colored bracelets around her wrists. She walked out as happy as could be. Everyone else did the same procedure. Steven came out dressed in a semi-casual attire. His hair was green, and his eyes were red. Klark cane out in red suit. He still had his brown mustache, and his hair had the same coloration and style. Maggie came out in a purple dress that covered her legs. She wore a hat that looked similar to her head, and she still wore glasses. Jasmine came out of the machine with a dark purple tank-top. It was covered in the sane designs that were on her back. She also wore Jean shorts. Jasmine's hair was a mixture of black, yellow, and red. Her eyes were red as well, and she wore tons of jewelry.

"Looks like we're all ready" said Lily.

"Not yet" I replied. I walked over to Qwerty, would you like to come?"

Qwerty quickly pressed the buttons and ran into the machine.

I guess that is a yes.

The machIne stopped, and Qwerty came out. He had pink hair that stood up in the center. Qwerty's eyes yellow, but he had glasses that resembled his original eyes on his forehead. He was wearing a pink shortsleeved jacket with a blue undershirt and a blue stripe going across the jacket. He was also wearing black pants.

That's a bold fashion statement

"Now we're ready" I said.

We walked out to the front of the building, and stopped at the gate. My mom's minivan pulled up. Then...
111111211122.title: PokeHuman Transformer

1111112111221.content:
My mom ran out of the van and hugged me. Her hug was very tight, but then she kissed me.

"I missed you so much!" she said.

"Uh...mom?" I replied.

She let go, and looked at my friends. She gave an odd look to Qwerty, but that was about it.

"Mom, these are my friends" I started. "This is Zasha, Steven, Lily, Jasmine, Klark, Maggie, and..."

I stopped at Qwerty because I had no idea what to call him to sound normal. Qwerty just walked up to my mom, grasped her hand, kneeled down, and kissed the top of it.

"Greetings milady" he said. "My real name is far too complicated to pronounce, but I have the nickname Qwerty. If that is not a problem."

My mom made a small giggle and blushed, "Why, aren't you a charmer. It is very nice to meet you Qwerty."

"So mom, where are we going?" I asked.
1111112111221.title: Introduction

11111121112211.content:
"I am taking you and your friends to our house" she replied. "I just ordered pizza, and you and your friends can hang."

We all entered my mom's van, capable of holding all of us. The drive took longer than expected, but we finally made it. My house was a standard two story building ( three story if you include the basement). As soon as we entered the main entrance, everyone stopped.

"Wow Taylor" said Zasha. "Your house is amazing!"

"I must agree" said Maggie. "I enjoy the different artifacts."

"Are you rich?" asked Klark.

My mom giggled after he made that comment. My family wasn't rich, but we did traveled a lot. My dad and mom liked bringing home souvenirs or different artifacts to bring a memory home every time. They always displayed it at the main entrance. I honestly didn't think it was that great, but then again I grew up in this house.

"You kids have fun" said my mom. "I'll call you back up when the pizza is here."

I lead them downstairs, and they did the same reaction. The basement wasn't really decorated, but it was probably the most high-tech area in the house. I had several game systems and tv's in my house. Steven and Qwerty automatically went up to one of them, but the others looked around. Besides video games, the basement was also where we stored all other games and other objects. Maggie was taking a look at the books, and I followed Jasmine over to the other end. On the other side of the basement, was like a office area. My dad used to use it, but now it's usually where I draw. I saw Jasmine pick up some of my drawings.

"What are these?" she asked.

Jasmine handed me some of my drawings, and I recognized them.

"Well, you see, many people believe that Pokemon are not real. Some of them have enough creativity and skill in drawing and try to create their own Pokemon. I try too, but I'm not the best at it."

"These are not bad" she replied.

Jasmine filed through them, then stumbled upon the drawings of real Pokemon. Jasmine laughed, and she handed one to Klark. It was a drawing of Kricketune, what Klark was.

"Is this what I really look like?" he asked.

"No" I said, "That's what Kricketune looks like in the game or anime. You are an anthro form."

"You sure know a lot" said Maggie while reading through a book.

"Well, I did play it for years. I know almost everything."

"What does the game say about me?" asked Klark.

"Kricketune is a musical Pokemon that makes sounds similar to a violin when their hands are strung together."

"What about me?" asked Qwerty while playing against Steven.

"Porygon-Z is a Pokemon created from a computer. It was upgraded to serve as a being that can live in alien worlds."

"Cool! Darn it Steven!"

I turned to see the "Player 1 wins!" thing flash on the screen. My mom walked down with the pizza, and we all grabbed a slice. My little brother came down afterwards.

"Who's that?" asked Lily.

"Everyone, meet my little brother" I replied.

"You are Taylor's new friends?" he asked.

They all nodded, and my little brother looked funny. "Taylor never gets this many friends before" he said.

"Tate!" I exclaimed.

"I think Taylor is a great person" said Zasha.

"Is something wrong with you?"

"Can you just leave!"

Tate shrugged his shoulders and went back upstairs. After about another hour of talking, my mom drove us back. We stopped by the PokeHuman Transformer before everyone headed to their dorms. Still, it was around 8:30pm. Steven pushed me somewhere though.

"Where are we going?" I asked.

"I want to properly introduce you to some of my friends" he replied. "You see, we only do not get access to our dorms. There are also meeting rooms based on your type. Like mine, I can meet in the Psychic and Fighting-type rooms."

Steven stopped before a door, and pushed in the key.
11111121112211.title: Home Sweet Home

111111211122112.content:
"This where some of the Fighting-type Pokemon come to relax" explained Steven. "This also happens to be the home of the Hitmons."

"Hitmons?" I asked.

Steven entered in a certain code, and the door opened. Inside, was a bodybuilder's paradise. There were weight sets and exercise equipment everywhere. In the center of the room was a boxing ring. On it was a Hitmonchan and a Hitmonlee. I heard someone hitting a punching bag, and turned to see a Hitmontop.

Oh...Hitmon brothers...

They saw Steven walk in and jumped down from the ring.

"Steven!" said the Hitmonchan. "How have you been?"

"Fine" he replied.

"Was it a pain for you to show around the new kid?" asked the Hitmonlee.

I felt a set of arms grab me and lifted me up. "Hey Chan!" said the Hitmontop. "I found a punching bag!"

They all looked at me funny. I just laughed, "Yeah, I'm a punching bag. And you are a child's play toy."

"Hey...actually, that was pretty good."

He set me down, and I was being introduced.

"Everyone, this is Taylor" said Steven. "He was the new student."

"Wait! Aren't you the one that stood up to Thorn?" asked the Hitmonchan.

"Yeah" I replied.

"You're stupid, but you got guts." he gave me a fist bump. "The names Chan."

The Hitmonlee walked up and shook my hand. "My name is Lee" he said. "Mess with me, and you will get a kickin of a lifetime!"

"I won't mess with you if you don't mess with me" I replied.

The Hitmontop walked upand shook my hand.

"Let me guess, your name is Top" I said.

"How did you know?" he asked.

"Hey Taylor" said Lee. "Want to battle?"

I was very surprised at his comment. I probably couldn't even last one round in with this guy.

"Easy Lee" said Steven. "Humans aren't as powerful as us. Give him a few days."

I let out a sigh of relief. We left the room, and I went to my room. I opened the door, finding Zasha asleep. I gently closed the door, and tiptoed to my bed. I quickly fell asleep as well.

---

The next morning, I was up at the same time Zasha was. Today was Monday, so I had classes. Zasha informed me that I only had certain classes on certain days. Today, I had Algerbra, Gym, and History. The rest of the day I was able to do another class, l wanted to do Metal Shop with Zang. Possibly even art with Jasmine. I left the room, said goodbye to Zasha, and headed off to my first class. The halls were even more crowded than I thought, and bumped into several people. I got a few glares and stated as I went through as well. However, I managed tostart out my day even grater by knocking down someone. I looked and saw...
111111211122112.title: Hitmon Brothers

1111112111221121.content:
I got up quickly, learning from my previous mistakes. I looked and saw a Galvantula. Although, it was more in the structure of a Dridder( Author's note: a Dridder is a mythological creature that has the upper body of a human, and the lower half of a spider). Four of it's legs were legs, as his two front mandibles were arms. He was covered in yellow and blue fuzz. He had two big blue eyes and four smaller ones in the middle of his forehead. When he got up, he was nearly a foot taller than me.

Why is every Pokemon so tall?

"Do you mind watching where you are going?" he asked.

I was too excited to speak, I only stuttered. "Y-You're a a a G-G-Galvantul-a-a-a...."

"Yes I know. Don't be scared."

"Scared? Are you kidding!?! Your my favorite Bug-type Pokemon from the Unova region!"

"Really? Wait, from the what region?"

The bell rang and both of us were worried. Strangely, we both went in the same direction. I stopped in front of Mr. Zam's room. I opened the door where a Alakazam stood at the front. There were many other Pokemon in the room, most of them staring at me.

"You two are late" said Mr. Zam.

"It was my fault" I confessed. "I ran into him and knocked him down. I only stayed to see if he was alright."

The Galvantula stared at my lie, but removed the look to help me.

"It is true that you bumped into him" said Me. Zam. "But you stayed because you were in a combined state of amazement and fear. There is no use in lying to me."

Aw man, I forgot he was a Psychic-type. I just did not want the Galvantula to get in trouble.

"But since it was a act of kindness, I will excuse both of you."

"Thank you sir" I replied.

Me and the Galvantula ended up sitting beside each other.

"My name is Taylor" I said.

"I'm Jake" he replied.

Algebra was pretty long. The problems were from a range of easy to difficult. Jake did all of them in a matter of seconds. I learned that there were a lot of Unova region Pokemon here, I just ran into one of gem. Jake was stil confused from the whole "region" thing, but I told him I would explain later. After about an hour, the bell ran again to signal the change of classes. My next class was gym. As soonas I entered, I saw...
1111112111221121.title: Unova Student

11111121112211211.content:
Thorn was looking around evilly to all of his new victims. As soon as he saw me, he gave me an evil glare. I slowly walked in another direction, but ended up face-to-face with Thorn. Actually, I was looking down, but that's beside the point.

"You think your so tough bow don't you human?" he asked sarcastically.

"Look, I'm..." I managed to say.

"SHUT UP! I don't want to hear what comes put of your piehole! I lost my record cause of you! Now I'm not the best anymore!"

"Dude, you lost only one battle. I don't really think that's not bad."

"Oh! I guess no one told the newbie about respect around here?!"

"Respect? Since when are you respected?! Everyone is afraid of you! I don't see a respectful person, all I see is a coward!"

All the other students stopped talking and the room was silent. Thorn looked like he was about to lose it.

"What...did...you...just...say...?"

"I'm sorry d..."

"WHAT IN THE HELL DID YOU JUST SAY!?!"

I backed up slowly, only to get punched in the chest hard. I flew into the wall, but went through a door. I hit metal lockers and passed out. I don't know how long I was out, but I heard some voices.

"What is this thing?" said a voice.

"It's kinda cute" said another.

"Why is it wearing clothes?" asked a third.

"Should we take them off?" asked a fourth.

I snapped myself out of consciousness and woke up. I looked at the group talking, and nearly fainted. In front of me were the seven evolved forms of Eevee as anthros. All of them were there; Vaporeon, Flareon, Jolteon, Espeon, Umbreon, Leafeon, and Glaceon. All of them were around 6' 11" and had a very curvy hourglass figure. Probably the most busty female Pokemon yet. Some of them were different though. The Vaporeon did not have the white collar around it's neck, the Espeon was the tallest, and the Glaceon was the bustiest. They were all staring at me in curiosity.

"Hello?" said the Flareon.

"He's fine Flare" said the Espeon.

The Vaporeon helped me up and I thanked her. My back now hurt, a lot! They all seemed to care and three of them rubbed my back.

"Who are you guys anyway?" I asked.

"We are the Eon Sisters!" they all said together.

"My name is Vapor" said the Vaporeon. "I am a master at swimming, underwater battles, underwater contests, just anything that has to do with water!"

"My name is Flare" said the Flareon. "If you are ever cold, I can warm you up easily. My fur is also very soft."

"My name is Jolt!" said the Jolteon a little perky. "I have tons of energy and always ready for action!"

"My name is Espey" said the Espeon. She walked slowly and calmly up and bowed. "I am the most intelligent and the most understanding. Ever need help cone to me."

"I'm Umbrey" said the Umbreon. "Ever mess with any of my sisters, you will pay!" She made a fist and held it infront of my face.

Now in not sure who I'm afraid of more; her or Thorn.

"My name is Leafy" said the Leafeon. "I can help in anyway that I can."

"My name is Glace" said the Glaceon. She had a bit of an accent, but I wasn't sure what kind. "I am very sweet and kind and will help anyone with good reason."

After about five minutes of introductions, I had to give them mine.

"Uh...my name is Taylor. I am the new student here at PHS."

"What are you doing here?" asked Espey.

"Well, my parents transferred me and..."

"No, I mean, what are you doing here. This is the girls locker room."

I felt my face light up like a Christmas light. They all giggled as I ran out the door. At the door was...
11111121112211211.title: Sudden Meeting with the Eon Sisters

111111211122112111.content:
Standing at the smashed doorway was a Blaziken. It was obviously female from the hourglass figure. Also, she was very tall; probably around 8ft or so. She glared at me angrily as I approached her.

"Had fun human?" she asked.

"Fun what?" I asked back. "Getting punched through a door?"

"Spending time in the girl's locker room. I should have you suspended..."

"Mrs. Blaze it wasn't his fault" said a voice.

I turned and saw the Eon Sisters. Glace was speaking, "He really did crash through the door. We found him unconscious and helped him. We was leaving so fast it seemed he was trying to get out as quickly as possible."

"Why did you do that Taylor?" asked Jolt.

"This is the girl's locker room. I know where I belong and I have respect to others. I'm not one of those guys who peer into the girls locker room inappropriately. I was honestly trying to leave."

Mrs. Blaze seemed like she understood me and made a smile. "Alright, I believe you."

"Good!" I exclaimed with relief. "Because I was afraid of what might have happened if you didn't!"

They laughed and we went out. Thorn was laughing hard, "Have a nice look?!"

Others went away from him and went to me. They all asked me if I was alright and I said I was fine. Mrs. Blaze spoke up, "Everyone, we are sparring today!"

Some made cheers and others made groans. "We will do one on one and everyone will get a turn. I will call two people out on the mat and they will come. The first one will be our new human friend Taylor."

Some students clapped and I walked out onto the mat.

"How do you feel?" asked Mrs. Blaze.

"Nervous" I said.

"Alright, the next one will be...
111111211122112111.title: Hot Teacher

1111112111221121111.content:
"My daughter, Zen" said Mrs. Blaze.

A Blaziken stepped out from the crowd. Everyone seemed silent. She looked exactly like Mrs. Blaze, but only slightly smaller. She stepped onto the mat and posed in a fighting stance.

"Ready?" asked Mrs. Blaze.

"Ready!" exclaimed Zen.

I tried my best to get my own battle stance. I placed my right foot forward, and made two fists, "R-Ready..."

"BEGIN!"

Without even seeing, Zen suddenly appeared in front of me and delivered a strong kick. I was knocked back and I landed on my back. I slowly got up, but was picked up by Zen. Her clawed hands dug into my clothing, but not my skin. She threw me into the wall, and I landed onto the ground face first. I looked up, and saw her pacing in her stance.

"Come on human!" shouted Thorn. "Make a move!"

I slowly got up again, and looked at Zen. She looked fierce, but something in her expression showed something else. I ran forward trying to throw a punch. She put her amrs up to block, but I sweeped her legs. She fell down, but jumped up and uppercutted me. I can't even explian the pain. I believe she used Sky Uppercut. When I regained my vision, I saw something troubling. Flames were forming at Zen's feet. She ran forward and swung her legs around. I ducked and jumped, trying to avoid all of the attacks. Eventually, I was hit by a flaming foot, and my shirt became burned. I hit the floor hard. I was offered a hand, a clawed hand. It was Zen. She helped me up, but I almost fell back down. My entire body ached. I wrapped on of my arms around her neck and she helped me off the mat. Everyone but Thorn was clapping.

"Sorry for beating you so hard" said Zen.

"Its okay" I replied. "I'm still new here. I should be able to learn how to fight."

She smiled and I let go of her. I was able to walk again.
1111112111221121111.title: Fighting a Girl

11111121112211211111.content:
I managed to get to my next class, but the teacher wanted me not to sit down yet. He was a Claydol, a normal Claydol. After everyone took there seats, he went right next to me.

"Class, this is Taylor; the new student" he said. "Now as you can see, Taylor is a human. Now..."

"Why is there a human in PHS?" yelled a voice.

I looked to the back and saw a anthro Luxray. It was a guy, and boy did he look scary. I was almost afraid to even ask him something. Another student spoke up. It was a female anthro Frillish. She still had tentacles for legs, but she had hands at the end of her arms.

"Aren't you the one who shouted during that battle on Saturday?" she asked.

I was still in a scare from the Luxray, but I answered, "Yes."

A few students laughed and others chuckled. "I'm surprised that your even alive!" exclaimed the Luxray.

"Class! That's no reason to laugh in class!" shouted the Claydol.

"I never knew this was a school for Pokemon" I replied slowly. The entire class and the teacher became instantly quiet. "My parents signed me into this school because of what happened in my other schools. I never fit in at any class. I've been mocked, beat up, and even threatened. I knew that this school wouldn't be any different, but I hoped it would be better. Now, I stick out even more here. I don't expect to be treated with respect, but I just wish some would be nice. I got lucky with Thorn, and met a few good Pokemon, but that's about it."

I stopped after that because I was on the verge of crying. All those memories of the bullies and the pain they have inflicted shot through. I walked over to the empty desk in the front and slouched over. The tears were starting to come out. I felt one hand on my shoulder, one patting my back, and another one wiping the tears from my eyes. There was the Frillish, the Luxray, and a female anthro Infernape. I let out a smile and cheered myself up. The three sat back down and we started the lesson. Ironically, the Pokemon students were learning about human history. I knew some history, but not a lot. So the lessons were just as hard to me as the others. The three students that I met I learned their names. The Luxray was Luke, the Frillish was Pearl, and the Infernape was Blaire. Pearl was shy, Luke was tough exterior but had a nice interior, and Blaire was...I don't know really....she seemed like she liked me, a lot! I was surprised that no one else that I knew was in that class. The teacher was Mr. Relic, and he surprised me. He mostly used his psychic abilities to give or receive things to others. He rarely had to leave his desk. The bell rang again, and everyone let out a big sigh. I guess that other students were glad to have a free period in the day. Although, it was lunch time. Pearl bumped into me before I left.

"Uh...hello Taylor" she said.

"Hello Pearl" I replied.

Pearl rubbed the back of her head and blushed, "I was wondering if you would cone to eat lunch with me and my friends?"
11111121112211211111.title: History

choices: Amy throws the door open and attacks in a blind fury
Amy is too sad to answer
111111211122112111111.content:
"I would be glad to join you" I said.

Pearl blushed some more and then floated to the cafeteria. I followed her to a table where three Unova Pokemon were. There was an female anthro Alomomola, a anthro male Lampent, and a Golett. I wasn't really sure what gender the Golett was, but it looked male. The Alomomola looked nothing like a fish, except for the tall fin on her head and the small fins on her hips. She also seemed to have been swimming, because her pink skin seemed wet and reflected the light around her entire body. She had a similar figure to all of the female students here have. The Lampent had the longer arms than a regular Lampent but had no hands. The Lampent was reading a book, the Golett was talking, and the Alomomola was eating a salad. When Pearl arrived, they all stopped and greeted her.

"Hi Pearl" they all said.

"I want to introduce you to...Taylor" she replied calmly.

She floated out of the way and I walked forward. The Lampent immediately floated off of his seat, over the table, and grabbed my hands and shook them.

"It is a real honor to finally meet a human" he said.

"It is a true honor to meet a Lampent" I replied. "You are my favorite Ghost-type Pokemon from the 5th generation."

"Uh...thanks..."

"I'll explain later. So, I'm Taylor."

"My name is Jasper. The Golett is Gary and that Alomomola is Amy."

Gary waved but Amy just glanced back. I wasn't really hungry, so I just talked. Gary wanted to talk a lot, Jasper was too involved into his book, and Amy gave me angry glares. I ignored her as best as I could, but I somehow couldn't. Pearl told everyone the story of my arrival here. Amy laughed slightly when she heard about me being beat up. I really couldn't take it anymore.

"Might ask what your problem is?" I asked. "You've been giving me the evil eye since I got here. I thought Alomomola was a caring Pokemon."

Amy stood up and looked down at me. I hated it that almost every Pokemon here was taller.

"I don't trust you humans one bit" she said. "I really don't care how you got here. Maybe you should just leave."

"Why don't you...?"

"Just leave me alone!"

Her yelling caused attention from the rest of the group. She ran out of the cafeteria almost crying. Everyone went back to talking except for our table. I turned to the rest, "What did I say?"

Everyone was silent for a while, but Gary was the one to speak up. "Amy's parents were injured severly by humans when she was little" said Gary. "She hated them ever since."

"I should apologize to her" I replied. "Anyone know where her dorm is?"

"13K" said Pearl.

I walked to the dorm area and went to her room. I could hear crying outside her door. I gently knocked on the door.
111111211122112111111.title: Lunch with Unova Students

1111112111221121111112.content:
I only heard crying. I knocked on the door again, only to get the same result. I decided to use an old trick I learned. I grabbed my Learner's Permit and slipped it through the lock and it opened. I slowly walked in, and saw Amy collapsed on the bed. I slowly walked in, and gently placed my hand on her shoulder. Her skin felt smooth and moist. She stopped crying for a moment, and turned her head. Her eyes were still watery and red.

"Are you alright Amy?" I asked.

The next thing I knew, I was covered in pink. Amy was hugging me tightly. Her body was very smooth. My head was buried in her chest. She was crying uncontrolablely. I rubbed her back to try and calm her down. Her crying did subside, but she hugged me even tighter. She eventually let me go. Something formed on her face that I have never seen yet, a smile.

"Thanks" she said.

"I'm sorry if anything I've said made you sad" I replied.

"It's just that...."

"Your friends told me only a little about your past. Mind shedding a little light on it?"

"When I was a little girl, me and my parents went to a city. We went to a theater. We all looked human, so I thought we would be alright. However, two men with weapons tried to take my mother's purse. She comied, but they attacked. My father told me to run down this ally to be safe. But when they were done with my patents, they went after me. I had to attack them, I used a powerful Hydro Pump."

"A Hydro Pump for a young Pokemon?! Amazing!"

Better remind myself not to get her really mad.

"Well, the police came and took them away. As for my parents, they were sent to a hospital for about a month. I believed the only humans I could have ever trusted was ones with authority. But you, you are different. Again, thank you."

"I have no problem with it. Besides, I kinda enjoyed the hug."

She punched me slightly with a giggle. I stayed with her for a few more minutes to make sure she completely calmed down. When I left, her friends were there.

"How is she?" asked Jasper.

"She'll be fine" I replied.

"You are simply a very wonderful person" said Pearl.

I waved and decided to head towards the Metal Shop room. I followed the sound of clanking metal. Soon, I found the precise room. Mr. Heat saw me first, and walked to me.

"Well, I'm glad to see you doing this on your free time as well" he said.

"Glad I could make it" I replied.

"Now, the others are sitting in the tables in the next room. Go ahead and introduce yourself. We will join you shortly. Oh, and watch the metal."

I walked down the small corridor that led to the room. I first came upon a room with lots of metal in different shapes and sizes. I entered the main room, and saw all of the students. There were regulars and anthros alike. I sat down beside a...
1111112111221121111112.title: Comforting a Caring Pokemon/ Metal Shop

11111121112211211111121.content:
A sat down beside a male Aggron. He towered over me easily. His armor was thick and shiny. He seemed to take very good care of his armor. The horns on his head looked sharper than normal. He caught me looking at him and lowered his head. His face was right in front of mine. He smiled slightly, "You seem afraid."

"Y-Yeah..." I replied.

"Is it because of the way I look?"

"Y-Yes...I-I mean n-no...well...." I took a deep breath to try and calm down. "I am afraid of you. It is natural that humans are afraid of something that is bigger than them. But, that's the only thing I'm afraid of."

He held up one of his hands and his claws lengthened, "Are you sure?"

I gulped but he chuckled and lowered his hand. He rose up and chuckled some more. "I'm sorry kid, I just like doing that" he said. "My name is Armor, nice to meet you."

"M-My name is Taylor" I replied. "So, what exactly do you do in metal shop?"

"You'll see..."

Mr. Heat walked in calmly. "Welcome to Metal Shop" he said. "Before we get started, I would like to introduce the first human in PHS history. Taylor, please come up to the front of the class."

I sat up and walked to the front. I turned and faced everyone. Almost every Pokemon, anthro or not, was a steel-type Pokemon. Each one had a different look, for once I would like a class that has the same reaction.

"Now that we have that established, we can get started" continued Mr. Heat. "Now then, those of you learning how to repair yourselfs go into the Metal room with Mr. Strong. Those of you that wish to make items and goods, stay here."

A majority of the class left the room. The only ones in there were me, Armor, Zang, a anthro Empoleon, and a Bisharp. Mr. Heat walked over, grabbed a few sheets of metal, and walked into a different room. There was a large furnace, a coal pit, and a anvil. Around these machines were several tools. He placed the metal down and walked over to the anvil.

"Here at Metal Shop, we put no limits to what someone can make" he explianed. "The thing to start out with are swords and shields. Each one takes valuable time and patience to make. Zang has mastered some of these procedures. Now, I will put you each at a station. Each one of you will make a sword out of iron and I will evaluate them later on. Zang will help out when needed and so will I. Begin."

I walked over and grabbed some gloves. I grabbed a sheet of metal, but Armor walked over and took a bite out of it.

"Dude!" I shouted.

"What? I was hungry!" he said.

When I looked back, most of the metal was gone. There was a smaller, more rugged piece. I had to either take that, or the one with a bite out of it. I grabbed the smaller piece and began to work. I noticed that I grabbed the attention of Mr. Heat at my decision. I grabbed a hammer and went to the coal pit. To bend metal, it needs to be heated. After it got enough, I placed the metal over the anvil and began to hammer it. I needed to get all of these dings and bumps out of it first. The others were doing better, but I focused on my work. It took about ten minutes, but the metal was know flawless. I then began to shape it. The Bisharp was already done his. After another ten minutes, the blade was shaped. Zang handed me a hilt and I inserted the blade. The anthro Empoleon was done as well. I walked over to the grindstone and began to sharpen it. I looked at Armor, who was eating more metal than fashioning it. The sharpening took about twenty minutes since I was lacking in some areas. Eventually, I had my sword. I handed mine to Mr. Heat, who placed it with the others. Mine was the dirtiest and looked the crapiest of them all. Armor even had his done before mine, and I saw him eating the entire time! Mr. Heat looked at mine first.

"Class, as you can see this isn't the brightest blade or the best looking" he said. "More of an eyesore if anything."

A few minutes of laughter, but then Mr. Heat raised the sword and sliced it at a vertical bar of metal. My sword sliced straight through the bar with ease. Some gasps were heard and some looked jealous. "But, looks can be decieving" he continued. "This sword is carefully crafted and shows excellent time and patience. Well done Taylor."

The class clapped and I could have felt better. Teh other swords were goo, but not as good as mine. Zang's was the only one that was better. Mr. strong walked in, and grabbed my sword. He swung it a few times, and then smiled.

"Mr. Heat, this blade is perfectly made" he said. "Not to heavy, not off balance, and evenly sharpened. Who did this?"

"That sword is Taylor's" he responded.

"The human's?!"

Mr. Heat nodded and Mr. strong walked over to me. "Boy, we could use some talent like you. We sometimes sell objects like this to help gain the school money. And this could easily sell for a good price."

"Thanks...I was never good at anything at my old schools..." I replied.

"Zang, get ready for some help around here..."

"Finally!" he shouted.

The rest of the class walked in and observed my craftmenship. They gave me thumbs up and high-fives and I felt like I belonged there. Afterwards, I saw Armor eating some more metal. Some of them were the other swords, but not mine. For once, I felt good.
11111121112211211111121.title: It's Metal Shop...not Lunch

choices: Yes, I don't want to die!
111111211122112111111211.content:
I spent about another few hours in Metal Shop. I stayed and made a shield with my sword. Zang helped me in some areas and I helped him where it required two people. By the time I was done, it was bedtime. I walked into my dorm and Zasha instantly laughed at me. I looked down and saw that all of my clothes and face were covered with smudges and other marks. I cleaned up quickly, and went to bed. The next day, my entire body was sore, probably from the fight against Zen. Today actually rushed through quickly. I had History again, along with Biology, English, and a Contest class. Biology was taught by a Cofagrigus named Mr. Grigus. I was slightly startled by his appearance, but he wasn’t so bad afterwards. English was taught by an anthro Chatot named Mrs. Spectra. She was very colorful, in body colors and language. She was capable of mimicking any voice she heard, including mine. However, my day went sour after that class.

---

I opened the door after English. I felt a thud against the door and looked around it. Thorn was knocked out behind it. Some of the other classes saw this and stayed to watch. I tried to move but something caught my legs. It looked like…my shadow! A small form rose up from it and showed the face of a Gengar. Now I understood, Gengars can hide in anyone or anything’s shadow. Thorn regained consciousness and walked over with a smirk.

“I got him boss!” said the Gengar.

“Good work Gabriel” he said. “You thought you could hit me and run eh?”

“It was an accident…”

I was delivered a punch to the chest. Gabriel’s hold on me kept me upright, so Thorn could keep punching me. I grabbed his fist and threw him into a wall. A

Shadow Ball hit Gabriel and he flew into Thorn. Maggie floated up beside me, “Are you alright?”

“I feel like throwing up…” I replied.

“From the punches?”

“No, from staring at their faces for a while.”

She giggled and was interrupted by a close encounter with an Ice Punch. Suddenly, everyone was lifted in the air. Principal D floated in with his eyes glowing. He was using Psychic on us to stop our fight.

“Maggie, Thorn, Gabriel, you all remember that al fights will be in the arena on weekends” he explained. “Taylor, you did not know so I will excuse you. All of you must go to your next class.”

He stopped the Psychic and let us down. Thorn and Gabriel glared at us, “We’ll battle you on Staurday!”

“Two against one isn’t fair!” I shouted.

“You’ll be in the fight too human!” shouted Thorn.

I felt all of the heat from by body drain out. They smiled before walking out. The other students had a mixed expression of worry, anticipation, and shock. They left along with Maggie. Qwerty entered and saw the whole thing. I turned to Principal D, “This can’t be allowed!”

“Sorry Taylor” he said, “Any student is allowed to challenge any student here. I’m afraid that…”

Qwerty hovered next to Principal D and whispered in his….ear…? D changed expressions but nodded at the end.

“Taylor, Qwerty believes he knows a way to even the playing field. You are aware of the PokeHuman Transformer?”

“Yeah, it can turn PokÃ©mon into humans and back again” I replied.

“Well, Qwerty believes he can throw the machine in reverse and turn you into a PokÃ©mon.”

I looked at him in shock before turning to Qwerty. His eyes changed to look like a check mark, which meant he was correct.

“Since this involves you, I’ll let you choose” said Qwerty.
111111211122112111111211.title: A Fight not Wanted

1111112111221121111112111.content:
"Yes!" I exclaimed. "I don't want to die!"

I may have sounded a little too demanding but Qwerty nodded and floated away.

"I'll excuse your next class for it Taylor" said Principal D.

I nodded and followed Qwerty. He was nowhere in sight, but one of the screens on the control desk had him on it. I almost forgot that Porygon-Zs can enter computers. He appeared again and he lifted the chamber. I walked inside and it closed in around me. He approached the glass, "Taylor, I need to inform you on some things before I actually start."

"Alright" I said.

"This machine usually takes the Pokemon's DNA and looks to change them human. I'm afraid I'm not sure what Pokemon this will change you into. I'm also not sure if it will be regular or an anthro."

"Any Pokemon would sound good right now..."

"Also, after I transform you, your human look will change depending on what Pokemon you become. So, are you sure you want to go through this?"

"Yes, I'm ready..."

I said that half heartedly. Qwerty floated over to the control desk and pressed a few buttons. The machine whirled above me and glowed slightly. A beam shot down and enclosed around me. I felt the energy flowing through me.

"Hey, this actually feels..."

My words were cut off because a surge of pain coursed through me. I screamed and I felt my skeleton rearranging. The pain was so great I passed out.

---

What Pokemon is Taylor turning into. Please leave the first slot alone.
1111112111221121111112111.title: The Drastic Change

11111121112211211111121111.content:
I slowly opened my eyes hazily. Everything was blurry. My vision went clear, and Qwerty was the first thing I saw.

"Taylor....Taylor..." he said. "Can you hear me?" He held up his hand, "How many fingers?"

"What kind of a question is that?!" I said. "You don't have fingers!"

"Glad to see you are thinking clearly. The process was a complete success."

"Really?!"

I tried to stand up, but I fell over as soon as I stood up. I rubbed my head, it was furry. I looked at my hand, it was a black paw with a white thorn on the back. The fur on my arm was blue. I felt my head some more, and felt ears. On the back of my head, were four growths covered with hair. My feet were digigraded, meaning I stood on my toes instead of the ball of my foot.

Oh please tell me I'm not dreaming...

I grabbed the desk and slowly got up. A tail was felt behind me. Qwerty smiled and held up a small round mirror. My face was different as well. I had a muzzle, fur covering it, and red eyes. I was a Lucario.

"Qwerty...."

"Yes?"

"This is AWESOME!!!!"

He smiled some more and circled me, "How do you feel?"

"I feel amazing!"

I tried to stand up without the desk, but I couldn't.

"That's good. Now, your body will be different. Since you have a tail, and the new feet, your body's balance will be different. Also, your speed, strength, agility, and enduranced has also changed. I believe we should try to get you to stand first. Then walk, and then maybe run."

"Gotcha. Let's get started!"

I let go of the desk, and I was able to stand up properly. I took one step, and almost fell. Qwerty caught me before I dropped. He helped me up again and I was able to take a few steps. We did this over and over again until I was able to walk properly. I stayed with walking for now.

"Maybe you should show the others..." said Qwerty. "I mean, I bet your friends are deeply worried."

"Yeah your right" I replied. "Let's go."

I walked out of the room and into the hallways. For once, I walked down without everyone looking at me. I approached my room, and heard some talking.

"Do you think you can Maggie?" asked Zasha.

"Yeah, two against one is really tough" said Steven.

"Taylor cannot fight" replied Maggie. "Thorn needs to be taught a lesson as well."

"Why does Thorn have to battle everyone?!" shouted Jasmine.

I signaled Qwerty to tell them. He knocked on the door and entered, "Everyone, I believe that is unneeded."

"Why?" asked Rick.

"Taylor, please walk in..."

I stepped into my dorm and approached the others.
11111121112211211111121111.title: Trying to Adapt

choices: She thinks I changed only to be with her and leaves
111111211122112111111211112.content:
Everyone looked at me strangely. Zasha was the first to walk up, "Uh...hello there. I haven't seen you before, are you new?"

"Zasha, it's me!" I exclaimed, "Taylor!"

Everyone soo had an expression of shock on their face. But Zasha walked forward again, "No, no way! There is no possible way your Taylor! Taylor is human..."

"Abby" interrupted Qwerty, "That is indeed Taylor. Perhaps you should ask him some questions first..."

"Who is the bully that targets Taylor every day?" she asked.

"Thorn the Weavile..." I replied.

"What did Taylor do the day we met?" asked Jasmine.

"I freaked out at first, but saw past your looks and saw that you are a great artist Jasmine."

She blushed slightly and Steven saw this. "Aha! I know the exact question to tell if he's really Taylor or not!" he exclaimed. "Who is Taylor in love with?"

I stepped back from that. I knew the answer, and so did Steven. I once told him because he asked me. I told him to promise not to tell anyone, but he isn't telling her; I was. I told a deep breath and spoke, "I...love...Zasha..."

Everyone gasped and Zasha was speechless. Steven smiled and crossed his arms, "Yep, that is definitely Taylor."

Everyone turned to Zasha, who still was wide eyed and mouth dropped. The others left the room so we could talk in private. She finally snapped out of her trance and spoke, "Y-You l-l-loved...me?!? Out of all of the girls here, you chose me?!"

I nodded slowly, "Yes...you were one of the first to show any kindness to me. I guess it was love at first sight. Call me stupid, but a human falling in love with a Absol is not weird to me. I love you Zasha, whether we are two different species or not."

Zasha was completely silent for a while.
111111211122112111111211112.title: Surprise!

1111112111221121111112111121.content:
Zasha silenced me by kissing me right on the lips. We kept locking lips for a few seconds until we finally broke it. I was now the one that was speechless, and Zasha had a smile on her face. I stayed there, just blinking in disbelief. However, Zasha spoke instead, "What's wrong? Never been kissed before?"

I still stood there motionless and speechless, one from the kiss and two from the actual answer. "Uh....no...I actually haven't been kissed before" I said embarrassingly. "But Zasha, does this mean that you..."

"Yes Taylor, it does" she replied. "I do love you. I liked you since the beginning, but I have never had those feelings for you. But, over the last few weeks I have grown attached to you. Taylor, I love you as much as you love me."

We began to kiss again, until we heard the door open. Everyone had a shocked expression on their faces, but it then changed to smug. After everything was settled, we all gathered around to formulate a plan.

"Now, I sent Taylor through the PokeHuman converter to transform him into a Pokemon" explained Qwerty. "He covered moving, but he still needs to learn how to fight and use moves..."

There was a knock on the door and Principal D floated in. He took one look at me and "smiled," "I was actually predicting that he would become a Lucario. I came over to give you the room cards." D handed me the Fighting room card, and the Steel room card. "Perhaps you could visit one of those rooms to help grow accustomed to your new body..."

"That sounds like a good idea" I said.
1111112111221121111112111121.title: Zasha's Kiss/Planning

11111121112211211111121111211.content:
"Steven" I said, "I'm going to the Fighting-type room. Would you like to come with?"

"Sure" he said, "You're probably going to need someone to explain to everyone if you need to."

We got up, said goodbye to our friends, and we departed to the room. I opened it with my key and walked inside. Almost everyone I met so far that was a Fighting-type was here. There was of course the Hitmon brothers, but there was also Zen and Blaire. There were two other Pokemon in here that I never met before. There was a Machoke and a Meinfoo. The Machoke was female, but it was kinda obvious. Her figure was that of a girl, with a slimer waist and smaller limbs. She looked like she had less muscle, but she probably could be strong either way. The one distinct feature that told she was a girl was that she was wearing a tight black tank-top. I was kinda glad she was, Machokes are probably the most human-like Pokemon I can think of. The Meinfoo was a female too, with a slight bust. Top saw us and then they all came down.

"Hey Steven" said Lee, "Still showing new kids around?"

"Oh, this kid knows more about this school than you think" he replied.

"What's your name?" asked Zen.

"It's nice to meet you again Zen" I replied. "I'm still a little sore from our sparring match the other day."

"Wait...Taylor?!?! Your that human Taylor!"

Everyone made a gasp but Blaire walked to me with a certain expression on her face. She walked very close to me. She seemed to be trying to show her...chest. I wonder if that metal thing around them were actually removeable. I shook that thought out of my head and stepped back. She came even closer though, but Steven helped me. Zen walked beside me, "Careful Taylor, Blaire is a huge flirt. And now since your a Pokemon, you are so in her league now."

"So that's why she acted like that before..." I replied.

"So Taylor" asked Lee, "You want to practice some moves or battle against me like you promised?"
11111121112211211111121111211.title: Reunion of Old and New Friends

choices: The Next Day! Maggie and Taylor Vs. Thorn and Gabriel!
111111211122112111111211112111.content:
For the next hour or so, Lee helped me with all my moves. Also, something weird happened. Instead of learning Bone Rush, I learned a move that looked like a steel-type version of Blaze Kick. "That's a really weird move, how about we try in our battle?" Lee asked. "Sure. If it does a lot of pain, I am sorry, but not to Thorn when he is nailed with it." You said.

Just when I and Lee were about to begin, I was called down to Qwerty's Room. "Look's like our battle will have to wait. Sorry Lee." I said. "It's Okay." He replied. I went downstairs and entered Qwerty's Room, and he confronted me. "Taylor, I have made something that you and you're friends will like." He said. Qwerty moved, I saw Everyone Else had watch like inventions on. "Here. The Portable, Poke-human Converter!" Qwerty said. I slipped the watch on, and saw there was a small dial, that had 2 options: Human, and Pokemon. "Let Me guess. By turning this dial here, I can transform into a Lucario, or back to Human if please." I deduced. "Man, He's smart." Jasmine said. "Now, everyone. Please try the dials." Qwerty said. You saw he indeed also had a watch on, and everyone turned the dials at the same time.

In a flash, everyone was in their human forms. I walked over to the mirror to see what I looked like. I had blue hair with black streaks, and a Blue Shirt with Black Jeans. I also had blue eyes, with a greyish tint. "Taylor. You look amazing." Zasha said. "Thanks, so do you." I replied. I then got another call from my mom. "Hey Mom. How the Family?" You asked. "Not Good, Tate caught a very high fever, and his one wish is to see You and your friends again." Mom said over phone. "Sure we'll be there." You said.

"Guys. We need to high-tail it to the Hospital!" I said. "It that so? Well everyone is supplied with a vehicle, You have a Driver's License, right Taylor?" Qwerty asked. "Yeah." I said. Everyone ran out side, Zasha and I had Lambourgine's while, Jasmine had a Ferrari, Steven had a Simple Skateboard, and Qwerty had a Bicycle. Zasha and I jumped in My Car, and everyone else got in and/or on their vehicle. And we set off.

When at the Hospital, we rushed to my brother's room, and saw my Mom, Dad, and Tate on his Hospital Bed. "Tate! We're here." I said. "What's with those weird watches honey?" Mom asked. All I could think is "Crap. I am screwed." "Taylor, what do we do?" Zasha asked.

We came up with a drastic plan, and started it. "You guys ready?" I asked. They all shook their heads. We held the watches up, and turned the Dial to Pokemon. We all transformed back. "What the Hell?" My Dad said. "Taylor, is that you?" My Mom asked. "Yeah. and these are my friends, in their real forms." I said. "My brother's a...Lucario?" Tate said. He jumped off his bed, and ran around each of us, like 12 times. All he could repeat is, "My brother and his friends are Pokemon!". We all changed into humans. Then the alarm on the watch bleeped. "We have to get back to classes and such, Tomorrow's Saturday. I'm prepared to give a beating." You said leaving the room. Everyone headed to the School, and went to Bed...
111111211122112111111211112111.title: The New Invention & The Truth

choices: They respect you, but still hate your guts.
1111112111221121111112111121111.content:
It was Saturday. Fight Day! "Maggie, you ready?" I asked. "Yeah, have you mastered moves as Lucario?" Maggie asked. "Yeah, I have a nice set of moves: Aura Sphere, Hi Jump Kick, Slam Kick, and Bonemerang." I said. "Cool!" She replied. 'you better watch Thorn, I'm gonna give you a warning you will never forget' You thought.

When in the Arena, Thorn and Gabriel were already focused. You turned into Lucario, and prepped yourself. "Taylor! Get ready to die." Thorn muttered. The Battle began, and right away it was a Ghost Match, between Maggie and Gabriel, and Thorn launched a Ice punch at me. I grabbed his arm and tossed him at the wall. I launched an Aura Sphere at him, when he hit the wall. He went for a Shadow Ball, but I jumped it and hit him with a Hi Jump Kick, it was powerful enough to make him faint. "Maggie? Need Help with Gabriel?" I asked. "Please!" Maggie said struggling. I did the mind thing, I developed from Mr. Zam. And predicted where he was going to be. I jumped and did Slam Kick. I hit Gabriel so hard, he also fainted. Everyone in the crowd cheered. Zasha ran up as soon as I turned back.

"You did amazing!" She said hugging me. What happened next?
1111112111221121111112111121111.title: The Next Day! Maggie and Taylor Vs. Thorn and G...

111111211122112111111211112112.content:
"I'll take that fight now Lee" I said. "But don't go easy..."

Lee made a small cheer and we both stepped into the ring. I was given the honor of attacking first. I placed my hands together and focused. I was trying to use Aura Sphere, a signature move for Lucarios. Nothing seemed to happen at first, but then I saw a small blue orb form. It grew to the size of a basketball and I hurled it at Lee. He swung one of his legs at it, but it exploded on contact. He was launched to the side of the ring. He got back up and jumped as high as he could. I jumped out of the way, and he crashed back don. He kneeled and grunted after that. The move he probably used was Hi Jump Kick. It causes damage to the user if there is no target. I ran over and tried a different move. I focused energy into my paw, and a small yellow orb formed; Force Palm. It slammed my paw into Lee, and he was forced into the wall. He fell on his face but slowly got back up.

"I'm done" he said. "Taylor, are you sure you haven't battled before?"

"No, this is the first" I replied.

"Let's fight again sometime."

I shook hands with Lee to show good sportsmanship. I left that room since I already learned two moves. I stopped by the Steel-type room to learn others.
