Steven took even longer trying to explain to them. The room looked completely composed of metal. I met Armor again, chewing on a piece of iron. I battled a few of them and learned other moves. In the end, I learned four moves; Aura Sphere, Force Palm, Flash Cannon, and Metal Claw. After a long day, I decided to go to bed. Qwerty said he had something for me in the morning. I jumped into my bed and quickly fell asleep.
111111211122112111111211112112.title: Winging It

1111112111221121111112111121121.content:
Right as I woke up I felt sore. I guess that even if you win in a battle you still feel it in the morning. I got up, waited for Zasha, and ate breakfast. Qwerty called me down to his room immediately after breakfast. He also warned me not to run into Thorn. I managed to go unseen and made it to Qwerty's room. He had the PokeHuman Converter up and running. He approached me, "If Thorn sees you like this he'll expect what's coming! That's why you need to become human, so you don't get much attention."

"Alright...then let's..."

"I have to warn you Taylor. Your human appearance will chance due to your transformation."

"I can take it."

Qwerty nodded and I stepped into the machine. The clear doors closed behind me and the energy beam fired. I didn't feel pain, I felt funny. I could feel my tail disappear and my feet change. The funny feeling stopped, and the doors opened. I stepped out and looked into a full-body mirror that we set up. My face structure didn't change much, just a few differences here and there. My eye color changed though, my eyes went from brown to red. My hair changed even more. My hair was originally brown, now it's blue with black streaks. The style in the back matched the aura sensors that were on my sides. My shirt was tan, around my neck was a necklace with a charm that was identical to the spike that was on my chest. My skin was more tan, around my wrists were black bands with small spikes on it. My pants were blue, and my shoes were black. I thought I looked cool. Qwerty made some sounds that made him sound content. I thanked him and left but I bumped into someone. It was Abby, and she was once again taller than me. She looked at me in shock, but that shock soon changed into admiration. "That's a good look for you" she said. I thanked her for her comment and checked my schedule. I had the Contest class that I missed yesterday. I ran to the room that was indicated on the schedule. However, it was the opposite end of the school. I ran as fast as I could...
1111112111221121111112111121121.title: New Appearance

choices: A very tall female Mawile anthro
11111121112211211111121111211211.content:
I saw the door in my sights. There was barely anyone around, I could have sprinted straight to the room. But, the bell rang before I could successfully approach the door. I accidentally barged through the door, collapsing to the ground and panting afterwards. I heard something approach so I looked up. An female anthro Milotic was glaring down at me. It honestly looked more like a Milotic with breasts and arms, but I'm not one to judge. And I must also say she was beautiful.

"You are late!" she exclaimed. She had a French accent to her voice. "I will not tolerate such behavior in my class, especially since you missed my class yesterday!" She waited for an answer, but I was out of breath still. She placed her hands on her hips and lowered her head, "Well, what do you have to say for yourself?!"

I finally caught my breath, but that one loose thought came out first, "Gosh your beautiful..."

My words made her turn and blush. "Oh Monsiuer, you are too kind." I stood up, only to be greeted by her giving a curtsie gesture. "Hello, I am Madame Aquatail. I am the head instructor for this class. May I do remind you that you shall never be late for my class ever again, understood?"

"Yes mam" I replied.

"Taylor!"

I turned to see Lily. She greeted me with a big warm hug and buried me into her fur.

"Ah Lily, you know this human?" asked Madame Aquatail.

"Yes Madame, Taylor is very sweet and considerate of others."

"Ah, perfect for an assistant!"

"Oh no, I couldn't be an assistant for you..." I replied modestly.

"Don't be silly human" she said with a small laugh, "I mean an assistant to a competitor. You see, we pair to the class to contestants and helpers. But since you were late, everyone was paired up."

"Uh Madame, we still have..." said Lily.

"Ah yes, her....Taylor, you will partner up with the young girl at the end. But be warned, she is a little...trouble."

I nodded and walked down the room. The room looked like the backstage to a Beauty Pagent. Each booth had different items and accessories. At the end of the row of booths, I saw who I was helping.
11111121112211211111121111211211.title: Contest Helper

111111211122112111111211112112111.content:
The first thing I saw was a large mouth with teeth. I almost freaked out but then I heard sobbing. I walked closer, then I saw a yellow body. She was a Mawile, a female anthro Mawile. I couldn't see her very well, she was hunched over crying. I couldn't just stand there, so I approached her slowly. "Are you okay?" I asked. I got no reply, just sobs. After a while, I got my answer, "...ugly..."

"Excuse me?"

She sat up and yelled at me, "I'm ugly! Can't you see me?! Can't you see this thing on my head?! I am hideous!"

Tears were in her eyes, so her yelling wasn't out of anger. I had a better chance to look at her now. Her hair was long and black, actually her hair looks more like a part of the growth on her head. Her eyes were a shade of silver, a shade filled with sadness. It took me till now to realize how tall she was. Most of the other Pokemon were about a head taller than me when I was human. She was about eight feet tall! That's nearly two feet taller! Her height wasn't the only big features about her, but I'm just going to say she had a large hourglass figure. Before I could actually talk, she slumped back over, covered her eyes, and cried. I wanted to pat her back or something, but that extra mouth scared me slightly. After a few more minutes, her crying subsided and she uncovered her face enough to look at me.

"Why are you still here?" she asked.

I told her the truth, "I can't leave a beautiful girl crying..."

She immediately raised her head and stared at me, "You think...I'm...beautiful...?...!" But, her expression changed straight back to sadness. "No...no I'm not beautiful....I'm not even cute..."

"Why do you say that about yourself?"

"I always wanted to be in a Contest, but I was turned down every time. I asked the others why, and they said that the hideous growth on my head is the problem. But when I was asked to compete, the teacher said I couldn't. Now I know why, all because if my growth, I'm a hideous monster..."

"No! You're not ugly! Listen, I'm pretty sure half of the girls here would die for your beauty. So what if you have a giant mouth on your head, that shouldn't matter. Your beautiful, no matter what others say."

The girl still seemed to distrust my words, so I decided to show her. I walked up and hugged her waist. That was actually the only thing I could hug. She slowly lowered her body and returned the hug. She was crying, crying tears of happiness. "You know" I said, "I never got your name..."

"My name is Vivian..." she replied.

"Oh look, it's the freak, and the freakshow!" said a voice.

I turned to see...
111111211122112111111211112112111.title: Not Ugly

1111112111221121111112111121121111.content:
Standing before us was a anthro Arcanine. Her figure was similar to Vivian's, but she was roughly as tall as me. Her fur had this shimmer to it. Vivian slumped over very sad, "Oh...hi Flare..."

"I dont know why your so happy" she said. "That human is probably lying to you."

"Huh?"

"My guess is that the human only is saying these things just so he doesn't get eaten by that thing you call your head!"

"No, I don't eat people..."

"Yeah well, he doesn't know that. But even so, that thing behind your head is just as hideous as the rest of you."

"......no...."

"Face it, a Contest is meant for beauty. And you don't have any!"

"Shut up!"

"Heck, I'm wondering why the teacher even allowed you in; she knows everything about beauty! What did she see in you?!"

"SHUT UP!!!!"

With that Vivian shoved me out of the way and ran away crying. I looked at Flare, "Just how heartless are you?!"

"Whatever ever helps me win I will do" she replied. "Learn something kid..."

I tried to run after her but Lily stopped me. "Taylor, where are you going? Class will start soon!" I panicked, "I know I know, but Flare made Vivian run off. Can you try to convince the teacher to delay this please?" Lily looked mad, but she nodded. I ran off trying to find her.
1111112111221121111112111121121111.title: Flare the Champ

11111121112211211111121111211211111.content:
I ran through the halls as fast as I could. If is was in my Lucario form I could do this faster, but I had to deal with being a human. It was class time so I had no trouble in the clear hallways. I needed to find Vivian before Madame Aquatail gave us no more time. Although the hallways were clear, I managed to run into someone. It was the principal. He looked shocked, "Taylor, are you skipping class?!"

"What?! No!! I'm not!" I replied. "My partner ran off because of this girl. Her name is Vivian..."

"Ah Vivian, sweet girl. But she takes other's comments too seriously."

"Have you seen her? I asked Aquatail to give me more time but I'm not sure if I have much."

"I haven't seen her but you could try her two closest friends. One is Abby and the other is Frost."

"I can't see Abby, she's in Gym. Could you tell me where Frost is?"

"Frost generally has art this period."

I ran off giving a simple wave meaning "thank you." I rushed to the art room as quickly as I could. Then, it hit me, I forgot to ask what Frost was. I figured it would be easy at the time and I walked in. There were many Pokemon in the room. Jasmine probably knew who she was. I headed towards her desk. She was painting a picture of a Lucario, which I assumed was me. As soon as she saw me, she hid the picture behind her and used her tail to block my view.

"T-Taylor...what a surprise..." she said.

"Don't worry Jasmine, I didn't see it" I lied. "I just need some help."

"Oh? What could that be?"

"I'm looking for a girl named Frost. I heard she was in this room now..."

"Frost...? Oh! She's near the end. But I have to warn you on something. Meeting her in this class she's kinda....different..."

"How different...?"

"She will ask for an opinion of her work. If she likes it, she will be friendly towards you. Make her angry, and you might lose a limb..."

I gulped and walked down to the end. The Pokemon was a Froslass, meaning the name Frost was a dead given. A beauty shined off of her that was wonderful. She was painting a landscape that was hard to see with the given angle. I walked to her, but she ignored my approach. She saw me in the corner of her eye and turned towards me.

"So your the human that I've been hearing about..." she said in a calm tone.

"Yes, and you must be Frost" I replied. "I need your help..."

"Of course, but first..." Frost turned her painting in my direction. Her landscape was a beautiful snowy mountain with auroras in the sky. "What do you think of my work?"
11111121112211211111121111211211111.title: The Search for a Gentle Giant

I believe you two will become friends. Now, Jeremy, can you please show Taylor to his dorm room." stated Principal D. "Sure thing, sir." Jeremy then pulled me out of the room into the hallway. "Male and Female students can sleep in the same room. Curfew is 9:00, lights out at 10:00." Jeremy informed me. "Hey, how did Principal D looke like a human when I first saw him?" I questioned. "All students have watches that make us look human. When we're out and about for long periods of time, we use a machine that makes us fully human, just in case things happen." "Wow being a Pokemon sounds so cool. Wish I could be one." "That machine I just mentioned could theoretically turn you into your inner pokemon. Same thing with the watches." "I just can't wait for my first day here." I said with enthusiasm. "Here we are. And now to meet your roommate!" Who is it?

"Hello, you must be Donald.” the man says holding out his hand “I’d like to welcome you to Pokey High School. I am the principle Mr. D.” You shake his hand and you go and get your stuff wile your mom talks with him. You notice some eyes looking at you on the other side of the gates. You try your best to block it out but it still made you nervous. Finally you hug your mom good bye as you follow Mr. D past the gates. As you walk though the school you notice that everyone looks like they are wearing very realistic costumes. Once you arrive at the Principles office you set your bags to the side and you take a seat. “Well since we’re here I won’t this.” Mr. D says turning a dial on his watch. You look in shock as you see him turn into a Deoxys. “Any way as you could now guess this school is actually a school for Anthro Pokemon.” Mr. D says “Although it is very rare that we even conceder a human to attend here, You showed a lot of promise from the test you took.” “U-umm, thank y-you.” you studier feeling intimidated. “You need not be afraid of me.” Mr. D says “But I under stand that this is a bit sudden. Why don’t I have someone show you to your dorm.” Mr. D pick’s up the phone and he says to send someone in. You turn and you see…
11531.title: Donald

115311.content: You notice a male Typhlosion anthro walk in to the room. You notice he is wearing jeans and a tee shirt with a hole up by the neck. "Ah good to see you Mr. Blaze." Principle D said "I'd like you to meet our new student, Donald." He looks over to you and you flinch a bit looking at his intimidating appearance. "Hey there." The Typhlosion says in a friendly tone "My name is Tobey." "H-hello." You reply still intimidated by him. "Mr. Blaze will serve as your guide for your first few day’s in school.” Principle D explains “I also thought he could help you out with keeping other students from hazing you until your ‘potential’ has been realized. Now I wish I could talk more but I need to get back to work, Mr. Blaze if you would be so kind as to show Donald to him Dorm.” “Yes sir Principle D.” Tobey says as he looks over at you “So shale we be off then?” You quietly nod as you pick up your things and follow Tobey out of the office. This time you are a lot more nervous that all the other students weren’t human and that you, as far as you know are the only human at the school. “Ok then what it the first class you have anyway Donald?” Tobey asks. “Oh u-umm.” you studier as you look at your schedule/map “A-algebra.” “Ah that’s Mrs. Chan’s class.” Tobey replies “She is a Medicham, and she’s quite nice. Although we don’t have any learning classes on Saturday so you get to relax.” You quietly nod as you are starting to see more and more eyes beginning to focuses at you. “Hey calm down ok.” Tobey says “There just curious about you, besides I’m here to guard you until things start flowing smoothly.” You felt slightly annoyed with Tobey’s last statement. “Ok so what’s your room number?” Tobey asks. “Umm l-let’s see D-57.” you reply. “Oh I know who’s in that room.” Tobey says as he walks over to the room your staying in. What is your room mate?

You watch a charge of electricity run down her arm and the coin launches as if it was a bullet leavening burn marks on the floor as it fly’s by. Then…

1153111111121111111.content: As you step into the arena you are greeted with silence as thousands of eyes stare at you. “May we have every ones attention!” the coach shouts out “The battle between our new human student Donald and our upper class fighter Misaka!” “I won’t show any mercy human!” Misaka shouts “I will send you home without even using my full power!” You say nothing as you hold your staff ready. “Ok like Joshua said think Ground type.” You repeat in your mind as you ready yourself. “Begin!” The coach singles the fight to begin. Misaka is quick to reply as she launches an arch of electricity at you. Your instincts take over as you use your staff as a lightning rod and send the attack into the ground. “Smart move Donald, way to block!” You hear Tsume shout out to you. Misaka lashes out in anger as she shoots more arches at you only for your lightning rod trick to stop it every time. “Well I guess it true that lightning always falls.” You say feeling somewhat confident. “Shut up!” Misaka shouts as she charges at you with her claws out. You try to defend yourself but she quickly slices your staff to pieces along with the rubber gloves. “Let’s see how you like it when I send the charge right through your body!” Misaka says as she grabs your hand. You close your eyes waiting for the pain…

1153112.title: Readers choice.

11532.content:
You were being driven to a new school, after ing bullied a whole bunch at your last one. "Mom. I don't see much problem going to this new school. Why are you so worried?" You asked. "I don't know sweetie. I just worry about you a lot." Mom said. "Honey. He'll be fine. I read about this school, it allows the Students to stay there; Like a College. And the Bullying rate is very low at this school." Your Dad answered. "Well, that's good." Mom said.

You arrived at the High School, and the Principal was waiting outside and waving. You got out of the car, waved goodbye to Your Mom and Dad, and ran to meet the Principal. "Hello Sir, thank you for allowing me to come here, it looks like a Nice School. "Well, most of our Students are Quite Nice." He said. "I hope so." You said.

After you said that, the Principal made sure that no-one else was around. "What's wrong sir?" You asked. The Principal came back, and held up a watch. He twisted a dial on it, and his body parts, started to morph. His Legs and Arms, turned into Tentacle like things, then his Chest became Red with a Jeweled Meteorite in the middle. What his head became really tipped you off.

His head morphed into a Skinny Oval shape with straight short stretched ears. You took a few steps back in fear, and realized he was a Deoxys. "We are proud to have a actual human here." He said telepathically. "T..thank y..you s...sir." You muttered. "Why are you shocked?" He said. "I just saw a Person, turn into a Pokemon! Who wouldn't freak out?!" You yelled. "It's okay. You're here to learn about how we actually work, we're nothing like those creatures that those games make us out to be." He said. "Alright, I understand." You said. He turned into the Defense Forme, and used it to bring you over the edge.

11533.content:
How about these guys.

Brad
Brad is a 17 year old he is 5' 11". He has been bullied in all the schools he has attended so far he hates conflict and tries to avoid it at any costs he also hates to fight even though he can defend himself due to his preflex ability (If you don't know what preflex is it is the a reflex initiated before an action takes place.) Brad chooses not to use this ability because someone always got hurt when he used it so he taught himself to control it but sometimes it still comes out. He is friendly and always willing to help and support anyone in need.

Tristan
Tristan is a 16 year old he is 5' 9". He loves to fight and gets into arguments with anyone for the sake of it. He got expelled from 10 schools for severely hurting other students. He doesn't get along with anyone and prefers to be alone he always has to be top dog and will do anything to do it he likes to be feared by everyone but that is all about to change in his new school.

115331.title: Which one do you want

1153311.content:
Brad woke up to the smell of freshly cooked pancakes and they smelled delicious Brad's Mum came in and said "Good your finally up Bradley"
"Yeah Mum, breakfast smells delicious" Brad said thinking about the Pancakes and forgetting about the days events
"Are you packed for Pokey High School honey" Brad's Mum said in a way only a mother could.
"Yes, Mum" Brad said in a annoyed tone while rolling his eyes.
"Good have breakfast so we can go, and don't roll your eyes at me" Brad's Mum said in a bit agitated tone.

Brad ran down stairs and quickly had breakfast and he was pumped to go to his new school. It was a five hour trip to Pokey High School. When they got out of the car Brad got his stuff out of the and there was a man standing at the gate the man saw a boy dressed in ripped jeans, a white shirt and a black leather jacket with messy dirty blonde hair. The man walked up to the boy and said "You must be Brad" Brad say a man in a blue suit with a red shirt under it and a black skinny tie with weird looking reddish orange hair and
Brad Replied "Yes, I am Brad and who are you"
The man Said "I am Mr D and I am the Principal at Pokey High School"

Brad said his goodbyes to his mother and went through the large gates of the school with Mr D the school was massive the walls were made of marble and it looked amazing to Brad. They walked through the corridors until they reached a door that had Mr D's office they went in and Mr D pushed a few buttons on his watch and a bright yellow light flashed where Mr D was standing when the light faded a Deoxys was standing in front of him Brad was surprised at what he saw.

"Your a Deoyxs" Brad said inquisitively
"Indeed I am, you reacted better then I then I expected you to. Welcome to Pokey High School or Pokemon High School or PHS for short" Mr D said excitedly
"Now it all makes sense to me, but why was I enrolled in a school for Pokemon I am human after all" Brad said with a confused look on his face.
"This is part of a experiment to see how humans and Pokemon react in a learning environment and I chose you" Mr D explained
"Cool when do I start" Brad said excitedly.
"You start on Monday" Mr D said handing him his schedule and a map of the school.

There was a knock on the door and Mr D answered the door it was....

11533111.content:
(From now on Brad will be referred to in first person.)

I turned around to see a girl with pale green skin, darker green leafy hair in a ponytail that resembled a Chickorita's leaf and a dark green necklace of buds she had a nice body, she was about 5' 7" and she wore a white dress that outlined her features.

"This is Serene she will be giving you a tour of the school" said Mr D
"Hey, Serene I-I am Brad nice to meet you" I said a bit edgy holding my hand out for a handshake.
Serene grabbed his and and they shook hands "N-nice to meet you, Brad I've never met a human before" she said nervously she seemed more scaredof Brad then he was with her.
"Well I haven't met a Pokemon besides Mr D here" I said they both laughed at his statement.

Phloem grabbed my hand and wrapped a vine around it and quickly showed him around the school and all the classrooms he heard a couple of classes he hasn't heard of before and they were battle tactics and Pokemon history. Serene asked to see my scedual and saw we had battle tactics, science and gym together.
"Hey, Brad we have battle tactics, science and gym together" Serene said excitedly
"Cool I will try to sit next to you in those classes then" I said calmly and then asked "By the way do you know where dorm B27 is"

Serene took him to his dorm and says "You are in the same dorm as my brother"
"Y-y-your brother" I said a bit scared
"Don't worry you will get along with my brother fine"
"I hope so" I said still a bit scared

Brad opens the door and sees....
11533111.title: A Female Anthro Chickorita

115331111.content:
I entered the dorm and a guy with cream colour skin, green leafy spiked hair that at the front resembled the scythe-like leaf that a Bayleef has on his head and leaf like shoots sprouting in a ring around his neck attacked me with razor leaf.

I caught most of the razor leaf thanks to my preflex ability and some hit my chest and ripped my shirt revealing my Phoenix tattoo on the left side of my chest. I didn't dodge the attack because I didn't want Serene to get hurt
"Ouch, that hurt what was that for" I yelled while looking at the cuts on my hands and my chest.
"What are you doing with my sister" the guy yelled in reply
"Sorry my brother is very protective when it comes to me" Serene said to Brad appolegetically.

"Yeah, sorry about that what are you doing in my dorm anyway" the boy said
"I am the new student Brad and I am your new roommate" I said hoping that he doesn't attack me again. The guy was wearing a white shirt with a black denim vest and camo cargo shorts.

"Hi Brad, I am Xylem. Sorry I attacked you earlier like my sister said I am very protective when it comes to her." The boy said.
"No worries Xylem the cuts just sting a little. Anyway I probably would of done the same thing if it was my sister." I said tapeing my hands.

Me and Xylem talked for a while and found out that we had alot in common.

"Hey Brad I am about to catch up with my friends want to come and meet them."
"Sure I don't know many people in this school it would be good to meet some more people"
"Ok let's go, you want to come with sis."
"Ok"

Where do they meet Xylem's friends...
115331111.title: The Roommate

115332.content:
Aqua is 14 and stands at 5'6 but very slim. He has blue hair, blue eyes and slim glasses. He is quiet and kind but when he does talk it seems like he has no emotion. This caused a lack of friends which led to bullying which led to transfer to PHS. He is highly intelligent and well versed in both pen and sword. Take the sword away though (Or spear, knife or bow...) and he can't do anything with his hands. He does not know how to fight with his hands due to lack of physical skills but has trained with historical weapons from his father's collection. He isn't very trusting because his mother left at a young age which he views as a betrayal. This also contribute to his silence when girls are around.

Will you follow his story?
115332.title: Aqua

1153321.content:
I leaned against the wall and stared out the window. The lake out in the distance glistened in the sun. I inhaled the scent of the evergreens near my house. t comforted me and let me feel truly at home.

A shame I have to leave it all.

A knock on my door brings me out of my peace. My father walked in with a large case in his hands. He sighed and beckoned me forward. I approached. a little curious about what was in the case.

"Son, I know you're nervous about your new school but I know you're going to do fine."

I run my hands through my hair and smile. "Yeah, I'll blend right in."

He grinned "When you dyed your hair you lost one of your ninja aspects. Stealth. But you still have silence."

That's Dad. A weapon history buff at heart.

I nod towards his hands. "What's in the case?"

"A gift." he fumbles with the clasp and opens it. Inside is a pleasant surprise.

My favorite swords, the Katana and Jian take up most of the case but I also spot a bow and quiver of arrows.

"I thought you'd like to keep in practice." he smiles "I think you'll be able to forge anything else during metal shop class."

"Thanks Dad." A car horn draws my attention. "That's the taxi." I head out through the door. He places his hand on my shoulder.

"Son?"

"Yes?"

"I just want you to know that I'm proud of you. And I'm sure your mother would be too."

I frown. "Yes, of course."

I walk out the door with the case of weapons in my hands. I pause by the door and grab a suitcase of essentials. I place my thing in the trunk and give the taxi driver instructions. A few minutes later I get out at the airport. I check in my luggage and board the flight. I sleep most of the way and finally land. I get out to a older looking man waiting at the airport. The moment I step out he walks toward me.

"You must be K-"

"Aqua" I quietly mutter.

"A nickname?" he smiles "Well Aqua, I'm Principal D and I'm here to take you to PHS."

I manage to smile. "I'm glad to be here sir."

We walk to his car and drive to the school. It looks large, like most boarding schools do but there was no one outside, which perplexed me. My gut told me something was up and my hand automatically strayed to where I wore my sheath. We proceeded into his office, where he turned around sharply. Instinctively I recoiled back and placed my hand on the clasp of the weapons case. He glanced down.

"No need for the sword Aqua."

I paused confused and watched as Principal D fiddled with a watch on his wrist. Suddenly his form rippled and a Deoxys was standing in front of me.

"Well Aqua?"

I simply stand there, eyes wide as he tilts his head as if inviting me to answer.

"Let's just give you the short version." He places one of his tentacles on my shoulder. "Everyone here is a Pokemon, anthro or regular except you. That's all you need to understand for now."

I feel my hands start to shake. "Okay"

He seems to sense my nervousness. "Don't worry" he chuckles "We wouldn't have chosen you if we didn't think you'd be good here."

I nod. "When do I start?"

"Classes star tomorrow" he hands me a schedule and map and presses a button on a device on the desk. "Please send Aqua's guide in."

The door opens slowly to reveal...
1153321.title: A New Home

11533211.content:
A male Lucario walked in. He wasn't anthro but he still looked slightly different than his image on my DS. That or it was just because it was in real life. He did a double take when he saw me and glanced at Principal D.

"When you told me that someone nicknamed Aqua was joining us, I expected a water type." he seems confused.

I smile "Aqua is more a personality based name."

He glanced towards me and his eyes glowed briefly. "I can see that through your aura. What I can't see is what kind of pokemon you are."

I shrug "Not a pokemon, a human."

His eyes widened a little. "A human? Really?"

I nod slowly, unsure of what's going to happen. As usual my hand goes to my sheath side.

He turns to Principal D. "For real?" he asks.

He smiles "For real."

"This is AWESOME!" he yells and immediately circles me.

"Why are you so excited?" I ask confused.

He taps me lightly on the shoulder. "I've never seen a human before! Let alone met one who was going to school with me!"

"Well" nodded Principal D " I think you two will get along just fine"

We left the office together and stopped out in the hall.

"Name's Aqua" I say extending my hand. "Yours?"

He grips my hand and shakes. "Aura"

I glance down at the map a schedule in my hand. "So" I notice something. "If this is a boarding school..."

"Why isn't there a room key?" he finishes. "Number coded keypads. Your code is in the top right corner under your room number."

"Room 13K" I read.

Aura flashes a grin. "You an intellectual?"

"You can call me that."

"Then you two will get along just fine."

We walked together towards the dorms. Aura pointed out the battle stadium the educational building and the gym. We walked down the dorm and I realized I wasn't getting that many looks.

"Not a big reaction to a human." I observed.

Aura shows me a device on his wrist. "Pokehuman transformer." he states simply. "Let's us look like a human."

I nod, then stop as I notice the door in front of me. 13K.

I look at Aura. "Should I knock or what?"

He shakes his head. "Naw, just go in."

I set my weapon case down and punch in the code and slowly open the door a noticed my roommate sitting on the bed.
11533211.title: Aura

choices: You say nothing and she reads your mind
115332111.content:
A female Gardevoir was sitting on top of her bed reading a history book of some kind. She glanced up when I entered and I noticed a pair of round glasses on her face. Her red eyes immediately locked on to me.

"Yes?"

I immediately closed up. I had never been able to talk to girls.

"C'mon Aqua," Aura nudged me "Say something!"

I opened my mouth then closed it.

She looks at Aura. "What's going on?"

"This is your new roommate," he smiled.

"Well why don't you show me what kind of pokemon you are?"

I look at Aura. He rolls his eyes, "Aqua here is a human!"

"Really?" she stands up and walks over to me.

I nod and extend my hand.

"Why so quiet?
115332111.title: Athena

1153321111.content:
I try to speak but just can't bring myself to speak. The Gardevoir and I lock eyes and I see hers glow brightly.

All at once I feel remember some of the past arguments about my mom Dad and I have had. I remember how I said she had betrayed me, how I hated her and how she had twisted my view of girls so much that I couldn't talk to them.

Gardevoir slowly backs away and smiles. "Do you and your Dad always argue with weapons in your hands?"

Words finally return to me. "No, were just big combat history buffs."

She nods and finally takes my hand. "I'm Athena."

I smile, "That's a name I know."

Aura pipes up, "Really? How?"

"It's the name of Greek goddess who represented wisdom and battle."

She blushes, "You're the first person besides me who knew that."

I shrug "You're the first girl who's literally read my mind."

"Whoa, hold up." Aura cuts in again. "You read his mind?"

She nods. "I wanted to see why he wasn't talking."

"Why?"

"Because people talk better when their secrets out in the open."

"Okay, well I better get to my dorm, see you guys later." He darts out.

Athena turns and I tense waiting for the inevitable quetions.

She says:
1153321111.title: Mind Trip

11533211111.content:
"About what I saw..." Athena began.

I sit down on the extra bed and lower my head. "What is it?"

She sits next to me and I feel a hand on my shoulder. "No need to be ashamed Aqua, I think most people would feel like you do."

I look up at her. "You really think so?"

"Yes, I do."

I smile and slowly get to me feet. "You're the first person to say that. My Dad said I should be sad that she was gone, not angry that she left. So did the doctor."

"Well they just are giving you the textbook answer."

"You know..." I turn towards her. "It feels nice to be able to talk to someone who understands me for once."

"Well," she giggles "Maybe they just needed to read your mind."

I chuckle and finally glance around the room. It was simple with two beds, two desks and two dressers. I smiled when I realized the room was practically symmetrical. I lean down and open my suitcase.

"I assume my stuff goes in this drawer?" I ask nodding towards the closest one.

"That's right." she nods "Need any help?"

I shake my head "It's okay. I don't have much to unpack."

I quickly organize my books, clothes and laptop into the drawer. I grin and even begin whistling a little as I work. Finally I slide my case of weapons next to the drawer along with my now empty suitcase.

"Aren't you going to empty that case too?" Athena asks, indicating the case of weapons.

I shake my head. "I only open that one a safe distance from buildings."

"Why?" she seems alarmed "Is it dangerous?"

I pause and think for a while. "Define dangerous."

"Like could it hurt us right now?"

I shrug. "Depends. If no one touches it, no. If someone opens it and uses what's inside incorrectly than yes."

The look on her face was priceless.

I laugh, "It's not like a bomb or gun or anything like that. If you want I'll show you just to give you some peace of mind."

"Okay..." her voice seems shaky.

I pick up the case and sit down next to her. I run my hand across the top and slowly undo the clasp. Athena leans in close. I open it and pull the sheathed Katana out to get a better look at it, placing the case with the jian and bow still inside next to me. I pull it out of it's sheath and take a minute to admire it;s qualities. The folded steel blade, beautiful handle and diamond hard edge.

"That's pretty cool." I hear a voice from the doorway.

I shoot up and hold the Katana I remembered from my samurai training. I glance at the door.

"Whoa," Aura backs away, hands raised. "Calm down."

I lower the sword and sheath it. "Sorry man," I place the Katana back into the case. "Instinct"

"So," begins Athena "I can assume you can use that right?"

"Yeah, since I was like 10 years old."

"Seriously?"

"An hour a day since I was 7 years old with my Dad who's been doing this for about 25 years. But enough about that. Why are you back so soon? Miss me already?"

"No, I just came to see if you want to see the battle that's about to start."

"Well.." I begin.
11533211111.title: Confrontation

115332111111.content:
"Sure!" I slide my Katana back into the case and slide it back in its place. Winking at Athena, I follow him out the door towards one of the larger buildings. I notice it is built like a replica of the Roman Colosseum which gives the whole thing a charge of battle tension. As we walk through a tunnel entrance I pause for a second to ask Aura a question but when I turn around he's gone. Shrugging, I walk through until I come out to what looks like a changing room for a boxing arena. Thinking I took a wrong turn, I turn to leave when I hear a man call out to me.

"You're in the right place."

I whip around and instinctively crouch and place my hand at sheath level. A Machamp I didn't notice before is standing in the middle of the r oom.

"Pardon sir?" I tilt my head in confusion.

"What didn't Aura tell you?" the Machamp laughs. "It's our version of initiation!"

"What?"

"You're going to fight boy!"

I tense and feel fear shoot through me. "Are you serious Mr..."

"Call me Strike."

"Well Strike, I never signed up to fight anyone."

Another laugh. "Of course YOU didn't, Aura did."

Note to self: Next time you see Aura KILL HIM.

"Anyway," continued Strike "You were paired against another student based on your stats. You'll both go until you either tap out or knock the other out."

"Can I at least know who I'm facing?"

"Sure," he tosses me a cardboard card about the size of a business card. I glance down and see a picture of a
115332111111.title: Are you serious?

1153322.content: Ok, Ethan is 16 and slightly on the heavy side, but not overweight. About 5' 11" he has messy brown hair and grey-green eyes. Usually wearing a t-shirt and shorts. Ethan has always been an outsider, people just seem to avoid him. Due to this he prefers to be alone, but when he is with his(few) friends he opens up. He is generally calm and pacifistic, but when he gets mad he goes ballistic. Ethan is a skilled fighter, having been in martial arts most of his life, and isn't afraid to fight dirty. He is also proficient in kendo(japanese swordfighting) and usually carries a bokken.
1153322.title: Ethan!

12.content:
Hi! I'm a pretty awesome person writing pretty awesome stories so that some pretty awesome people such as yourselves can add to it. Now, My name is Sierra. I'm a honey blonde with dull grey eyes (yes, my eyes are boring) my skin is a pale peach and I have freckles scattered on my face. I have awesome ear rings (right now they're bubble yum. Grape to be exact XD) I'm 5'6" and have lanky arms. I always wear a grey jacket. Right now, I'm wishin my parents hadn't signed me up to go to some boarding school called PHS. It stands for Pokey High School. Not too excited about it.
"C'mon Sierra! Move it! We gotta get you over there before noon!" My dad shouts as he honks horn on the SUV.
I take one last look at my room, grab my suit cases, and head out the door.
After a three hour drive (thank god) we finally arrived on campus. It's front had a glorious pond full of some kind of koi fish thing. I took a guess that it was Magicarp and Goldeen. There were big hedges with Pidgey and Spearow. It was litter free and the building had three stories and rounded arms that I guess held the dorms. The students had ears and tails. I guess it was just something they did for fun. Like a dress up thing.
"Hello, hello!" Shouted a voice.
It was the principal. He ran up and introduced himself as Mr.D. He talked to my parents, so I decided to entertain myself.
12.title: Ello!

124.content:
I pulled out my rubber ducky and shoved it on my ear, so it stuck it's bottom side on the side of my face. Then, I took some spoons on hung them on my nose, forehead, and cheeks. My parents turned red and signaled for me to 'knock it off'. So, I slapped myself and they clattered on the ground. I heard some giggles, and that's a good sign.
"YOGURT!" I screamed. They looked at me and gave me the same look. Now, it was time for a song.
"I'M NOT WEARING UNDERWEAR TODAY! NO I'M NOT WEARING UNDERWEAR TODAY! YOU PROBABLY DO NOT CARE MUCH ABOUT MY UNDERWEAR, STILL NONE THE LESS I HAVE TO SAAAAAAAAY! I'M NOT WEARING UNDERWEAR TO....DAAAAAY!" I sang.
"Great Job!" Yelled some students.
"Thank you... honey!" I laughed. The entire campus burst into laughter. My parents got so red, I could've sworn they were gonna blow up. They got in the SUV and ditched me there. Mr.D grabbed my arm and pulled me into the school.
The school smelled like chocolate pudding and was warm, unlike my other schools that I decided try to freeze their students to death. The principal's office was straight through the hall, under all the stairs. That got me creeped out. See, I have a fear of going under things that are small and could possibly fall on top of me. I ran under the stairs and into the office. The office had two book shelves and two chairs in the corners nearest to the doors. I sat down in the chair in front of the principal's desk.
"Well, Sierra. I want to thank you for getting rid of your parents easily. It was quite entertaining for the students, I might add," he smiled. He lifted his arm and messed around with his watch. A bright light shone and there, in Mr.D's place, was a Deoxys.
"What the hell?!" I choked out. "Wait... Mr.D and Deoxys.... D and Deoxys... Hmm... DEOXYS ATE MR.D!" I screamed.
"Sierra, no. I didn't eat Mr.D," Deoxys laughed.
I started thinking again. "Deoxys, YOU'RE Mr.D?!" I gasped.
He nodded. "This is a school for anthro poke`mon," he explained, "It's real name is Poke`mon High School."
"But, I'm not an anthro!" I protested.
"I know. Its an experiment we're trying out. I'm not allowed to tell you anything about it," he explained.
"Do my parents know?" I asked, feeling a bit violated.
"No. Like I said, its a hush hush matter. Are you in?" He asked.
"Sure! I see nothing wrong with going to school with poke`mon!" I replied happily.
"Great! Now, follow your guide with the other first years to see the school," he said.
I turned to see-
124.title: Ducks and Spoons

1242.content:
"Kekeke! C'mon, girly, we gotta get the tour over with so I can leave!" Cackled a giant purple creature. He had long, pointed ears and a long pointy tail. He also had spikes on his back, a gargantuan smile, angry looking eyes, and occasionally stuck out his tongue.
"Okay!" I replied happily grabbing his hand. As we left, there was a group of second and first evolution pokemon, such as ladyba and pikachu. They started gathering around me and poking at me.
"Is you a for real human?" Asked a charmeleon.
"Of course she is! She don't have a watch!" Replied a togetic.
"BACK OFF!" Shouted Gengar. The poke`mon shuddered and stepped away from me.
"Stay away from her! She's here to learn, like the rest of you!!" He yelled.
As we walked, I know have a real reason to hate going under those stairs. There were a whole bunch of nasty poke`mon like seviper and grimer and koffing. We quickly ran out of there. We walked around and saw the cafeteria, the library, the battle arena, the lounge, the dorms, the nurse, and all the classrooms. But, we were forbidden to go upstairs.
"Why can't we go upstairs?" I asked.
Gengar stopped and looked at me. "Are you sure you want to know what's in there?" He asked grimly.
Everyone was silent and nodded. Gengar's smile ran away and he became serious. He walked up to the door and unlocked several locks until he reached the last one. He grabbed the knob and slowly turned it. He signaled for us to walk in, so we did. There was a giant piece of glass as a wall. In the middle of that room was a ghost like creature. He had a white face and a giant single purple eye. He ran up to the glass and started banging on it.
"You'll never get out of there, Dusclops!" Gengar shouted at him. Dusclops yelled.
"Why is he in there?" Asked a Kakuna.
"He abused the power of-" Gengar started.
"Gengar, take them away from here!" Mr.D stated sternly.
We walked out. I could tell without looking that everyone was freaked out.
"Students, head to your dormitories. School starts at 7 o' clock am tomorrow morning. Good night," Mr.D announced. I walked to my dorm and went in. I saw someone in there, so I took a guess that it was my roomie. I looked and saw that it was-
1242.title: Walking Is Evil,  Dusclops is Worse

12421.content:
Gengar?! Why was he in MY room? And toying around with MY cell phone? But, I'm mostly concerned about why he was in MY room. He quickly looked up at me and pulled headphones his ears.
"I was expecting you to be gone longer..." He sighed.
"Why are you in my room?" I asked louder than I should've.
"Excuse me, but this is my room too, smartellic," he growled. "And we won't see each other that often, anyway. I attend the night school."
I scowled. Then smiled.
"If you're a junior, you must know the school pretty well," I said.
"Yeah..." He replied awkwardly.
"Are there any games or hidden of areas here?" I asked smiling deviously.
He kinda smiled bigger, but I couldn't really tell if he was happy or not. The thing with Gengar is that you can never tell if they're happy or not, unless they frown.
"Ya know? You're gonna fit in well with me and my friends," he said as he twisted around his watch and turned into a human. He had blue/violet hair that came to his cheek bones. His eyes were a dark blue and he was about 6'0". He wore a baggy grey jacket and baggy dark blue jeans. He grabbed my wrist and pulled me out of our room. We walked to the main lobby area saw two other teens there. One was a girl with a red/violet winter hat. She also wore a matching crop top and puffy sweat pants.The second one was a boy with a purple and yellow tie dye shirt and purple jersey pants. His hair was blonde and his eyes were black.
"Yo, Gengar, who's she?" Asked the boy.
"Ekans, its the human girl, you idiot!" Yelled the girl.
"Sierra, meet Medicham and Ekans," Gengar introduced. "But, their human names are Nicky and Landry,".
"Okay..." I replied, getting the names drilled in my brain. "What's your's?" I asked.
"Well... I never really got one... I missed that day of school," Gengar replied embarrassed. "Could you give me one?" He asked.
12421.title: Homies!

124211.content:
"Hmmm... What about Kyle?" I suggested.
"Why 'Kyle'?" He asked.
"Well, I thought of your tongue and smile and got Tile, but that didn't sound right so I found a name that rhymed with it and got Kyle!" I explained.
He nodded and smiled. He liked it.
"Now, about the secret areas..." I reminded.
"Oh, yeah! Follow me!" He laughed. He led me to the second floor and to the gymnasium. He walked to a loose board and looked around. He knocked on it and heard a knock from below. He signaled for us to come and we did. He lifted the board and we entered and saw-
124211.title: Kyle

choices: We continue on with the evening
1242111.content:
An anthro Marill. She wore a visor that was worn backwards and a basketball shirt that's arm holes were cut down to the hems at the bottoms. Her pants were basketball shorts and she also wore Nike tennis shoes. Her hair was WAY long. Her were bent over her hat and her tail hung low.
"Yo, Gengar, we've been waiting for you!" She said as she leaned on a wall staring back at us.
"Sorry, Dallas. Had to show the newbies around the building," he replied jumping down onto the area, followed by Nicky and Landry. It was a pretty big jump for me, so I sat down and started climbing my way down. I felt something grab my waist and I turned to see Gengar lifting me down. I blushed a little out of embarassment and out of... Well... Liking-him-a-little-bit-ness.
"Thanks..." I murmured harshly, trying not to let him see my blushing face. He looked at me and started showing me around.
"This is our get away place. We come here to unwind and goof off," he said as I looked to see a Lickitung anthro horking down a ton of food.
"We also gamble a little and watch T.V. And play Peoplemon," he continued.
"What's Peoplemon?" I asked.
"Well, you know play Pokemon on their game boys and Dsi's? Well, we hate it! So, we decided to make our own version to make fun of people!" Nicky explained happily.
"We're making a newer version this year and everyone is pitching in. Care to join?" Landry asked with a his.
I shook my head.
"Genygar! We were looking for youz!" Cryed a happy voice. It was an anthro Absol. She was smaller than me and had silver hair with a black streak through it. Her shoes were boots with fur on it and she wore a small shirt and pants.
"Neeli! How many times must I tell you not to call me Genygar?! My name's Kyle!" He growled harshly.
"Since when?!" She scowled.
"Since Sierra made it up," he said as he stuck out his tongue.
"You're so immature! This is the same reason I broke up with you!" She yelled.
Medicham leaned near me and whispered in my ear.
"He broke up with her. She just a little nutty. I heard she kicked a level four Ralts in the head!" She whispered.
1242111.title: Diffrent

12421111.content:
"And you! Who are you?" Neeli yelled intimadatingly.
"Hey, no intimidation needed! I'm already scared out of my mind today," I replied shakily.
"You just think you can come and steal my boyfriend?! Not gonna happen!" She yelled.
"I didn't say anything about-" I stammered.
"Oh, and now you're threatening me?! I could knock you out with one hit!" She screamed.
"What-?!" I said. I was very confused on what was going on.
"SHUT UP!" She shrilled as she grabbed me and flung me at a table. It broke, and I landed pretty hard on my chest. And it hurt since I'm a girl!
"Ouch..." I manged to choke out.
"Now you're cussing at me?!" She shouted.
"Since when does Ouch sound like a cuss word?" I whimpered.
"RAWR! Enough!" Boomed a terrible voice.
I was blacking out, but I had to know who was saving my butt. It was a tall figure... And... I think it was caring someone on his back... And he was like a super human! And...
12421111.title: My First Day Is Like A Season Of Deggrasi!

124211111.content:
I groaned. I felt all messed up and I had one of my world famous headaches were the back of my eyes hurt and there's no cure other than pills... Ugh...and this bed is... Moving? What?! I slowly opened my eyes. Everything was blurry and moving around in a rotation. I rolled my head and saw none other than Kyle.
"Where are we going?" I huffed. Oh, wow. That hurt. Actually, it hurt to even breath! I bet after hero guy left, she kept pounding the tar outta me! I wish I could cuss at her.
"Good to see you awake," Gengar sighed.
"Why?" I asked.
"Well, when the coach came, you fainted and hit your head on the table and cut it on some broken glass. He told Neeli to take you to the nurse. So... She took advantage of that and fake dropped you to the exit, then threw you at the exit and you didn't make over. So she kept doing that until I got ya. Then, well, it catches up to us in real time," he explained as he opened a door.
"Hello, hello, hello!" Cheered a happy voice.
"Hello, Ms. Chansey. Do you happen to know where nurse Blissey is?" Kyle asked.
"Hey! I'm a nurse trainee! I can do it! Let me see..." Ms. Chansey replied angrily.
"Oh, god! There's blood... Uh, why don't we turn her into a pokemon to make it easier to fix her up," Ms. Chansey suggested.
"Er...I'm not a pokemon..." I groaned.
"NOT A POKEMON?!" She yelled.
"Oh, Ms. Chansey! Get outta here!" Shouted an egg shaped creature. It wore a whit too-too, white shoulder coverings, and it had ears. Other than that, it looked like Ms.Chansey.
"I can't feel my face," I said.
"Oh...poor thing... Who did this to you?" Asked Nurse Blissey.
"Uh... I may be suffering a concusion..." I moaned.
"It was Neeli," Kyle sighed.
"Hmmm... Well, I think she may have broken something. Perhaps your rib?" Said Nurse Blissey.
"Just fix her!" Shouted Nicky.
"Okay, okay... Keep your cool. I'll have her out in a few," said Nurse Blissey happily.
"A few what? Hours?" Kyle asked.
"Days?" Landry joined.
"Weeks?!" Nicky exclaimed.
"Maybe three..." Blissey returned as she poked me.
124211111.title: Chansey and Blissey

1242111112.content:
(( :0 just wanted to inform readers that after 2 years, I have improved my writing capabilities and grammar, so I've very sorry for those of you who have been stuck reading this pile of... I can't even begin to describe... so... yeah))

         So there I was. My eyes flicked open, and I let out a small groan, trying to recall the events of the evening. Soon it all came flooding back... I was at a Pokemon Anthro high school, the principal was a Deoxys, my roommate was Kyle the Gengar, and I had just been pelted to death by a loony Absol named Neeli. My arm was in a sling, and my torso had a fresh bandage wrapped around it. I had seen better days, but I assumed it could have been worse.
"How do you feel?"
         I turned to see Kyle. He was in his human state, and he seemed rather drained. Had he been here the whole time..?
"I'm fine..." I replied, rubbing my eyes with my one free hand.
"Listen, I should have just left you to rest in the dorm... Your safer away from me until Neeli cools herself down. I dumped her a few days ago before school started, and she hasn't been handling it well..." Kyle explained. "I had Mr. D switch me with someone else so you wont have to worry about walking in on her and I... 'duking' it out."
"Kyle..." I started, but I didn't get to finish. He had reached over and pushed a button, probably releasing morphine into my weakened body, and thus sending me into a warm sleep.
***

         I opened my eyes quickly, hoping to catch sight of Kyle, though my hopes were a shot in the dust. I was in my dorm, though I was alone... Aside from a beautiful flower..! But before my very eyes, it turned to show:
1242111112.title: Oh a few later...

13.content:
Well...guess I should start my introductions then.My name is Jake Chu...a human about to attend some school named Pokey high school,or PHS for short.To my surprise,it was a boarding school,so right now I was sitting in the back of the van,with my 2 bags full of non-important and important stuff.Oh right!I forgot to describe myself.
Well...I'm 15 years old,about 4"11' ,have tanned skin,blue eyes,black rebel type hair,and a tiny cut on my eyebrow.That tiny cut was an accident when I tried to cut my hair myself,today.I always like to wear the same clothes,too,which are a black and white stripped hoodie,and black jeans with a diamond pattern on the left leg.
Yeah...it was a really boring trip towards the school,it felt about 2-hours.
"Mom,when are gonna get there."I complained,as I sighed.
"Hold on...hold on...okay,we are here!"She examined,excited for some odd reason.I looked out the window,to see some kind of towering school.It was at a distance,but even though it was,it still looked pretty big.Not only that,there was a trail of a long brick road pointing towards the school.It was a very cool sight,that I almost didn't notice a person standing on the side of the car.I quickly opened the car door,and greeted the person with a handshake.
"Hello,fellow student,how are you today!?"I asked,waving my other hand.
"I-can-tell-you-if-you-can-stop-shaking-my-hand."He said.I looked down at my hand,to see that I was shaking his hand so hard,that he was toppling over each time I shaked up or down.I let go of his hand,and rubbed my hand over my hair out of nervousness.
"Oh I am sorry,mr...uh...mr..."I started,hoping he may finish.
"Mr.D,your principal."He said,fixing that blue tie of his.I felt as if my jaw had dropped through the ground,but then I was hit on the head with some sort of heavy cloth.It hit me on the head again,which I turned around and looked at the ground seeing my bags of different thing in there.
"You forgot your bags,sweetie."My mom said,as she waved me goodbye.I waved back,and then she drove off,which I swore I hear screeching tires,and a crash.
"Okay...so Mr.D...how is it here?"I asked,dropping a bead of sweat.
"Oh I am sure that you will like it here."He said,as he patted my back and we started walking down the brick road.

Finally,after about 8 minutes of walking,we finally got to Mr.D's office.He opened the door,and I quickly stepped inside.After I heard a quiet close of a door,behind me,Mr.D tapped me on the shoulder.
"Now...let's get down the business."He said,as he started messing with the watch on his wrist.
"What do you mmmeeeannn..."Mr.D got all disoriented and then he reformed,and then...oh my god...I was staring into the eyes,of a Deoxys!I felt as if all my bones fell apart.
"Now,what your seeing is true.Now I understand that it may feel strange to see an actual live Pokemon standing in front of you."He explained,as his arms split apart into tentacles.I took a deep breath,and tried to act as calmly as I could.
"Yes...it is very strange,but what is this school,if your a Pokemon?"I asked.
"This is a boarding school that's named Pokey high school,right?"
"Right."
"Think about it."Pokey high school...it echoed into my head like a million times.Pokey high school...Pokey high school?
"Pokemon High School!"I realized,as I snapped my fingers.He chuckled.
"Your a fast one to catch on..."he said,as he floated behind his desk,and took two sheets of paper.
"Now here is your schedule and a map of the school..."He handed both paper,and I quickly scanned both of them.
"Also,I called your guide."I felt as if a question mark came out of my head.
"Guide?"I then heard the door slam from behind me,which I turned around.
"I'm here...ow..."The voice was muffled I couldn't tell who or what it was,but I found out when I opened the door and sat
13.title: First day...first surprise...

131.content:
I couldn't believe it...
On the ground was some sort of Emolga...an anthro one to be in fact.I couldn't tell what she looked like,because that wingspan was covering her body.Not only that,her eyes were swirling in a circular motion,but I could tell that her butt was sticking in the air.I froze in place,afraid to say anything.
"Ahem..."Mr.D slightly coughed.The Emolga did a quick shake of her head.
"Right,right,sorry."She said,as she stood up...on what seems like stubby legs.I could see that she was in a different form that I thought.(I could have been more descriptive...but this is rated 13 :P)
She had a wide chest and hips,and with her small waistline,I could tell she had an hourglass figure.Her arms had three fingers had the ends,and that wingspan was covering her arms and sagged behind her on the ground.Her main body was white,and everything else was black,due to the wingspan,plus she was about my height.I also saw how her cheeks were yellow instead of white,and so was her eyes.She had two circular ears at the top of her head,which I thought was the weirdest part.
"Hi...the name's Mushu,but you can call me Mushi,if you want."She greeted,as she held out her hand.I could see that the wingspan was connected to her arms and hands.
"Um...I am Jake."I said,as I shaked her hand.
"Alright,let's go!"She exclaimed,as she turned around an ran down a hallway.I could see her tail was leading straight to her tailbone.
"Um..quick question...can she use moves,relative to electricity?"I asked,without even turning around.
"Yes,in fact she can.Why?"Mr.D said.
"No reason..."

After about a minute,I finally caught up with Mushi and we were both walking to my assigned classroom.
"So,what's your first class?"She asked.It was strange,almost every time she opened her mouth,I could see small chipmunk-like teeth on the roof of her mouth,but she still talked as normal as ever.
"Let's see...Chemistry class."I said.
"Chemistry...Mr.Al is the teacher of Chemistry.I think you may like him."She said,stopping in front of a door.I did too.
"Well...I guess I will see you la--"I was about to enter the door,but then Mushi blocked it with her body.
"Whoa,hold on now.It's the weekend,silly."She said,sticking out her tongue.Oh...right.Today is Saturday,I forgot.
"Right..."I said,as I turned around.I skipped the classes,and thought about where I would be staying.
"Hey,Mushi...do you know the room...uh...32B?"I asked.Her eyes,somehow,lit up with hope...of some sort.
"Oh my gosh!That's the same room I am staying in!"She squealed,which I backed up a step from the sudden response.
"Really?"She grabbed my arms.
"Yeah,really!Let's go!"She then yanked me along with her.You wanna what the funny thing is?I was...literally,floating in the air,as she yanked me across hallways and corners.That's how fast she's going!
"Whoa,whoa!Can you slow down!?"I yelled.
"Hm?What was that?"She asked,turning her full attention to me...and not looking was going!In fact,I could see we were heading towards a marble wall!
"Look in front of you!"I yelled,and by the time she turned around,it was too late.She had ran straight into the wall,and I was slammed against her on her back.After we both groaned of pain,we both fell back,where I landed on the ground,and she landed on me.
"Whoops!I'm sorry!"She said,quickly picking herself,and me off the ground.
"I didn't mean it,I was just excited and--"I cut her off by closing her mouth shut.
"Mushi,it's alright.You were just excited to have the first human in a Pokemon school to stay in the same room with you.I can understand that."After I said that,I let go of her mouth.
"Okay...thanks...I think."She started scratching her ears,which I slumped my head out of embarrassment.

After calmly walking to Mushi's dorm,I entered it,quickly seeing that the room was painted bright yellow,and that there was a pink bed in one corner,and a blue bed in another corner.The floor was colored yellow,too,and it was carpet.
"Um...yeah,I didn't really expect for someone to say in the same room as me.I hope it's alright."She said,sounding a little disappointed in herself.
"It's alright,Mushi.In fact,yellow is my favorite color!"I said,quickly throwing my bags on the blue bed,and closing the door behind me.
"Alright,so my next class is--"Before I can even read it,Mushi lowered the paper and covered it with her wingspan.
"Let's forget about the schedule today.I want you to meet my friends."She said.
"Well...if I am going to a new school,I should probably know some new people."I said,which Mushi grabbed both of my arms,and started to gently pull me.
"Good,I want you to meet my best friend."She said,as we stopped at another door,which was labeled 32A.Mushi knocked on the door,as loudly as she can.
"Ugh...who is it?"The voice was too muffled for to define if it's a boy or not,but it surely sounded annoyed.
"It's me Mushi.I want you to met someone."
"Really?I'll be right out."
After about a few steps,the door knob twisted and the door opened showing...
131.title: Clumsy girl...

1311.content:
Holy...mud...on...a stick...
This girl was towering over me with her two feet bigger than me height!She also had a wider chest and hips than Mushi.She had almost the same figure as Mushi,only that she has long stubby arms,blue-ish skin,and those petals on the top of her head,gave off the explanation that she was an anthropic Vileplume.She seemed really tired,and the shadow of her petals were not helping her sleepy frown...in fact she looked like she was very angry.
"Ugh...who are you talking about exactly?"She asked,as her red eyes moved towards me.I started to shiver,worrying she may do something bad.
"Your looking at him!Right,here!"Mushi said,as she pointed one finger on each hand towards me.I felt a bead of sweat quickly run down the back of my neck.Her eyes moved towards Mushi,then back at me.
"Hm...he doesn't look like the talkative type.Also...is he a human?"The Vileplume asked,as she scratched her head.
"Yeah!He's a human at Pokey High School!Weird,right?"Mushi said,as she patted one of my shoulders.
"Uh...uh...Mushi...I think your friend is not friendly..."I quietly said to Mushi,hoping the girl would not here.
"What was that!?"She asked,as she bended over to get a closer look at me.Plus my head was covered by the dark shadow covering her's.
"Um...May I suggest,that you could lift up your petals...some...how."I shyly said.
"Listen,boy..."She started,as she jabbed one of her arms into my chest,and placed the other one at her hips.
"Mushi is a very good friend of mine.Get on her bad side,and you'll get on mines...get it?"
"Okay,I got it."She then stood upright,and took her stubby arm out of my chest.
"Good."The door to her room slammed,which I sighed in relief.
"See?Isn't she a good friend?"Mushi asked me.I gave a look of annoyance.
"Mushi,why is your friend so scary!?"I screamed.
"That's just her way of a warning sign."She said.
"Warning sign?"
"She's very protective of me.She is even willing of jumping in the way of a life-threatening projectile that was aimed at me!"
"She is?"
"Yeah,now come on."She turned around a started walking down a hallway.
"Hey!Where are going now!?"I asked,following behind her.
"To meet more of my friends,silly."

After about a minute of walking,we had stopped in front of a door that said 10B.Mushi again,knocked as loudly as she can,and unlike last time,the door opened quickly and she was pushed against the wall,but it wasn't that harsh of a push.
"Excellent."I looked towards the door to see a Cacturne,with his eyes closed,and those rhombuses turned in a U-shaped manner.
This guy was the same height as the last girl,and he had his arms to his sides.Funny,I thought he would have his arms out into the air,but okay,whatever.I also couldn't tell if that was grass,or green hair from behind him.
"Hey!Why did you do that,Cactine!?"Mushi yelled,angrily pointing towards the Cacturne.
"Do you know,how loud you knock on doors!?Jeez,you could wake up a whole neighborhood."He said,as his eye turned to me.
"Eh...who's this boy?A Ditto?"He started scratching one side of his head.
"No!He's a boy!A real human,boy!See!?"She said,as she started pinching my cheeks.
"Ow,jeez."I said,as I gently knocked off Mushi's hand.
"Ha...rough first day I see.My name's Cactine.Nice to meet you."He said,holding out one of those spiky arms.
"Uh...my name is Jake and...uh...can you somehow make those spikes go further into your arms."I asked.It's not that I didn't want to shake hands,it's just that his arms were making me uncomfortable.
"Pfft...I wish I could."He said,as he pulled his arm back.
"Is Vile up yet?"He asked.
"No,she's asleep.Why?"I thought I was saying what Mushi was about to say.
"Good...Mushi and Jake,I wanna tell you something."I started listening very carefully,and so did Mushi as she walked beside me.He then crouched down to our height.
"Don't tell her this,but while my girlfriend was asleep...I took a picture of her butt."He said,laughing a little as he took a camera out of his hat.Suddenly,the wall behind me and Mushi came tumbling down,and right in the ruble...was a very angry Vileplume.
"You did what now!?"She screamed,as I could see an angry vein on her head.
"Um...see ya,Vile."Cactine ran back into his room,and then heard a click.Vile jumped over our heads,and angrily yanked the door open.
"Get your butt over here,so I can kick it!!"She yelled,as she ran into the room,and closed the door behind her.
"Oh Cactine,when will he ever learn?"She asked,comically,as we heard a few punched being blown to somebody inside the room.
"And while they settle things...let's go to the gym!"I said,as this time I started to run ahead of her.
"Hey,wait the Gym is that way!"She screamed,which I ran in the other direction,with her following me shortly after.

Finally,after much running and catching our breaths,me and Mushi were standing on front of the Gym doors.How did I know!?It said 'Gym' above the 7 feet tall doors.
"Are you sure,you wanna tour the gym Jake?"Mushi asked,as she crossed her arms across her chest.
"Yeah,I mean I ace every Gym class there was,why?"I said,as I placed a hand on the doors.Mushi started tapping one of her cheeks with a finger.
"Well...I'm not sure,that you may ace this one."I gave her a confused look as I opened the doors.
"Why not?"I then looked through the door...and I felt my jaw dig into the ground.The Gym was huge,and there were cages all around,having Pokemon-Anthro and normal alike-fighting against each other.I closed the door and turned back to Mushi,which she shrugged,and gave off a nervous smile.I sighed then,I opened the doors back open,and walked in,with Mushi following me shortly.
"Okay,so what is Gym class?"I asked,turning my attention to Mushi.
"In this school,gym class is mainly a place where Pokemon,anthro or not,show their strength against other Pokemon."She said,but then her eyes widened when she looked at the bench.I looked at the bench,too and my expression was the same as hers.
What we saw on the bench was...
1311.title: Mushy room girl/Green spike...

13111.content:
This was an anthro Zangoose girl...I could tell,because of that blue shirt,she was wearing,was hugging her body,completely exposing her wide chest and hips.She had white fur,with patches of red around the end of her arms,one of the ears,and one of her stomach.I couldn't tell,if the two life-threatening claws at the end of each arm was a finger,because they moved like they were.Her hair seemed weird to me,which was just a big curl of air,in between the ears.
"Snitch...what does that count as?"She asked,as she wiped a green towel across her face.
"49-0...at this rate,you will even surpass our own teacher!"I heard.
On the side of the Zangoose girl,was a Sneasel anthro girl.She had black fur all over her averagely sized body,and white claws as toes and feet.She had...uh...6...red 'feathers' on her head.One was jabbing straight up,two were beside it,and three were jabbing towards the ground.
"Great...now I wonder who my next victim will be."The Zangoose girl said,as she tapped the side of her face with her claws.I could somehow read Mushi's mind,like she was saying 'please don't let it be us'.We then started to walk backwards,towards the door,not saying a thing...but before we even reached the doors,we both had bumped into something behind us.Mushi seemed to freeze in place,while I slowly turned around to see...a Lucario girl.
"What are you two doing?"She asked,in a angry tone.Me and Mushi both backed up about two steps.
This Lucario girl was about foot taller than me.She had only wide hips,and average sized chest.She had a swirl of hair that curved down her right eye,and came back up at the cheek.
"Oh,um...hi,Mrs.Lucane."Mushi said,as she took another step back.
"Um...we were just leaving,and um..."I started,trying to come up with an excuse.
"If your going to leave,then your going to have to fight in a match to show your strength."Mrs.Lucane said,as she crossed her arms.
"B-B-But,I am not good with fighting,I barely know any mo--"
"Not you,Mushi."She then pointed towards me,which my eyes grew really wide.
"Him."
"Wait...what!?I'm just a boy,a regular boy!How do you expect me to fight somehow without getting mau--"She interrupted me by grabbing my hair,and dragging me with her.
"Ow,ow,ow."I cried.
"Human or not,your going to show your strength if you even have a change to make it in this school.Zan,get over here!"Mrs.Lucane whistled,which I then saw the Zangoose girl appear right in front of my eyes,which made me really worried.This girl was just about a head taller then me.
"Yes?"Zan replied.
"Your next match is against this human,uh...Jake was it?"She asked me.
"Yes."I said,as I felt really angry,for some odd reason.
"So,your the new student...well,seems like your my practice dummy."She joked,as she calmly placed on of those claws on my right cheek.I flailed my arms,which made her pull back her hand.
"Look I don't care,if your one of the best.I can show you,that a simple boy can beat any living thing,any day."I said,bravely.She just giggled.
"Hm...feisty,I see...that's not really gonna help you."She laughed,as she walked into some kind of steel cage.I then angrily walked into the cage,and before Zan closed the door,I looked towards the gym door,seeing that Mushi was not there.She was probably too scared,or too shocked to see me get hurt,especially when it's my first day here,but it wasn't time to think about that.Right now,I had to face against this...extremely fast looking girl.The cage soon closed behind me,and Mrs.Lucane walked up to the side of the cage.
"Alright,this match is a winner take's all match,which means that if one person loses,it's over!"She yelled.Zan had already,took her fighting position...and...I didn't know anything.Dang it!I knew I should have taken those karate classes back when I was 9.
"3..."
"2..."
"1..."
"GO!"

Zan had already dashed towards me at the speed of lightning,which I quickly jumped out of the way,before she claw my chest off.Already,she looked confused,when she looked towards me,and I did the same reaction.
"Hold still,squirt!"She said,dashing towards me again.I decided to play it...'video game style'...as I ran up to her,and right at the last second,slid on the ground with one of my legs stuck out,hitting one of her feet,and making her toppling over and landing on her head.She angrily got back up,and I could see at least two angry veins on her head.
"I'm impressed,usually people would lose in the first 5 second of the match."Mrs.Lucane said,behind me.
"Uh...I play too many video games?"I shrugged at Zan.She then came at me like a raging bull,which I then ran towards a corner of the cage,and used it to jumped higher,like a wall bounce.She stopped right under me,with her eyes wide open,which I used my hands to play 'leap-frog' on her head,like I just bounced off a video game characters head.She stumbled forward until she grabbed onto the cage to hold her balanced,which I then started to hear people gasping and saying how was I doing that.I then saw how Zan's claws tore through the metal,and she slowly looked at me.Dang!!Her pupils shrunk so much that I couldn't even seem them anymore,not to mention the fact that she was constantly growling.She then ran towards me as fast as lightning,and as she was to claw at me from above my head,I jumped backwards,walked fast towards her,then pushed her in her stomach.
"Ever heard of something called taunting?You should try it?"I joked,almost getting clawed in the face,if I had not leaned back.Good thing I have extreme reflexes.She was trying to claw,punch,and kick every way she could at me,but I simply dodged each attack accordingly.Many Pokemon were cheering my name.However,she got a lucky shot,when she grabbed one of my arms,and pulled it behind my head,which made the crowd gasp.
"Ha!What are you going to do now?"She was right...what was I going to do?I tried to fee my captured arm,which my free arm,but she captured that one,too.
"Now,we can do this the easy,or the hard way."She said,tightening her grip on both my arms.
"Jake...get out of there."I quietly heard,which I looked along the many crowds of Pokemon,and as I saw Mushi,I smiled.She wasn't alone though,Cactine and Vile were along her side.
"Already,time to go hardcore."I bravely said.
"What are you saying!?"Zan asked,angrily,right before I slipped my left leg behind her legs,and tripped her from behind,making her let go of my arms.I then grabbed both of her legs,and started to spin around at a fast pace.
"Let...Go...Of...ME!"She yelled,as she tried to claw at me,but I was just too far.After about 8 swirls,I then let go of her legs,which made her flying across the cage,and land face first onto the mat,and her butt sticking in the air.
"I win!"I said,as I put my hands into my hoodie pocket.Many people cheered wildly,and constantly yelled my name.
"Zan!?Zan,get up!"The sneasl yelled,trying to wake up Zan.She didn't even budge.I feared that I may have spun around too fast,but all of that went away,when a robe like cloth covered me from behind.
"Jake,your amazing!How did you do all of that!?"Mushi asked me,sounding very excited.
"Dude,that was epic!!"Cactine said,which I saw two bandages on both of the arms.
"You know,your not as bad as I thought."Vile said,giving me a pat on the head,which forced me to bend my head over.
"Thanks..."I said,as I dropped a bead of sweat.
13111.title: Zan the fighter...

131111.content:
"Ugh..."I groaned,waking up,rubbing my head as I did.What happened?
"Jake!I'm so glad your alright!"I could tell that was Mushi's voice,right beside me.I looked around,and I saw that I was in Mushi's room...or our room,and in my bed.I had forgotten that I have
"What happened?Did I hit something hard?"I asked,turning to Mushi.
"Cactine patted you on the head,with those arms of his turned upside down.You fainted on touch."She said,giggling a little.I nervously laughed,right after I head some kind of punch being thrown,outside of the room.
"Ow!How many times do I have to say i'm sorry!?"That sounded like Cactine.
"100 times!I can't believe your my boyfriend!Not to mention the fact your still alive!!"That sounded like a really ticked Vile.
"Well,anyways,the doctor said,that you're going to be fine."Mushi said.
"Good thing to hear that."I said,relieved.Just then,I heard some kind of ambulance,that was greatly sounding louder with each passing second,making me feel worried.
"Make ways,for the handsome babes!"I heard,as I also heard car doors open and slam back closed,which then the bedroom door slammed open.
"Hellooooooo,cutie!"Two voices said.Strange...there were two...uh...well...um...
Okay,they both have the body of a Pikachu,but had the features of a Plusle and Minun.They both had nurse dresses and caps on,both have different tails than a Pikachu,one's a minus sign and one's a plus sign.Not only that,the Plusle has this big curl of hair the swirled over her left eye,and the Minun's swirl was smaller,but had many tiny swirls behind the bottom of her head.I could see their wide chests for their sizes,but they didn't even look like an anthro,plus I could see three tiny fingers on the end of each arm.they appeared to reach up to my knee,in height.
"Wait...what?"I kind of flinched at the word...Cutie.
"Time to take your medicine,honey bun."The Plusle said,as she jumped onto the bed,and poured down a brown-ish liquid into a spoon.Why are they calling me these names?
"Mushi...do they usually do this?I'm talking about the part,with the names."I quietly asked.Mushi scratched her head in confusion.
"No,they usually call people by their names."She said.
"Now open wide,sweetie."The Plusle...Pikachu shaped girl said,as she held the spoon of dripping brown liquid,near my mouth.I backed my head up and pushed the spoon back to the girl.Mushi stood up and walked beside the door.I wondered why she did that.
"Come on...you know you want to."The Minun said,quickly jumping on the bed,next to my feet.
"She's right you know,now open wide,please."The Plusle pushed the spoon next to my mouth again,this time bending over to get closer to my mouth,which I moved my head away this time.I then looked at Mushi,which I saw her blushing,before she covered his body in the wingspan of her's.
"Um...I appreciate the help,but I really don't need it."I said,which made the Plusle look at me curiously.
"Alright then...Ming..."She said,which the Minun lifted up her foot.
"You got it Ping.One medicine down the throat,coming up!"The Minun said,as she slammed her foot down...right on mine's.That really hurt!!
"OOWWW--"I screamed,right before the Plusle...or Ping shoved the spoonful of medicine down my throat,which I swallowed on reflex.
"How does it taste?"Ming joked,as she walked up to Ping's side.
