"Gugh...jugh..."That didn't go so well...wait a minute...actually...it did!The medicine did taste good for the first time,in my life.However,I got very suspicious,and I raised one of my eyebrows.
"Don't raise your eyebrows at us,Mister."Min said,as she lowered my raised eyebrow.I did a quick shake of my head,and made them both back up a step.
"Who are you two,and do you usually do this to everybody?"I said,a little bit hard.
"We are the puny sisters!"They both said,flapping their arms,right before I heard something...like two darts jab into something,which the girls yelped in response.They both reached behind themselves,and pulled out darts...more specifically,tranquilizer darts.The girls busted into laughter,right before they both feel over.
"Sorry,about that.My sister are just crazy for you."I turned to the door,to see that Mushi was holding a normal Pichu in her arms.
The Pichu was wearing swirly red goggles on his head,and was wearing a blue neckerchief.He was also holding a peashooter.
"Uh...what do you mean by crazy?"I asked,as I felt the girls twitching.The Pichu jumped out of Mushi's arms,and onto my bed.
"I mean that,they think your cute,and would completely fall head,over tail for you."He said,as his somewhat small body,picked up the two Pikachu look alike,over his head.He was also smaller than them.
"Wait...who are you?"
"I'm the Puny...ugh...brother...Maxwell!"He managed to say,right before the combine weight of the sisters,made him fall over,with the sister on top of him.
"...But you can call me Max for short."He said,trying to push the sisters off of him.
"Here,let me help."Mushi offered,as she picked up the two sisters,and walked outside.
"So,uh...who are your sisters?"I asked.
"They are the assistant nurses of this school.My dads are the doctors,and my mom is the cook."He explained,smiling.I just smirked.
"Well...I'm Jake,the only human at this school.Nice to meet you."I then held out a finger.
"I heard about you,and you seem like a nice guy."Max said,as he took my hand with both of his arms,and did a quick movement up and down.
"So,uh...I can see that your a quick sharpshooter."I said,as I picked up the tranquilizer darts the girls dropped,when they fainted.
"Yeah,I know.I've been very good at shooting objects...other than my own lightning."He said,as he took the darts,and somehow put it in his neckerchief.
"MAXWELL THUNDER!!What did you do!?"We both heard,which we both flinched at the booming voice.Mushi ran back into the room,shivering from the voice.
"Okay...see ya."Max said,as he ran out of the room in a panicked matter.I looked at the clock,and it read '10:30'.
"Mushi,I think it's time for us to go to sleep now."I said,as I pulled the covers over my shoulders.
"Yeah,it is late.Goodnight,Jake."I heard,right before I went to dreamland.
131111.title: The puny sisters...and brother...

1311111.content:
After me and Mushi visited all my classes and meet all of my teachers,we were relaxing inside our dorm.Apparently,it was raining outside,so not much was about to go on.
"Mushi,do you ever wonder about Cacy and Vile?"I asked,while I was unpacking my things.
"Why do you ask that?"Mushi asked,as she walked up beside me.
"I saw them trying to fight each other outside a minute ago.."I said,as I pointed to the window,also walking up to it,with Mushi by my side.We can see Vile and Cacy,running around in circles,with Vile holding a bat in her hands.
"Uh...sometimes."Mushi said,as she dropped a bead of sweat.I returned to my bag and unpacked my 'un-important things',which were basically my clothes and my games.
"So,Mushi...do you have any more friends,you could introduce me to?"I asked,as I placed my bag of DS games aside.Mushi started to tap two fingers together,and started looking somewhere else.
"Well...there is this...on girl...but I don't think,you would like her."She said,as little shy.
"Why?"I asked.
"Well,she is a bit...um..."She started to blush.
"Whoa,whoa,whoa!Hey!"We heard,from outside the door.It grabbed both of our attention
"Whoops,sorry.Sorry."That voice sounded different,like it was different from the crowd.
"Hey!Watch it!"
"Sorry,trying to get to my friend's room.Sorry!"I turned to Mushi,which she crouched down,and covered herself with her wingspan.
"Mushi...who is that?"I asked,trying to open up her wingspan.Soon the door slammed open,and I turned to see an anthro,holding a very big cake.
This anthro...was a Spinda.She had red fur,but her underbelly,face,and stubby legs,were covered in white fur.She was about a foot taller,and her eyes were blue,plus she had two ear coming out the upper part of her head,both have swirls at the center of them.She had wider hips and chest than Mushi,and she also had two long tails of fur,half blue,half red,that were crossed in between her eyes.She had two circular red spots on the swirls of her ears,and a heart shaped one at her bellybutton.
"Hello!Do you know the one called Jake?"She asked.What,did nobody tell her?
"I'm Jake...the only human at this school."I said,as I raised one of my eyebrows.The cake was pink,with a white rim,and was about my height.Now that's creepy...
"Wait,you're Jake?"She set the cake on the ground,and I saw a large series of pony tails,all touching the ground,and covering her tail.How can she hide something that big,behind her back!?
"Yeah...why?"She blinked...next thing I know,her eyes were swirls instead of blue.I shivered the moment her eyes changed.
"AAAWWWWW!!Your so cute!!"She squealed,as she started staggering towards me,with her stubby arms out.
"Um...no thanks,I don't need a hug."I said,as I put my arms out to block her.That didn't seem to work,because she completely glomped me,and I almost hit the wall.Her grip was very tight,and she squeezed me hard against her body.
"Are humans always this cute?"She asked,not letting her grip go.
"Your...grip...too tight!"I squeaked out,which she let go of me,and I fell to the ground,gasping for breath.
"Sorry."She said,as she staggered back over to the cake.I crawled to Mushi's wingspan tent,and peeked inside the hole.
"Mushi!?Who is she?"I said,even though I can't see anything.
"Um...hehe...she's a little...naive,I think."Mushi said,as she opened up her arms,making the wingspan tent go away.
"Her name is Spiny,and...she's a Spinda."
"Yes?"Spiny asked,as she turned to us,with the cake.
"Nothing Spiny...um...what's the cake for?"Mushi asked.
"It's my special cake to Jake!It's a 'congratulations' from me,it had my secret recipe in it!"Spiny exclaimed,as she blinked and her eyes turned normal.
"Special recipe?"I said,looking a little suspicious at the cake.She staggered towards me again,but the cake seem to be unaffected by gravity,and her staggering.
"Yeah!Try it!"She placed the cake down,pulled out a knife from the cake,and cut me a slice,and handed it to me.
"Um...thanks?"I was unsure,as I took the cake,that was not on a platter,and shoved it in my mouth.Hm...it was alright...it was sweet,but isn't that what all cakes tasted like?
"It's great!"I lied...well...technically,but I didn't want to hurt her feeling in anyway.
"Really!?"She said,as her eyes turned to swirls again.
"Yeah...it's great...in fact,it's one of the tastiest thing I ever--"Mushi grabbed my arm,which made me stop my train of thought.
"Uh...Jake,can I see you for a moment?"She said,as she pulled me away from Spiny.
"Does that cake really taste good to you!?"I flinched,from how hard she said that.
"Yeah...It's good,and it doesn't leave a bad after taste.Why?"I asked.
"Really?Her cakes taste like sweaty socks."I gaped my mouth open,which made the chewed up cake bits fall onto the ground.
"Mushi!How can you say something like that!?She's your friend!"I angrily whispered.
"Say something like what!?"Spiny appeared out of nowhere,looking very curiously.
"Spiny,oh hi...um...we were just saying how your cake,taste--"
"AAAGGGHHHH!!"The shout came from outside,which we all looked outside the window,and we could see that Cacy had an umbrella,and was running into a box that said 'Warning:Explosives'.Vile was trying to stop him.
"Cacy and Vile are fighting,again?"Spiny asked.
"Yeah..."Mushi said,looking annoyed at the two knuckleheads.
"So,as I was saying,your cakes tastes really good."I complemented.
"Thank you."She said,as her eye changed into swirls,again.
"Uh...why does your eye do that?"I asked,pointing towards her eyes.
"I'm a Spinda,silly,I can't have normal eyes forever.I have to have swirls as eyes,every now and again.It's just a natural thing,so don't worry."She explained,as she patted my head.
"Which is also natural that you stagger a lot,right?"Mushi asked.
"Right!"
"Anyways..."Mushi turned to me.
"Jake,why don't we..."
1311111.title: Stagger of the best...

13111111.content:
"Jake,why don't we go to the Cafeteria?"She asked.
"Alright,hold on."I said,as I took another slice of cake from the giant cake.Hm...it tasted better every time I took a bite.
"Okay,let's go."I patted my hands together,and walked out the door,which Spiny tumbled after me,and Mushi walked out into the hallways,which me and Spiny followed shortly.
"So...um...Jake.I noticed that bag full of games you got...what games do you have?"Mushi asked.I really didn't expect her to say something like that.
"Well...there's Pokemon...and--"
"Pokemon!?"They both asked,sounding confused as ever.
"Um...yeah,there's this game where it has every Pokemon up to date in it.It also has these little Pokemon entries in them."I explained.
"Really,what does it say about me?"Mushi asked.
"The entry said that Emolga's can store electricity in their membranes..."
"They got it right,so far."Mushi said,as electricity started to stream out of her ears.
"But that is released,when they glide."She started blushing,and covered herself with her wingspan.
"Oh!What does it say about me?"Spiny asked.
"It says that the dots on Spinda's different from each other."
"I already know that..."She tilted over,and staggered over towards a locker,and accidentally banged her head on it.It was hard enough for the locker to be left with a big dent in it.
"I mean about my stumbling!"She said,as her eye turned to normal.
"Your stumbling is used to mess up opponents aim."
"Oooooooohhhhhhh..."She said,as she tumbled over,but got back up quickly.
"So,Mushi..."I started,hoping to change the subject.
"When will we get to the Cafeteria?"
"Right now."She said,as she came to a complete stop,which made me do the same,but Spiny did a half a u-turn,then stopped.
"This is the Cafeteria?"I said,looking through the window of the doors.The first thing I saw was an...uh...
I really couldn't tell.This girl had long blue hair,and ears that jabbed out into the air from it.However,I noticed how her body color was blue,for the upper torso,and she was wearing white pants...I think.She had a bust and hips the size of Mushi's,just a little more,about a head taller,and a plush ball shaped tail,with a jagged tail going right into her tailbone.She seemed a little bit heavy...but not much,just a little.No!She's not fat!!
"Hey,Mushi?Who is that?"I asked,tapping my finger onto the glass.The girl's ears twitched,right before she turned towards the door,with a muffin in her mouth,which I ducked my head.
"That's Azu,or Azurill,if you want to.She's a real nice girl,just don't touch her tail."Mushi explained.
"Um...what would happen,if you do?"
"Well...um...she would go nuts,and...you'll find yourself in the infirmary."She sweat-dropped.
"Did you happen to touch her tail."
"No...she told me."I sweat-dropped.
"Well...I think we can get along together."I looked through the window again,and I saw that her back was turned back to me.I tapped the window again,and she turned around quicker this time,with a confused look,which I ducked again,snickering.
"I really don't think you should do that..."Spiny said,kinda worried.
"Why?"I asked,as I looked and saw that her back was turned again.As soon as I raised my finger...
"Jake!Don't do it."Mushi said,a little hard.
"Fine,I will greet her the right way."I said,as I opened the door,which the girl turned around fully and snapped a bone in half,with her mouth.
"Were you the one ticking me off?"She said,intimidatingly.I stopped in my tracks when she said that.I could she that she had long,but stubby blue arms.Her blue eyes,didn't seem to calm down the situation.
"Whoa...sorry about that,I was just trying to have a little fun and--"She stopped up,angrily,and snorted.I could see that she was somehow standing on Digitigrade legs,but stubby feet and toes.
"Um...sorry,I just wanted to know you a little more."I said,as little shy.
"Azu,please listen to him.He's likes to have fun,trust me."Mushi said,walking up to my side.Spiny tumbled forward,however.
"Your a friend of Mushi!?Oh!Why didn't you say,so?"Azu said,more calming than before.She then walked up to me,and reached out her hand.I can lightly see a roll of fat on her arm.
"Um...my name is Jake,and why are you so...plushy?"I asked,as I started to feel her arm,which she pulled it back.
"I'm not fat!!I have--wait...what did you say?"
"I said plushy...you know,like a cute pillow like ani--MAL!!"She pulled me into a tight hug,almost as tight as Spiny's.
"Awwwww...it's like you know just what to say!"She squealed,letting me go.
"By the way,your a human,right?Are humans always this cute?"She started to mess up my hair,even though it was already messy.
"That's the same question I asked!"Spiny said.
"Hey!Give that back!!"We all heard.
"Make me!!"I turned towards the door,and I saw Cactine quickly running past the doors,holding a green bag,and his hat,somehow.Soon,Vile came running in his direction,with an umbrella in her stubby arms.
"Oh man.Azu,can give Jake the full tour?"Mushi quickly asked,which I started to shake my head in response.
"Sure!It'll be my pleasure."Azu said,as she patted my head.
"Good,come on Spiny."Mushi quickly dashed out the door,which Spiny ran into a wall,and then ran out the doors.I felt like my hair spiked up,as Azu tapped me on the shoulder.
"So,Jake.Tell me about yourself."She then started to walk out of the door,which I followed behind her.
"Well,I wanna know about you.What were you saying before?About you having something?"
"Oh yeah.You see I have this ability called thick-fat,which is why i'm so pudgy."She started poking at her tiny roll of fat on her stomach.
"Your not,really that pudgy.Your just soft.See?"I said,as I carefully started to poke her stomach.She started to giggle.
"Your a very good kid.Probably,the first one who didn't judge me,for my weight."I raised an eyebrow.
"Wait...you mean..."
"Yeah,Mushi and Spiny said I was fat at first sight,but they didn't mind at all."
"Wow,that's brutal.By the way,where are we going?"I asked,as I started to look around,seeing things I haven't seen before.
"We're going to see Tops!"
"Who's Tops?"
"He's right over there."She pointed down the hall,and I saw...
13111111.title: Big plushy...

131111111.content:
WOW!!
It was a Hitmontop,playing around with his tail,looking bored as ever.He was wearing pants that covered his legs,though.He also seemed to be an inch taller than me.
"WOW!A Hitmontop!"I yelled,which made the Hitmontop drop his tail,which is sagged behind him.
"Oh,hey!Hello!"Tops said,as he ran down the hall,and made a screeching halt in front of me.
"You must be the new student,that beat my friend,nice to meat you."He said,as he held out his hand.
"Really?Zan is your friend?I thought that Sneasel girl was."I said,as I shaked his hand.
"That's the same thing I thought."Azu said,as she shrugged her shoulders.
"Dude,you were awesome by the way.How did you do that slide tackle?"He asked.
"Um...I play to many video games."I said,as I shrugged my shoulders.
"Well,you should teach me how to do that,alright?"Tops gave me a pat on the back,which was a little harsh,probably because he didn't know his strength.
"By the way,did she catch you touching her tail?"He whispered,which made Azu look at us curiously.
"No,why?"I whispered back.
"She knows iron tail.You can touch her tail,just don't do it to harshly.Trust me,I did it before."
"Are you two talking about my tail!?"She said,as little madly,as she held her tail like a doll,in defense.
"No,not really."Tops said,backing away.
"Actually,yes.May I feel it?"I asked,hoping she wouldn't hit me with it.At first she looked confused at me,and then she looked defensive.
"No!"She said,as she tried to hide the tail behind her back.Tops looked at me,like I was crazy.
"Okay,so dude.Did you get the full tour of the school yet?"
"No,she was just showing me around."I pointed to Azu and she smiled.
"Alright,just don't touch her tail,dude."He said,which Azu pulled her tail out,and it hardered into what looks like iron,and started swinging it in a circular motion,which Tops sweat-dropped,and started to run down another hallway.
"Finally...shall we continue with our tour?"She asked,as her tail turned back to normal.
"Alright...just be nice,okay?"
"Don't worry,you don't need to worry about a thing."

It took us an hour to get a full tour of the school.Apparently,I ran into the Puny sisters again,but their brother shot them with tranquilizer darts...again.After that me and Azu caught up with Mushi again,which we started to talk more about the game I was mentioning.
"What does it say about me?"Azu asked,with a little excitement.Right now,we were in Mushi's dorm...or our dorm...I don't know...I think I am too nice about things.
"Let's see...uh..."I was scrolling through the game's-Pokemon Black-Pokedex,which I soon got to Azumarill's info.
"Here it is...it says that Azumarills can spend an entire day water,since they can inhale and store large volumes of air."I said.
"Really!?So that's why I keep beating Tops in underwater contests."Azu said,as she rubbed the back of her head.
"By the way,Jake.Does it say anything about Cacturnes and Vileplumes?"Mushi asked,as she tried to get a closer look at my DS screen.
"Um...Vileplumes are mentioned in a really bad way,but for Cacturnes...Cacturnes live in deserts and sleep through the day to retain moisture...but at night,they seek out prey...and they take their time,until they can't move no more."Azu and Mushi both shivered when I said all of that.
"Well...that's more worse than a Vileplume,right?"Azu said,kinda shivering.I quickly closed my DS.
"I really don't wanna set a bad example for Vile...speaking of which..."I turned and looked out the window,which I could see the two were arguing over something,and it was still raining.
"Why can they stay out there and not be drenched by the rain?"They were completely clean,somehow.They didn't look wet at all.
"They're grass types.Cactine has water absorb,and the petals Vile has acts like an umbrella."Mushi explained.Soon their was a knock on the door,which I flinched in response.
"I got it."Mushi walked up to the door,and she opened it,which I quickly saw...
131111111.title: More than meets the eye...

1311111111.content:
I did a peep-squeak yelp,when I saw Zan...but why was she with Tops,again?Oh right...they're friends.
"Oh...h-hi,guys."Mushi shivered,still holding the door open.
"Yeah,yeah...Jake,can we talk to you for a minute?"Zan asked.I turned to Tops,and he just shrugged his shoulders.
"Sure..."Azu said,as she started to push me towards the door with her tail.I did a harsh gulp,right before her tail pushed me out of the door.
"Alright,what do you wanna talk about?"I asked,turning towards Zan.
"This is private."She said,as she grabbed the doorknob and slammed the door.My eyes widened,thinking she may try to murder me,so I tired to hide behind Tops,out of fear.
"Don't worry,dude,she's not going to kill you.Trust me."Tops said,stepping aside.I was then grabbed by my hoodie collar,and I was staring into the face of Zan.
"Look,kid..."She put me down,so my feet were touching the floor and she let go of my hoodie.
"Lucane told me to give you this,as a congratulation gift,on beating me."Zan reached into her tail,and pulled out a gold ribbon,that said 'Champion' on it.
"Wha?"I said,really confused.I only beat one person...oh wait,the best fighter in the school...to be more specific.
"You're one of the best fighters now,dude.You beat my best friend,and changed her record to 49-1.Mrs.Lucane,not only saw a different side of you,but she also thought you were something else,due to the fact that you were the first one to beat her on the first try."Tops explained.
"Really...wow."I scratched my head.I didn't know that a simple win,could have major effects on everyone on this school.
"So...go ahead,take it."She didn't seem happy,nor sad,nor angry,when she held the ribbon close to me.Even though is looked pretty nice...I thought this may be a good opportunity to make a stable friendship with Zan.
"Look...it's pretty nice...but you can have it,if you want."I said,as I pushed the ribbon closer to Zan.
"What!?"Both Zan and Tops said.
"What do you mean I can have it!?What?You are afraid of gold or something!?"Zan said,angrily.I did a quick deep breath.
"Zan,my record is 1-0...your record is only 49-1.It wouldn't matter,if you lost one time,your still the best in fighter in the school in my book.So really,it belongs to you,not me."
"Really!?"She seemed really excited,but then she tried to look cool,like it didn't happen.
"Really?Thanks,kid."Me and Tops chuckled a little.
"Yeah,right Zan.We know your excited to get a ribbon."Tops said,smiling.
"I know!See ya!"She ran past us at lightning speed,creating a quick wind that blew across the hallway,behind us.I couldn't help it,but I looked at the clock.7:59.
"Anyways,Jake,your really something else.You gave up a good ribbon...uh...for what now?"Tops asked.
"So your girlfriend won't kill me the next time we have a match,if we ever.By the way,that Sneasel girl...where is she?"I asked.
"What you mean Snitch?She started arguing about is giving you the ribbon,so we tied her up and put her in this closet,here."Tops opened a closet,which I looked into to see Snitch,all tied up in chains,had tape over her mouth and ready to yell angrily.An angry vein appeared on her head,when she looked at me,next thing I know,I am hearing something about a ribbon.I walked up beside her,and then she started to get real jumpy.
"Look,if your wondering about the ribbon,I didn't take it.Instead,I gave it Zan,so you can calm down now."I started undoing the rope,which she looked at me in a confused manner.She then ripped the tape off of her mouth,and smiled at me.
"Really!?Wow,your really something,Jake."She said,as she ran down the hallway,in the same way Zan ran.
"Hm...guess I better go,too.See ya!"Tops ran down the hall,and turned to corner,almost hitting the wall.I walked back to Mushi's dorm,and opened the door,seeing Mushi laying on the floor,and Azu on Mushi's bed,reading a book.They both looked at me at the same time.
"So,how did it go?"Azu asked,me as she put the book down.
"Zan delivered a gold ribbon to me,but I turned it down,and gave it back to her."
"Really!?You turned down a gold ribbon?"Mushi asked,looking really surprised.
"You are a strange kid,Jake."Azu said,as she started walking to the door.
"Speaking of which,I need to get to bed.See you tomorrow."I had to duck,so her tail wouldn't hit my head,and I waited until it got outside of the door,before closing it.
"Maybe we should get to bed,too."I suggested,as I yawned.Mushi yawned,too.
"Yeah,we should."Mushi jumped into her bed,and pulled the covered over her shoulder.I did the same.
"Goodnight,Jake."Mushi said,before turning out the lights.
"Goodnight."
"Wat da funk jon boi!"We both heard,making both of us chuckled,before falling asleep.

Uh...by the way...what kind of dream was I having?
1311111111.title: The boy that's something else...

13111111111.content:
(http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4rsN4NBna... Listen to that while you read this.It may set the mood.Also,anything that happens here is not real.)
"Ugh...oh man...what happened?"I asked myself,as I woke up...in a vast black space,with clouds scattered about.
"Where am I?"
"Speak for yourself,dude."I turned to beside me,and then I saw...MYSELF!?!I'm not kidding,I am looking at myself!
"Whoa!Who are you!?"I asked,pointing a finger accusingly.
"I don't know,but--"He stopped in his tracks,when we both heard a call for help.
"Help,please!Anybody,somebody,please!Somebody do something!"For some odd reason,it sounded like Azu.
"Azu!?Where are you?"I asked.
"Over your head!"We both looked up to see a ball shaped cloud,with Azu's silhouette in it.She looked really panicked.
"Don't worry Mushi.I got it."The clone said,as he poked the cloud with his finger and it popped like a regular balloon,which Azu fell to the ground,with a thud.She looked very confused,when she quickly looked at me,and then at my clone,and then back to me.
"Wha--who--Jake?And Jake?Which one's the real one?"She asked,scratching her ears.
"I am."I said.
"He is."My clone said,which me and Azu gave a confused look at him.
"What?Even I don't know who I am."He shrugged his shoulders.
"Anyways...Azu do you know,how you got here?"I asked.
"No...all I remember is being knocked out by something,next thing I know,I am here in this so called dreamland."She said,looking around.
"Do you know,where the others are?"
"Yes.While I was floating in the balloon,I saw Mushi shoved into another cloud down there."She pointed downwards,which me and the clone looked through the cloud,to see other clouds,however,one cloud caught my eye,which was making a constant noise,and I could see kicks and struggles coming from it.
"Mmmmph!Mmmph-mmph!"I heard.It sounded a lot like Mushi,which I pulled myself through the clouds and landed on the one below it,which I then saw Mushi's cloud float over my head.
"Mushi?Can you hear me?"I asked.
"Mm-mmph?Mmph!!Mmmph-mmmph!!"She yelled.Azu landed beside me,on her face.
"Don't worry,I got it."I poked,the cloud,which popped out Mushi,and she landed on her bottom.
"Thanks.Now what in the world is going on here!?"Mushi yelled,angrily.
"How am I suppose to know?I woke up here,too!"I replied.
"Same with me!What happened to my bed!?"Azu asked.Instantly,the clouds changed...into water,and the ground beneath us also turned into water.Somehow,we were floating above it.
"You just had to say your bed,Azu."Mushi said,in a annoyed tone.
"Why?What's her bed like?"I asked,out of curiosity...right before gravity acted upon us,and we fell into the water.I however,quickly swam back up to get air,gasping for it.
"Mushi?Azu?Are you alright?"I asked,getting no response.It was all quiet,from me shivering in fear,right before the water currents started acting up,and I found myself swirling in a large circular path.
"Whoa,whoa,whoa!!"I yelled,as I was getting closer to the center,but as I was swirling,I saw something in the center of the vortex,causing it.It was Spiny,spinning around in a circle!
"Weeeeeeeee!This is fun!"She said,as she continued spinning around.
"Spiny!Stop spinning before,I am sucked i--"Too late.I already got sucked in and pushed downwards...right until my back hit a solid wall.I jumped from the wall,and turned to see a building...an unknown building.I don't remember seeing this building...but that quickly faded,when two black claws ripped through the center!
"Why is everything happening so fast?"I asked,myself,right before the claws separated the building,exposing the face...of a really huge Zan!She was looking at me with a very evil grin!
"Here's Zanny!"She joked,as she lifted up her paw,and slammed it down on top of me,which for some odd reason,I was doing quite well at holding the paw up,but I couldn't hold out for long.
"Oh crud!"I screamed,as my face was getting closer to the ground with each passing second,but before my hair touched the ground,I was tackled out of the way,which the paw hit the ground,and created a crater on the ground.
"Thanks."I said,as I looked up to see that Mushi was my savior.
"No problem.You would have done the same for me."She said.
"Your little brats!"Zan said,as she stepped out from the building,showing that she was about 30ft tall,and her shadow was looming over us!Me and Mushi hugged each other in fear.
"We're going to die aren't we?"I asked,shivering like mad.Zan lifted up her foot,and was about to bring it down on us.
"Goodbye,Jake.I'll remember you."Mushi said,as she buried her head on my shoulder.
"No!"We both heard,which we saw Tops tackle Zan to the ground,which created a blast of wind,that would have knocked us into the air,if we didn't hold onto each other.
"AAAGGGGHHHH!!I'm getting out of here!"
"Wait for me!!"Vile and Cactine both ran past us,in a panicked motion.
"Dudes!We need to get out of here,pronto!"Max said,as he ran up beside us.Me and Mushi were still hugging each other out of fear.Either that,or Mushi wouldn't let go.
"Wait,hold on!Where are we,anyways!?"I asked,which then Snitch and the Puny sisters ran past us.
"Somebody hold me!!"We heard,as Azu ran past us.
"I told you it was a bad idea!"A Whimsicott yelled,as it ran by us.
"Your the one who came up with the idea in the first place!"A Cherrim yelled,in it's sunny day form.
"No time!Just run!"Max said,as he picked us up,with his stubby arms.

After about three minutes of running,I found myself in a dark place...with nothing in sight.Somehow,I still see my whole body in this pitch-black place.
"Hello?"I asked,which then a bright,blinding light shined right into my face,and I couldn't see anything.

What happened next?
13111111111.title: A strange dream...

131111111111.content:
I was shocked awake by my dream,what with all the craziness happening in just a few seconds...or so.I rubbed my head in confusion...how did all of that seem really real?Anyways,it was just a dream,so it wasn't real,no matter how real it felt.Luckily,I wasn't much of a screamer,so I didn't yell when I was shocked awake,so I didn't wake up Mushi.I got out of my bed,and changed my clothes...which were the same clothes I just took off.Yeah,go figure,I have like 20 pairs of the same clothes.I looked at the clock... 6:59.Mushi told me that classes don't start until 7:40.Why am I such an early bird?I opened the door,and closed it back,simply heading to the bathrooms,to just wash my hair.After that I went to my first class.Mushi said that I have certain classes each day.Today was Algebra,earth science,world history,and P.E. in that specific order.I finally got to the classroom,which before I even touch the door,I heard something...like a ruler banged on top of somebody's head,and it sounded like it broke too.
"Ow,i'm telling my daddy."A toddler like voice said.It sounded like it was joking,too.
"You two are in so much trouble after school today!NOW GET OUT!!"I heard,which soon the door flung open and out came running a Whimsicott,and a Cherrim,in his sunny day form,both,however,laughing.Wait a minute,they looked very familiar from my dream,but that was just a coincidence.
"Mom,maybe you shouldn't go so hard on them,sometimes."Another voice said.It sounded sweet,and kind.
"And sometimes I should.I mean,why would they think it was funny to doodle all over the board?"
"They are dumb like that mom,and you know it.Not to mention that this is the 5th ruler you broke on their heads."
"Yeah,I know,but that is how they should be taught to not doodle on people's boards."I finally look in the classroom,to see two normal Lilligants,one was smaller,and one was bigger,just about a foot taller.
"Um...excuse me."I said,a little shy,which caught the attention of the two.
"Oh hi!Your the new guy I meet the other day!Nice to meet you...again.Why are you so early?"The taller one asked.Her name was Mily,I remember from yesterday.
"I'm an early bird...most of the time."I started to rub the back of my head.
"Well,Jake,since your an early bird,this is my daughter,Lily."Mily pointed to the smaller one,and she waved a me.
"Hello...um,by the way,who were those two that just ran out of this room?"I couldn't help,but think of those two.
"Two idiots,who have the worse grades out of all the students in the school."Lily said,as she turned towards the board and started erasing all of the doodles.The doodles consisted nothing of Whimsicotts and Cherrims,all of them doing something random.
"Uh...is that your assistant?"I asked,as I pointed towards Lily.
"No,just my 12-year-old daughter."
"12?Then,why is she in middle school?"
"She already graduated,when she was 10."I froze in place,when I heard that.She must be very smart.
"So,just get comfy.Classes don't start until 7:40."
"Alright."I reached towards my shoulder...not feeling backpack strap on it.
"Um...I forgot my bag in my dorm,I will be right back."I dashed out of the class and quickly turning the corner,stopping in my tracks as soon as I saw the two from before,spray painting the walls.
"~Doodle,doodle all day!Doodle,doodle every way!~"The Whimsicott,as he was spray painting the walls,and not looking at what he was doing.
"Dude,that was so 1337!You should try chorus!"The Cherrim said,doing the same thing the Whimsicott was doing.I couldn't help myself,but to try to stop them.
"Hey!"I yelled,but somehow in a soft manner.They both turned to me,vanished...just completely vanish.It made a little 'pop' sound as they did so.I walked over the spray cans they were just holding,and then I looked at the walls they spray painted,which I saw a large drawing.It had the two guys,and Zan,who looked like a monster in this drawing.Why was she monster looking?What happened to make them draw this?I know,I will feel bad for this,but I put the tiny spray can in my pocket and started heading off to Mushi's dorm.

After explaining what happened to the walls,the classes has started I was sitting in my assigned seat,right behind Zan.I still couldn't help to think...why did the spray paint Zan as a monster.My curiosity spiked,which I finally did a light tug at Zan's tail,which caught her attention.
"Yeah?"She whispered,in response.
"Zan,there are these two dudes,one's a Whimsicott and one's a Cherrim.They spray painted a wall,with you being the monster,and they're carrying sticks to try to fend you off.Do you know those two,by any chance?"I asked.
"Yes...ahh...good memories.Chum and Bum were victims of my record,and during the match,I sliced off Chum's cotton,and Bum's flowers."She said,smiling at all of it.I felt very nervous.
"So,is that why they hate you?"
"Yeah,pretty much.They were dumb anyways,besides,they thought sticks were the best line of defense against me,not to mention that they are--"An explosion happened outside the classroom,which disrupted Mily's teaching.
"CALL AN AMBULANCE!OH DEAR KARMA,I'M ON FIRE!GAAAHHH,I'M SLOWLY MELTING AWAY!I'M OKAY WITH THE CRISP,BUT THE FIRE!AAAAGGGGHHHHH!I BROKE PEOPLE'S HEARTS THE WAY THIS THING BROKE MY STERNUM!"We all heard,which I saw Zan rest her head on her hands,and look annoyed.
"They are a bunch of idiots."

After the next two classes,I finally gotten to the lunch room,with Mushi and Spiny.Luckily,we have the same lunch schedule,so I felt pretty safe...a little.
"So,Mushi.How's the food here?"I asked,hoping she didn't respond badly.
"It's alright.They serve almost anything here.You name it,and they serve it."Mushi replied,opening the doors to the Cafeteria.I saw many kinds of Pokemon,both anthro and normal alike,which I was amazed.The Cafeteria was quiet large,too.
"Alright,I am guessing those are the lunch lines over there?"I asked,as I saw a least three lines,going into three different doors.
"Yeah,you guess it."Spiny said,as she tripped forward.I walked up to the lines,and as I was,I saw Azu at a table,with a soda in front of her.Finally I got up to the line,which wasn't that long until I got to this tray thing,and then I saw Max who was eating a sandwich of some sort,and he was on a plate.
"Max,what are you doing?"I asked,which caught his attention.
"Oh!Hello.I got hungry,so I decided to eat some sandwiches."He said,as he shoved a piece of bread in his mouth.
"MAXWELL!!"We both squinted,and I slowly turned to see...
131111111111.title: Class room of destruction...

1311111111111.content:
When I looked at the Raichu girl,I couldn't believe my eyes.
For some odd reason,she still looked like a teenager,even if she was a mom.She had wide chests,and breasts,but that was just about it.Her tail wasn't stubby,like natural Raichu would have,and she had a long ponytail,that appeared between her ears,and then curved down her back,with a scruff of it,in a triangle shape,on her forehead.She was also wearing a pink chef's apron,which said 'kiss the cook'.For some odd reason,the black part of a Raichu's arms,looked more like gloves that tightly hugged her hands.She looked really ticked,and I could see how sharp her teeth were,which made me really nervous.
"Oh...ha...h-hi mom."Max tried to say,as he looked even scared of his mom.When she started to stomp towards,Maxwell started to crawl backwards,until his mom picked him up by his tail.
"How many times do I have to tell you to not eat all the sandwiches at once!?"She yelled,right in Max's ear.
"Sorry,mom.I just got hungry and--"Max's mom shoved an apple in his mouth,cutting him off.
"Quiet!I don't want to hear it!When your last class is over--Oh just get out of my SIGHT!!"As soon as she said sight,she threw,Max out the door,which I had to lean to the side to dodge.When I look out the door,I could see Max in a garbage can,with swirly eyes.
"Oh,hi.You must be the new student."I turned around and nearly screamed,when I saw Max's mom.She was about a foot taller than me,too,which really didn't make me less nervous.Her calm voice did nothing either.
"My name is Clara,Max's mom.I heard my two daughters are in love with you."She said,as she held out her hand.
"Um...hi,my name is Jake,and I heard that they serve almost anything here."I said,as I wiped a hand across my hair.In fact,I could hear dishes and junk being put away and shifted around.
"Of course!What would you like?"She asked,as her tail started wagging.
"Just a simple peanut butter on bread,please."She gave me a confused look,which her tail sagged against the ground.
"It that all?"She asked,sounding a little disappointed.
"Yeah.I'm not really much of an ea--"
"Okay!"She dashed behind a corner,and came back with a slice of bread,with peanut butter on it.There wasn't a single crumb on the plate.
"Um...thanks."I said,which I took the bread off the plate,and took a bite from it.
"Your welcome.See ya."She dashed around the corner and didn't come back.
"Okay...I see where the Puny sisters get their speed from."

After lunch I finally got to the last class of the day,which by coincidence,everyone I know had that class.There were also,many mats placed across the gym floor.
"So,dude.How was the first day of school?"Tops asked.Right now,we were all in a sideways line.
"It's alright.A little frightening though."I said.
"Oh?Why's that?"Vile asked.She seemed less evil,even with her petals making the shadow over her face.
"Well,Max's mom is a bit scary when she is mad."I said,which the two made a confused look,and I hung my head over.
"Oh,right.I'll mention later."Soon the teacher walked up,which was a Mienshao.
"Alright,class.Today is a special day.You guys are going to go head-to-head!"
"I'm out!"The cherrim said,or Bum as they call him,as he ran towards the benches and planted himself there.
"You and me,Vile!"Cactine said,ready to fight at any moment.
"Your on!"Vile and Cactine ran off.Tops and Zan partnered up,and Max took Chum,which left only me and Mushi.
"Oh man."We both said,as we started to blush out of embarrassment.
"Looks like we got no choice."I said,as I rubbed the back of my head.
"Yeah,um...I guess...so."She said,blushing even more than me.
"Well,don't just sit around slackers!Get over there!"The Mienshao quickly said,as she pushed me and Mushi towards a mat.I took one side,and Mushi took the other.Soon there was a beeping noise,which I flinched at the noise.
"What's that?"I asked.
"It's the timer...b-before..."She didn't finish,but instead looked at her feet instead.Soon there was a loud ding,which I saw that everyone instantly starting sparring against each other.Everyone...except me and Mushi,which we soon found each other,staring into each others eyes,and fiddling with our fingers.We both stood still,frozen,and blushing.I couldn't help,but think...what is she thinking?Was she thinking the same thing?Or was she just as surprised as me?Either way,she was blushing,and I could already tell the answer to all of my questions.I soon felt my heart raising,and hitting the roof,or so I thought.What was this,feeling?
"Hey,kid.Kid!"I soon snapped back into reality,seeing that I was staring into the eyes of our Gym teacher.
"You're called to the medic kid."She said,pointing over my head,towards the doors.
"What?But,i'm fine!"I said,feeling my face,and feeling no scratches.
"Don't blame me.I'm not the one that called you."After that,I left the gym,which I only took a few steps towards the infirmary,before I was tripped from behind,and rushed towards the,Cafeteria instead.
"Wait,what?"I turned to see Ping and Ming,and that I was sitting on a tiny ambulance,that they were controlling.
"Oh great.Now what!?"I yelled,trying to hang on,for we were going at a real fast pace.
"Hello,cutie."Ping said,as she jumped on my lap.
"What's going on now!And why aren't we going the the infirmary!?"I asked.
"Well,since you didn't even budge a muscle during your fight,we decided that you needed to eat more!"Ming explained,as she also jumped onto my lap.
"I'm fine!Really!"
"You are?"
"Yes!I don't eat a lot,because I don't get hungry that often...and who's controlling this thing?"I asked,which a long silence occurred,right before the truck started spiraling out of control.
"Oh my gosh!Hold me!"Ping said,as she started to hug my body.
"Holy cow!"As I jumped off the tiny ambulance,and my the world was spinning for a few seconds,right before the ambulance crashed into the wall,which I pushed off Ping.
"Uh...wasn't Ming on that thing?"I asked,a little worried about her.Ming soon jumped out of the rubble,looking really ticked.
"Oh,yeah.Leave me to death while you have the cutie to yourself!"Ming yelled,angrily,mostly towards Ping.
"Don't blame me.I was scared an--"Before she could even finish,tape was stuck all over her mouth.
"Doesn't matter.Bye."Ming groaned,as she pulled Ping's tail,which Ping started to scratch the floor with her stubby arms.
"Okay..."After I said that,the bell rung,which meant the end of the day.

So then I headed off towards Mushi's dorm...
1311111111111.title: Misleading/Fight...of nothing/toy crash...

13111111111111.content:
After about three minutes of walking,I got to Mushi's dorm,which I took a deep breath,before twisting the doorknob and opening the door.I was expecting Mushi to be here,but she wasn't which I sighed out of relief.
"-Hm...wonder where Mushi is.-"I thought,as I sat down on my bed,laying back and looking at the ceiling.I sighed again,but this time out of boredom.Some things rattle in my head,like the fight,and those two guys named Chum and Bum.Why did they run,when I tried to introduce myself?Anyways,after about 10 minutes,I got really bored,and started to play my DS.I had already beaten the game,but I can at least play online and stuff.Right,when I was about to put my DS down and explore the school,the intercom beeped,which I turned all my attention to the little circle on top of the roof.
"Hello,Pokey High school dudes,and ladies,and welcome to another segment of Q and A,number 4."I raised one of my eyebrows.It sounded like Chum the Whimsicott saying all that stuff.
"This time I have Bum with me in the background,say hi dude."
"Hi!"Bum the sunny form Cherrim sounded a little faint
"That was Bum who said that.Now for the first question."How is your girlfriend?".Well she's pretty and she's part nymph...o...nympho."
"She's a fairy!"
"Yes,she's a fairy.Haha!"
"That's what nymphs are!They're Fairies!"
"Okay,next question...comment removed,comment removed,comment removed...Wow..."
"Oh,Wow.That's a great question!"I did a light chuckle,and I heard many Pokemon laughing outside the door.
"Anyways...scrolling up..."Will you answer this comment?"Haha...no...oh crap!"
"Wow,what a meanie...Oh cr--dang it!"
"Alright,next question..."Do you put awesome sauce on all your food?".Uh...noooooa..."
"Yes...all the time."
"Yes,in fact I order french fries in the Cafeteria then put garbage in it then shake it up."
"HA!Oh...wow,Hahahahahah!Oh god,hahahahaaaaahahaha..."
"Alright...boop-be-boop-be-boop...alright,um..."How are you so funny?"Well,it's basically just being yourself,when you try be entertaining."
"But,remember the last time I tried to do a Q and A and got censored out?"
"Wait,what?"
"Well,when I tried to do a Q and A on one of our videos...well not videos,but you know what I mean,I tried being myself.I mean I was all like,"Hey,guys,I made a Q and A",and then people started flipping burgers!I mean it-it was like a chorus saying,"*Mike screech*NO!"
"Heh,heh...yeah."Just then Mushi entered the dorm all wide-eyed.
"Uh...is this what normally happens everyday?"I asked,pointing to the little circle on the roof.
"Yes."She said,sweat-dropping.
"Do you know how long it last?"
"As long as it takes them."Mushi said,as she sat on her bed.
"Alright...so...uh..."If you read this comment then you are willingly marring me."Oh god,NO!"
"Then they lived happily ever after!"
"Yeah,then came the divorce."
"And then I'm left with all the bills...wait..."I laughed about how silly the two are,but Mushi seemed unamused.
"Okay,next question..."Can I have a hug?"Yeah,you can...just get a plane ticket and fly all the way to Russia."
"Aw..."
"I'm not paying $300,to fly to wherever you are,and give you a hug."
"Well,it could be worth the trip."
"Anyways...let's see,"What happened to the cartoons you use to draw?"Pfft...that's long gone."
"Yeah...it went pretty well,but then like mass murder happened,and then everything stopped!"
"Yeah,we all got on it for like a month,and then it got boring."
"It was like "Oh my god we want another animation!",then next thing other people are like"Shut up,no we don't!""
"Alright...why does this one have 41 likes on it?"Is the cotton on your back real or fake?"Pfft...of course the answer is,yes."Good thing he sounded sarcastic.
"Yes...no...eh,I don't know."
"Well,that's it for the questions,I scrolled through all of them,and that's it.So...see next time for the next Q and A."
"Boop!"There was a quick short beep before the intercom went off.
"Okay,Mushi.How can you not find that funny?"I asked,still slightly laughing.
"I don't think,they should be doing that in a school."Mushi said.
"Why not?"
"Well,first of all...this is a boarding school for Pokemon.Second,it seems a little bad for the school reputation."
"But don't they have someone to stop them,if they go too far?"
"Yeah...but--"
"Then relax,Mushi.There's nothing to be afraid of.Just get a good laugh once in a while."
"Yeah,but,I still think it's bad for the school's reputation."
"You can think whatever you want to Mushi.It's fine with me."
"Yeah...I suppose."She went to her dresser,and pulled it open,taking out a blue swim piece.
"Um...what's with the swimsuit?"I asked,as I started looking through my bags for my swim shorts.
"They didn't show you the pool?"She asked,turning around confused.
"What pool?"
"Oh man...well,just follow me."She said,exiting the door,which I quickly found my swim shorts and took off after Mushi,closing the door behind me.
13111111111111.title: Two idiots...double the fun...

choices: During the time of the pool...
131111111111111.content:
After minutes of walking,me and Mushi finally got to the pool,which I have to say was incredibly large.It was about 20ft wide and 30ft long.There were also many swimming types swimming about,having fun and messing around with each other.One caught my attention,which it was Azu,laying on her stomach,with someone sitting on her butt.I can also see that her white pants was actually her body color.It was awfully small,about the size of both my palms,but it's tail was bigger than itself.She had stubby arms and legs,black eyes,large blue ears,and white cheeks.It seemed very worried,for it was shivering,and constantly looking back and forward.
"Will you quit shaking,Toots!?Your making my body jiggle."Azu said,as a vein appeared on her head.
"B-b-but I d-d-don't want us t-to get in t-trouble,plus I-I am not a good swimmer."The little blue mouse said,as it looked down at the water.It had a feminine touch in her voice.
"Really?Why don't you try?"Azu then slowly made her body stand upwards,which the tiny mouse started to climb up Azu's back,and planted herself onto her head.
"Pull up,pull up!"She screamed,tugging on Azu's ears like crazy.Azu just seemed to laugh at Toots.They greatly reminded me and my sister.
"Hey,Azu!How's it going?"I greeted,waving over to them.Azu looked over to me and waved back.
"Hello,Jake!Nice meeting you here."She said.I quickly entered the pool,which Mushi followed soon.
"Who's the girl on top of your head?Never seen her before."Mushi said,pointing to Toots on top of her head.
"Oh...her...yeah,she's my sister.A little scarey cat.I'm suppose to watch her for the year."Azu said,rolling her eyes.
"I'm not afraid...I am n-n-not a w-w-water type j-just yet."Toots said,which Azu started to slowly lower her body,which Toots started to tug on Azu's ears harder than before.Mushi pulled Toots off of Azu's head,which Toots buried her head into her bust.Mushi started to blush madly.
"See,what I mean?"
"I can see that she's very afraid.Maybe you could be the inspiration to conquering her fears?"I asked,tilting my head.
"Are you kidding?Your joking right?She's too jumpy,I can't even get a hold of her when she gets scared!"Azu exclaimed.
"Um...a little help?"Me and Azu turned to Mushi,which she had Toot's just crawl down her swimsuit top.Mushi seemed to surprised about this,for she was shivering and her eyes were twitching.Me and Azu sighed,as she pulled out Toots by her tail.
"You just need to stay with me..."Azu then placed Toots back on her head.
"Come on,let's play already!"Azu then swam incredibly fast,towards a group of water types.
"Hey,wait for me!Come on,Mushi."I said,swimming slowly,while pulling Mushi's body with me.
131111111111111.title: Little sister,big fears...

1311111111111111.content:
After the time in the pool,me and Mushi were resting after the lots of fun we had,in her dorm.I especially had fun,especially when I grabbed onto the many fins and legs of Pokemon that were swimming about.However,I tried to do the same with Azu's tail,but that failed,and I almost got hit in the head with an iron tail from her.
"I have to admit,Jake,you sure do know how to have a lot of fun."Mushi said,taking another bite from her piece of cake.She had gotten use to the cake's taste,which I find natural.
"Yeah,except the part where I almost got hit by Azu's tail."I said,rubbing the back of my head.
"Didn't I tell you not to touch her tail?"
"Sorry,I kinda got in the moment."
"It's alright,she forgives anyone that says sorry."
"Really?That's a load off of my mind..."I then started to think about how Principal D transformed from a human to a Pokemon,with some weird thing on his wrist.
"...by the way,do you have some weird device that makes you turn into a human like form shape?"Mushi turned to me,blushing.
"Um...why yes...hold on..."She said,slowly reaching for something under her robe.She had a disgusted look,and took a deep breath,right before I heard a click and then she turned blurry,but then normal,but with a human like figure,and then taking a gasp of air.
In her human form,she has pale skin color,same color eyes,black hair with two circular pieces on top,and she had a black robe that covered her whole body,and her arms.Her figure was the same,but that was hard to tell because of the saggy robe.
"Wow,Mushi.You look like your from a Japanese culture."I said,still checking out her body.She blushed even more harsh,which made me worry about her face.
"I am from a Japanese culture."She said,which made me wide-eyed.
"Oh...sorry,if I offended you in anyway...and why did you take a breath of air?"
"It's because it feels weird,for once,I don't have my buck teeth anymore!Second,uh...it just things change when i'm in human form,especially..."She didn't finish,but instead looked down towards her bust.
"Who's next!?I just drank some soda,I got a broom,and i'm ready to kick some butt!"That sounded like Cactine from outside the dorm.
"Cactine,but the broom down and get into your Pokemon form!"That was Vile,I can tell.
"Please?Pretty please?"Weird...I didn't expect Spiny to get into this.I quickly ran towards the door,opening it as I grabbed the handle,and quickly seeing Cactine with a broom on one side,Spine and Vile on the other.All of them had their human forms
Cactine had white skin color,a Cacturne like suit and a Cacturne hat,and was bare feet.That grassy hair behind his back was more curved.Vile had pale skin,a Vileplume-like hat,and a purple overall.Her hat still made that shadow over her face.Spiny had a red and white stripped,long sleeved shirt,white pants,two swirls on the sides of her head,and blue eyes.Cactine turned to me,and instantly started to smile evilly.
"Yo Jake,check this out!"He said,as he started to twirl the broom with one had.The broom was quite large,and it almost hit me in the head.
"Hey,watch it!"I said,ducking my head.
"What's going on here?"Mushi said,quickly appearing by my side.I saw that the 'brush' part of the broom was coming back.
"Get down."I then pushed Mushi's head down,which we both managed to dodge the broom.I angrily stomped up to him,and grabbed the broom making him stop.
"Oh!So,you wanna play a game?"He asked,which I tilted my head in confusion.
"It's easy.Bye-bye."He then pulled the broom back,and hit me in the chest with it!
"J'oh!"I yelled in pain,as I was sent rolling down the hallway,but I stopped halfway,and landed on my back.The world was spinning around for a few seconds,while I was trying to get myself back up.
"Alright,Cactine,you've gone to far this time!"All three of the girls angrily said.
"So,what?He'd survived.Besides I have a broom!What you ladies are going to do ab--Oh crap!"I did a quick shake to my head,and I could see a dust cloud,with lots of punches being heard from it.Who knew they could be so rough?
"Yo,Jake.Are you alright?"I turned to see Tops,along with Zan and Snitch.They were still in their Pokemon form though.
"Yeah...Cactine hit me with a broom,and I was sent spinning down the hallway."I said,lifting up my chest.There was a red square on the center,and I could still feel the pain.
"Oh!May I touch it!?"Snitch said,as she raised her claws.Zan looked at her angrily.
"Uh...I mean...ouch,that's gotta hurt."She then tried to hide her claws behind her back.
"Anyways...do you guys play games?"I asked.Snitch and Zan shrugged their shoulders.
"Yeah...I play this game called 'Street fighter 4'.You know it?"Tops asked.
"Pfft...are you kidding?I love that game!"I yelled,as excited as ever.
"Well now.Looks like i've found someone with my taste in fighting games."Tops said,giving an annoyed look at Zan and snitch,which they both looked at him angrily.
"Uh...before you three start fighting,can you please show me your dorm,Tops?"I asked,pushing Tops away from the girls.
"Right!But I don't think you'll like it very much..."
1311111111111111.title: The normal side of everyone...

choices: "Did you know that your parents are visiting?"
13111111111111111.content:
"So...what's the problem with your room mate,again?"I asked,looking around.I really didn't think Tops was so much into black and purple,because the walls were black and the floor was purple.
"Room mates...I have two of them."He corrected,rolling his eyes.
"Really?"
"Yeah...apparently,they decorated the room before I even got here.Why do you think my bed is the only thing blue in this room?"He pointed towards his bed.He was right,everything was either black or purple,even the TV...which I started to get nervous.I also noticed,how there was only 2 beds.
"What,if there is 2 beds in here,and if that one is your bed...then where does the leftover room mate sleep?"I looked really confused.
"They're twins,dude...they sleep together,since I took one of the beds."He said.
"I see...besides the fact that you have twins that sleep in the same dorm...how about that game we talked about earlier?"I took a seat on the floor,right next to the TV.
"You bet!"
************************
About an hour of game play,and me and Tops were still playing like there was no school tomorrow.I played as Ryu and Tops played as Ken.
"Yes!"He screamed,as he tried to do a jump kick,but I pressed the medium kick and punch buttons(Counter-attack)and he got hit,which ended the round.
"No!"He also screamed.I laughed very loud.
"Yes!...No!"I mocked.I have to admit,if you were standing there when he said that,you would have laughed too.
"Pftt...yo,dude,that was cheap."He said,with a vein on his head.
"Well,that's what happens when they put a counter feature on a street fighter game."I said,wiping a tear from my eye.
"And that's what makes it cheap..."He added,holding the controller angrily.
"Hey,maybe we could play with some stuff in your room..."I turned towards the clock...6:36.
"We have plenty of time,anyways."I got up and started walking around the room,looking for something to play with.
"Alright,but what can we play with?"I scratched my head,but then I saw an umbrella near the door.
"Oh!An umbrella!"I quickly swopped it off the ground.It was quite large,and I had to hold it with two hands,and for some odd reason,it was shaped like a Mismagius.
"What are we going to do with an umbrella?"
"Easy,my friend,anything can be done with a little imagination.Just hand me that marker."
"Alright,but if Madame gets mad,it's on your head."He said,passing me the marker.
"Watch this."I was very good at drawing,so I decided to draw,and what looks like the head of the umbrella...which I flinched and froze in place...when there was already the eyes and mouth of one...
"Mind letting go of me now!?"I screamed,which I quickly let go of it,and it floated in the air,which it then gave me an unwelcome frown.
"Friend of Tops,I presume?"She asked.
"Yes,he is,and your scaring him."Tops said,stepping by my side,which calmed me down.
"Ugh...another friend who's...wait a minute...your that human that transferred here.Your a strange little kid,i'll give you that.You almost drew on my face."She said,smiling.
"Um...sorry,how was I suppose to know you were an umbrella?"I asked.
"Pfft...I get mistaken for an umbrella a lot.I'm Madam,nice to meet you.I would shake your hand,but I don't have any."
"Ugh...so wake in comedy..."Tops rolled his eyes again.
"Wait,wait...why is your name sound very close to the other one?"I asked.
"That's because we're twins...or closely twins."
"Why closely?"
"Because,you can see her right behind you."I quickly turned around,to see some sort Mismagius figure appearing out of the wall.
"Ugh...can you believe how brutal some of the dark type can be?Jezz!"She angrily said...somehow stepping out of the portal.
This one was strange,she still has the cloak and features of a Mismagius,but I could see stubby legs coming out from below it.Not only that she was about a head taller,and those extensions on the sides,acted like arms.
"Oh...I can see what you mean by closely..."I said,dropping a bead of sweat.
"Oh!Hi!Didn't see you there.Your that transfer student,nice to meet you."She said,holding out one of the extensions,which almost hit my face.I could now see that she had a wide bust,which poked out a little from the cloak.
"Yeah...nice to meet you too...um,Tops,can we speak in private?"I lowered the extension,as gently as possible.
"Uh...why?"He asked,which I quickly yanked on his pants,and pulled him with me,towards the outside of the dorm.
"Can we come?"Both the sisters asked.
"This is private!What do you think?"Tops angrily asked.
"Yes?"
"NO!"Tops then slammed the door closed.
"Alright...why do you hate them so much?They seem pretty nice."I started.
"Are you kidding me?I despise their attitudes."He said,hitting a trashcan with his foot on the word despise.
"Worse part is,I can't do anything about that."
"Why not?"
"I'm a fighting type,and fight-type moves can't hit ghost-types.Not only that,they both know--"We both heard the door creek open,which we saw the sisters with their eyes all watery.I slammed the door closed this time.
"They both know Physic-type moves."
"Wow,seems like your at a true disa--"The door creaked open again,this time they were smiling goofy.Tops slammed the door again.
"Disadvan--"They swung open the door,which they frowned.I slammed the door closed.
"Disadvantage.I also gotta say,they are very ca--"Why do they keep flinging the door open?This time they looked like they were sleeping,and before we could do anything,they slammed the door closed.Next thing we know,they kept doing the same thing,but with a different expression every time.
"Car--toon--y--I will see you later..."I said,walking away.I instantly I heard girlish laughter,and angry yelling,behind me.It didn't take long,before I heard laughter of a different kind.
"1337 funniness!"That sounded like Bum.
"Pfft...of course dude.I am famous around the school."That sounded like Chum.
"Your not funny!Why would you paint all over the walls!?"Sounded like a real ticked off Mily.I ignored the conversation,and kept walking down the hallways,with my hands in my pockets.
*********************
I soon meet up with Azu,Spiny,Toots,and Mushi,all in their Pokemon anthro forms.I was teaching them more about the Pokedex entries...and they seemed to shiver at the Vileplumes entry,but they calmed down when I read most of the others.
"Hm...besides Vile's entry on her species...everything else seems to be just right,except for Lilligants...but yeah,everything seems to be on the spot."Mushi said.
"Are they spying on us?"Spiny asked,looking left and right,before her eyes turned into swirls.
"They aren't spying.They made this stuff up,and what do you know,it's exactly how everyone acts at this school...a little...it's just a coincidence."I said,which calmed down Spiny.Heck,I even got afraid of what to say.
"Um...does it say anything about Carvanhas,by any chance?"Toots asked.
"Sure,why?"I asked.
"That."Azu pointed towards her tail,which I could see three of them,angrily chomping on her tail.
"Um...you might wanna take those off,because their teeth can rip though a boat hull...and--"
"Really?They tickle."Azu giggled.
"Azu,I really think you should get those off,before they rip your tail off."Mushi said.
"Alright,alright..."Azu placed Toots on Mushi's bed,and walked off...giggling.
"Um...Jake,I have a question."Spiny raised her hand.
"Yes?"

Uh...what did she say again?
13111111111111111.title: Cartoon behavior/More teaching...

131111111111111111.content:
"Wait...WHAT!?"I screamed,almost dropping my Ds on the floor.
"Well...this thingy,right here,was shaking,and then it started talking,saying something about your parents visiting."Spiny explained,holding up...my phone.
"Why didn't you tell me!?"
"You just suddenly disappeared.I was going to tell you,but you didn't come back,until later."Spiny frowned.
"Oh great!My parents are going to find out about the school,and then I may get transferred to another school,and the--"I was panicking as hard as I can,until Toots put a stubby hand to my lips.
"Jake,it's alright.Now,Spiny,when did they say they were coming?"Mushi asked.
"They said tomorrow,around 5:00."
"See,Jake.There is nothing to worry about."Toots said,but I angrily grabbed Toots tiny body.
"There's tons of things to worry about!How are we going to keep cover!?"I yelled.
"Ahem...the watches..."Toots pointed towards Mushi,which she held up her wrist,which I could see the watch she used before.
"Oh yeah...right."I dropped Toots which she landed on the bed.
"What did I miss?"We all turned towards the door,and we saw Azu,with three cupcakes in her mouth.
"Oh,nothing much,just that my parents are visiting."I said.
"Really!?Aw...it's so cute how your parents are worried about you on the first day."Azu made a cute face,which I drooped my eyelids in response.
"*Sigh*Guess I have to tell the others."I then walked out through the door.
"I'll tell Vile and Cactine,since I can get through them."Mushi said.
**************
As I walked through the hallways,I couldn't stop thinking about those two kids,Chum and Bum.They may run out in front of the school,and expose themselves in their Pokemon form.I got more and more worried with each stop I took.
"Hello,Jake."I quickly snapped back into reality,seeing Principal D,floating backwards,in front of me.
"Oh,hey,Principal D,I have a little problem right now..."I said,rubbing the back of my head.
"No need to worry.I have it taken care off."Principal D held up a tiny jar,which I could see Chum and Bum constantly running around and hitting the glass with their bodies.It looked like they were laughing,too.
"Oh!That's great...but uh...there isn't any cracks in it,right?"
"As smooth as steel."I didn't really understand that,but I didn't start to worry anymore.
"Okay,thanks.I was going to tell the others,about my parents,but I think you already knew that since you read my mind."Principal D chuckled.
"Seems that your very faster to catch on to things than I thought."
"Yeah,well,just make sure those two are in a safe place."
"Done,and done."Principal D vanished in an instant.He probably turned into his speed form,and speed off.
Likewise,I was heading towards Tops room,when all of a sudden.
"Where is my watch,you black dress!?Give it back!"That sounded like Tops.
"You--have--to--say--please--man--"Sounded like Madame...or Madam.I don't know,they sound very alike.I turned to corner,and saw Tops rapidly shaking Madame,up and down.
"Hey,Tops.Hi Madame."They both instantly froze.
"Hey,Jake.Madame won't give me my watch back!"Madame made her face into an awesome face,while holding up a watch.
"Guys,this isn't time to fooling around now,we have a--"When I swung my arm down,I was suddenly holding Madam.
"A serious situation,and can you not do that?"I asked,which I let go of Madam,and she floated in the air.
"My parents are visiting the school tomorrow,so I need you guys to be in your human forms by 5:00,alright?"I calmly said.
"Aw...but I don't wanna be in my Pokemon form."Madam said,frowning.
"That's fine,just don't be outside when my parents come."
"I can just act like an umbrella!"She then did an awesome face,then fell to the ground as stiff as one could be.
"O...kay...well,I just came here to tell you guys about my parents.Make sure you tell Snitch and Zan,too."
"Okay,I will."
131111111111111111.title: Those dreaded parents...

1311111111111111111.content:
After going through my other courses,that were different from yesterday,I was impatiently taping my left foot on the ground,repeatedly.It was 5:05 and my parents could get here any minute.
"-Come on,where are they?-"I thought,looking down the hallways over and over.Suddenly,I heard an engine of some sort,which I looked out a window,and saw my mom's SUV driving on the road,some distance away.My mouth started to quiver,and I was shivering like mad.
"Yo,dude.Is everything,alright?"I quickly turned to see Tops and Cactine both in their human forms.First time i've seen Tops in his human form.He had tanned skin,a blue V-neck shirt,black pants,and was wearing a blue beanie cap,which I could see light brown hair,pouring down the sides.He was also holding Madam in his hands,and she was acting as a still umbrella.
"Oh,thank goodness...wait,where are the girl,besides her?"I asked.
"Mushi,Azu,Toots got very nervous and fainted,Spiny still acts like a Spinda in her human form,so we locked her up in her room,Zan was too lazy,Snitch didn't care,Madame acts too goofy,so I tied her up,and we got afraid of Vile and Cactine,here,may start fighting and break their watches.Girls...what are ya gonna do?"Tops explained,shrugging his shoulders.I sighed,out of nervousness,and annoyance.
"Tough luck...I guess."Cactine said.
"Well,my parents are here anyways,so let's just get this over with."I said,taking Madam into my own hands.Tops and Cactine opened the doors,which I could immediately see my sister,waving at me,on her tiptoes.
"Alright,dudes follow my lead."Tops and Cactine both nodded their heads lightly.I then started to wave back,as we started walking to my mom's SUV.As soon as we got a good distance,I could easily make out my sisters figure.
She seemed a little TOO over grown for her age,standing naturally at my height,and having wide hips.She had tan skin like mines,and has blue eyes.She also wears a white shirt,with the long sleeves being the colors of the rainbow,red khakis and white sandals.She has long,darkly colored hair,that reached past her butt,too.Get this,she's only 11...
"Hello!Jake!I'm so glad to see you!"She said,ramming right into my body,giving me a hug.
"Aw...that's very touching."Tops said,kinda sarcastic.
"Hi,Jacklyn...uh...where's mom and dad?"I asked.
"They are still in the car.They are going to wait for us,while we tour the school."She said,letting go of me,which me,and my friends made confused faces.
"Uh...who are these guys?They dress weirdly."Jacklyn got a closer look at Tops.
"Hey,gal,you dress weirdly yourself,but besides that,i'm Tops,and that's Cactine."Tops said,giving an angry look at Jacklyn.
"Well,jeez...take a chill pill once in a while,okay?"She said,pinching Tops on both of his cheeks.
"Oh stuff,dude...I think you're being told on by a lady."Cactine laughed.As soon as she let go of Tops,she ran to the front of the school doors.
"Hehe...serves you right..."Madam whispered,which Tops instantly grabbed her by the neck,and held her like a bat.
"Ding-ding...go time."He then started to stomp closer to Jacklyn.
"Dude,du-dude!We're in a public place!Do that when we're at Jake's house."Cactine said,as he grabbed Tops from under his shoulder.
"Hey,let me go!"Tops dropped Madam and she fell hard on her face.
"*Sigh*Try to calm down Tops,please,I will take care of the tour."I said,as I grabbed Madam off the ground,and held her body over my head.I soon met up with my sister at the school's doors,and I opened them,seeing many people,who are dressing like Pokemon,playing around and talking to each other.Oh right,I forgot to explain.During school,it was announced that everyone must be in their human forms today,because of my visitor.Luckily,everyone agreed,and some were even excited.
"Wow!There's so many people!Hi world!"Some of them waved back,some of them said hi,and some didn't do anything.
"Hi!"That voice sounded familiar.It sounded like Mushi,which I could see Spiny and Mushi heading this way.Spiny was holding Mushi over her head...and Mushi was sitting in Spiny's hands,somehow.Spiny was perfectly walking,with no tilt or tumble either.
"Hello.You must be Jake's brother.Am I right?"Mushi asked.
"Right,and you must be Japanese,right?"Jacklyn asked,which Mushi started blushing,Spiny giggled,and I started blushing,too.
"It's so glad to meet you!You look like an energetic type."Spiny said.
"Thanks,you look energetic,too."
"Uh...before you two start squealing,can we please get on with the tour."I said.
"Of course.That way,Spiny."Mushi pointed,which Spiny instantly started running down the hall,she pointed to.I quickly caught up beside them,hearing my sister complaining,about how we are going too fast.
"Nice job,girls.How did you get Spiny to balance,so well?"
"It's easy!All I needed was something to carry to balance,and Mushi here was the perfect weight!"
***************
"Careful,sis...you don't wanna call her tubby."I nudged Jacklyn.
"Too late...hello,tubby!"Apparently,like my first day of school,we found Azu in the Cafeteria,munching on some food,but as soon as she said tubby,Azu turned around and snapped a plate in half...which made me and Jacklyn shiver.Mushi and Spiny went to the principal,so they could warn him that my sister is here,instead of my parents.
"I could see,which side of the family you get your personality from."Azu said.
Azu,in her human form,was paled skin,a blue long sleeved shirt,white polka dot pants,and she had pink hair,with ponytail extensions,that made it look like her ears were going through her head.She still had that,slightly plushy figure.My sister was frozen stiff,and her mouth was gaped open.
"Ahem..."Madam coughed silently,which I stepped in.
"Azu,this is my sister,Jacklyn."I greeted.
"Oh so,this is your sister?Hm...nice to meet you."Azu held out a hand,but instead,Jacklyn crossed her legs.
"I have to pee...where are the bathrooms?"She asked,constantly bouncing up and down.
"I'll show you the bathrooms.This way,please."
"Okay,but please don't scare me like that,again."The only walked a few steps,before they turned a corner,out of site.
"AHHAHAHAHA!BWAHAHAHAHA!"Madam busted out laughing.
"Oh my god,hahaha...i've never seen someone so scared to need to go to the bathroom."She said,wiping a tear from her eye.
"She has a little bit of a bladder problem when she gets scared,heck I did it myself a few times."I said,sticking a tongue out.Soon we both heard a toilet flush,and she got back into her umbrella stiffness,and I grabbed her out of the air.
"Um...I don't think,I wanna stay any longer."Jacklyn said,poking her head from behind a corner.
"Aw...why?"I said...even though I really wanted her to leave.
"First of all,I am afraid of someone like Azu will scare me again,and second,your umbrella is starting to scare me.So,uh...yeah...I will see you...next visit."She said,quickly vanishing.I sighed of relief,after hearing a large door open,and then close quickly.I also heard many people say bye,as she walked out.
"I'm scary?"Madam said,as she slowly floated by my side.
"Oh come on,your not scary at all.She hasn't seen an umbrella shaped like you."
1311111111111111111.title: Unlucky break/short visit...

13111111111111111111.content:
After my sister's tour,I was nice enough to introduce Madam and Madame to the dorm I was sleeping in.However,I soon regretted it.
"Madame...can you please,stop going through the same portal over and over..."I said.Right now,Madame was falling through a portal on the floor,and kept reappearing on a portal above the one on the floor.She didn't respond,however.
"Do you wanna hear you entry,or not?"I asked,which she instantly stopped in the air.
"Entry?What entry?"She asked,as the portals disappeared.
"What,like a journal entry?"Madam asked,floating by my side.
"No.Like a Pokedex entry.It's info about the Pokemon species itself."I said,pulling out my DS.
"Oh!Can I read!?"Madam disappeared,but soon it got very dark,and I couldn't see the room anymore.I suspected something,the moment something soft hit my head.
"Madam!Get off my head!"I yelled,which I could see again,and she slowly placed her body on the floor,with teary eyes.Hm...strange...how could I miss the outline of her bust,along the line of the crystals?Good thing they are averagely sized,but the crystals were placed a little bit too suggestive...
"Since when did you have a bust,Madam?"She looked down,then back up.
"Ever since we meet...or was that earlier...I don't know,I forgot."I hit myself on the head,with my free hand.
"Did a fly get on your head?"Madame asked.
"No,I just...ugh,never mind.Look I have the entry right here.Do you want me to re--"
"Yes!"They both squealed,and were instantly eye to eye with me.I pushed them both back,and I turned to my DS.
"Alright,alright...Mismagius...It's cries sound like incantation.It is said to rarely be imbued with happiness giving power."They both frowned.
"That doesn't sound right at all..."Madame said...a little disappointed.
"It also says that their cries cause headaches and hallucinations."
"Now that sounds perfect!"I raised my eyebrows,out of confusion.
"Okay...how do you know?"
"Because the day before school,we both sang to Tops and he said that he got a headache and started seeing things."
"Ugh...don't sing...ever...okay?"
"Alright,but can I still do this?"Madame stood up,and a portal instantly appeared under here,and above her,quickly doing what she was doing before.
"Hey,I wanna join too!"Madam held out one of those extensions,and instantly disappeared with Madame and they were falling over and over and over,again and again,it was making me dizzy.I sweat-dropped.I have to admit,it did look kinda fun,but I will get sick,if I kept falling.
"So anyways,Jake,what's this?"Madam appeared next to me,with my bag of textbooks in it.
"That's my bag,Madam,can I have it back?"I held out my hand.
"Um...let me think...you have to catch us first."She quickly went back into the portal!Worse of all,with my bag!
"Hey!"I jumped into the portal,quickly coming into contact with some kind of black smoke,which instantly vanished the moment I touched it.I did a quick shake to my head,seeing...something...I really can't explain it.It was like I was inside the school...like REALLY inside the school walls.There were tons of pipes,and other stuff,and for some odd reason,my senses were heighten and I could hear any footsteps,or anything touching the wall in that matter.Soon,I noticed that I had a white outline,and you could see right through me.
"Funny,I didn't really expect someone to actually go through the portal."Quickly turning,I saw Madam and Madame,both having the same outlines as me.
"Uh...what the heck is going on?"I scratched my head.
"Your inside the school!In here you practically invisible,and untouchable.It's how me and my sister get through the school."Madame explained,while I snatched my bag away from Madam.
"Okay,so how do I get out?"
"Just go through that walls,like so."They both ran through the walls,which I was quite unsure before about that.I soon got my courage up,and ran through the wall,quickly coming in contact with the black smoke again,and after it disappeared,I was back to my normal shape and outline.I could feel my senses return to normal,too.
"Whoa,where did you come from?"Tops was standing right behind me.
"Out of the wall...because of these two."I pointed behind me,not paying attention to what the girls were doing behind me.
"Okay...ladies,we need to get to bed,it's 9:15."
"Ayko,doog eyb."They said,before disappearing in the floor.I felt as if three question marks shot out of my head,throught the ceiling.
"What did they say?"
"They said "Okay,good bye" backwards.They are very good at it too.See ya tomorrow,dude,I need to get some sleep too."Tops said,walking away.
"Alright...see ya."I then noticed something,which I looked both ways down both hallways.
"-Where is Mushi,when this happened?-"I thought
13111111111111111111.title: The portal to no place...

131111111111111111111.content:
In the morning around 6:45...I couldn't go back to sleep,so I started to walk around the empty hallways,in only my pajamas,with both hands in my pockets.
"-Ugh...I hate being an early bird..."I groaned in my mind.They didn't have anything to do in the early morning,so I suddenly felt like visiting,Mrs.Mily right now.As I walked through the hallways,I heard a faint siren sound,like a police car.I didn't pay much mind to it,until it got louder,and I think it was coming up from behind so I turned around.Luckily,it sounded inside,so I didn't have to worry about it being outside.It was getting louder by the second,and then next thing I know,I was tripped from behind,and was quickly moving forward.I looked over my shoulder,seeing a tiny police car.I instantly knew who it was,so I knocked on the front window.
"Ping!Ming!Where are you going!?"I shouted,hoping they heard me past the sirens.Ping poked her head out,and she was wearing black glasses and a blue police cap.
"Oh!Hello,cutie!we are on our way to arrest somebody!"She yelled.Arrest!?I hope she meant technically.
"What do you mean by arrest!?"
