"You'll see,like right now!"Ming screamed,which the car came to a sudden stop,making me fly forward,but not far from the car.The two sisters instantly ran out of the car,and around the corner,which I could hear them tackle somebody.
"Freeze!Your under arrest for not attending class!"They both screamed.
"Oh come on,I didn't do anything,it was his idea!"That sounded like Chum.Why was I not surprised?
"No it wasn't!Your the one who started it!"That was Bum.
"Well,you said it was a good idea!"
"Well,you shouldn't have listened to me!"
"Oh my...are you okay,sir."I turned my attention,towards a Whimsicott that was standing next to the car.Apparently,she had a blue police helmet on as well,but with a flower next to it.
"Oh...yeah,i'm fine."I said,picking myself up and dusting my shoulders.
"We ran into you pretty hard...we're sorry about that."She said.Her voice sounded so soft a simple wind could break it.
"It's alright,i'm Jake by the way."She instantly started blushing.
"Oh...um...m-my name is Bella...n-n-nice to meet you..."She was trying to hide her blush with her hat.
"Uh...is there something wrong?"I said,looking around for something that may cause her to blush.
"Oh...no,no,it's just that...i've never been introduced before."
"Aw...um...wait,why are you wearing a cap like that?"
"Because...I cooperate with Ping and Ming,when they try to put someone in detention."That explains the arrest thing.
"How could a sweet girl like you,be on a harsh job?"
"I have...this thing."She reached into her cotton,and pulled out some kind of mallet that was about my size.It looked a little cartoon like with the paint design.The handle was pink,with yellow color at the bottom of it,and the head of it was red in the center,and orange on the outsides.There was a blue flower painted in the center.
"Um...sorry I scared you...I did make it a little too big."Too big?She held it with one hand,over her shoulder!
"Ma'am,you are holding it over you shoulder with one hand,not only that the thing feels solid.You could probably crack a Cranidos skull with this."I complimented,which she started blushing.
"T-t-t-t-t-t-t-thanks..."
"Alright,one side,move it or lose it."Me and Bella move away from the car,which I could see Ping and Ming throw a tied up Chum and Bum into the back of the car.
"You gotta be kidding me!Sis!Help us out!"Chum screamed from inside the car.Bella didn't do anything,but turn her eyes away,and put the hammer back in her cotton.Weird how the thing just disappears behind her back.Soon Ping and Ming got back into the front seats.
"Hey,Bella?Are you coming or not?"Ming asked.
"I-I-I--"
"Actually,we are going to hang out for a while."Ming shrugged,and they drove off,and soon turned a corner,which I could hear Chum and Bum crying.
"Um...what do you mean by "hang out?"Bella asked.
"I mean,I wanna introduce you to my friends."
"What!?"
"Come on,it'll be fun,and don't worry,none of them are mean."
"Alright...I-I...I trust you..."She said,which I grabbed her by her waist,and put her on my shoulder,and I started heading towards my dorm.
"You wanna know something,your shyness is gonna get the best of you."
131111111111111111111.title: Hammer girl...

1311111111111111111111.content:
While in gym class,me and my friends were sitting on a bench this time.Thank goodness,my legs got tried the last time we stood for 10 minutes waiting for our teacher.
"Heh...luckily,we got to sit on the benches this time."Tops said.
"Yeah,you said it.My legs hurt the last time."I laughed.
"Speaking of which,how did you get into PHS?"
"When I was helping my mom to pick which school I go to,I chose this one because of the funny name.I rarely saw any other signatures on the list,so my mom put me in.Nobody told us it was a school for Pokemon,however."I explained.Tops looked at me questionably.
"Our school name is funny?"He asked.
"Pokey high school.Pokey?I thought it would be a school who's mascot was a dot."
"Pfft...what a coincidence it wasn't."
"But it would have been funny,though."Soon the gym doors opened,and before I could even look at them,a Mienshao appeared.This was our teacher,and she was always 10 minutes late,by Tops's record.
"Alright,class,today is another round of head-to-head battling."I crossed my arms,and pouted.
"Great,now I have to sit through another class,freezing in place."I mocked myself.
"At least you wouldn't have to sit through a whole class,just sitting here."Tops said.We both did a short laugh,next thing we both know,we were both whip on the sides of our arms!There was nothing there!
"Ow!What the heck happened?"Tops asked.
"Mienshao's are very good at combats.Their attacks are so fast,that they are invisible.She probably used that baggy fur on her arms as whips."I explained,as I rubbed my arms.
"Now,pair up with a partner and go stand on a mat."The Mienshao said.Was that the reason,why the other classes were outside?
"Hey,dude.How about you and me this time."Tops said,pulling up his pants.
"Sure!Let's do this!"I said,giving a competition like stare,which he did the same.We both got off the benches,and starting heading towards a random mat,which we both agreed on one soon,and we both got in our battle position.We were both so hyped about battling,but then Zan stepped into the middle,with her arms flailing.
"Hey,what about me!?"Zan cried.
"You can go with Snitch.It seems pretty even,since you both have claws."Tops said,pointing to Snitch who was still on the bench,but she shivered when Tops pointed to her.
"Oh yeah,she does."When I looked over the bench,I saw Snitch was gone,but Zan didn't mind,for she walked off.
"Uh...Snitch is gone,dude."I said.
"Don't worry,she's probably hiding in a closet as usual."Tops said.Soon some weird thing beeped out loud,which I instantly knew what it was.I got back into my battle position,and so did Tops.The weird thing beeped again,which I tightened my focus to only the match happening.
"Ya'll ready for this?"Tops asked.I knew what song he was joking about.Soon the thing beeped again,but it was a different tone,which I ran towards Tops,and he did the same.Unfortunately,soon enough,we both missed our punches and instead,hit each other with our foreheads.The force was great enough to make us both do tiny bunny hops,on one leg,backwards.
"Well,that didn't go so well..."We both said,as we both stood on two feet again.
"Round 2...go!"I said,which Tops quickly tried to sweep my legs,but I jumped back and slide tackled his legs,making him trip forward.He got back up,but on his head this time,and started spinning rapidly fast,then he dashed up to me,but I quickly sidestepped it,making him...turning around and coming back,which I had to jump to dodge it.He came back again,but after I jumped to dodge it,I flung both of my arms,hands open,into his spinning death.The moment I felt something hit my hands,I closed them,making him stop his spinning,with a confused face.
"Wow...now that's cheap."He said,which I let go of his leg...for some odd reason.I don't know,maybe I wanted to see more of his moves?Why did I let go of his legs.Besides that,he got back up onto two feet,and did a swift kick to my side,but luckily I blocked it before that could happen.
"You seem the have a lot of energy,Jake,are you even human?"He joked.
"No,I am an intellectual being from the planet 9000."I joked back.
"What?"
"It's a joke,dude."
"Oh...right.Well,let's continue."Hm...funny,it was like as,if we paused in real life.Anyways,Tops tried to do another leg sweep,but I did the same,and our legs connected with each other,which we both stood there...with our eyes watery.The pain was unbelievably horrible,I couldn't even explain it!We both slowly backed off from each other,before hoping on one leg,holding the other one,screaming our heads off about how much it hurt!
"Yo dude,I think we can call this a draw."I suggested.
"No.After this punch."Tops said,trying to punch me in the stomach,but I did the same,which both of our hand hit each other.The pain was just unbelievable as the leg kick,which we both started flailing our hands up and down.
"Okay,I give,it's a draw."He said.
"Same here...draw."I repeated.
"What!?No way!This can't be a draw."We both say our teacher,who looked really into the battle.
"Sorry,ma'am,but we think too alike,and we did the exact same moves.I don't think we could take it anymore."Tops said,pointing to his red hand.
"Ugh...fine,but let me warn you two,that this is the only draw you'll have."She said,as she walked off,with her nose held high.
"Jeez,what's her problem?"I asked.
"She believes that no fight could end in a draw,and only one will stand victor.If we ever fight again,one of us will win...and then we can see who's more cheap."Tops said,giving a silly smile,which I punched him in the arm.
"You know,I think your silliness will get the best of you,dude."
********************
"Thanks,Bella."I said,as Bella sprayed the last of the medicine on my arm.Ping and Ming were trying to see,if there were any problems on my legs,which they currently found none.Maxwell was keeping a close eye on his sisters.
"N-n-no problem...it's what's friends do after another...right?"She said,blushing.
"Well,there are no problems with your legs."Ming said,still poking at them.
"It was only one leg,why did you check both?"Max asked.
"Because,your legs are fit for a handsome--"Max pulled out his peashooter,before Ping could finish.
"I mean,fit for a marathon...yeah,a marathon,that's what I meant."Ping tried to hide behind Ming.
"Anyways,since I am as good as new,come on Bella."I said,picking up Bella,who was blushing extremely harsh.
"Where are we going?"She asked.
"Well,Snitch interrupted when I was trying to introduce out other friends,so I want you to meet my 'good' friends."I said,carrying Bella on my shoulder,and I walked out.
"Wait!We wanna come too!"Ping and Ming said,behind my back.
"No!"Max said,right before I heard something shoot out of a peashooter.
"T-T-They seem very interested in you,J-J-Jake."Bella said,sitting on my shoulder.
"Yeah,you'll be surprised about how crazy they are for me."
1311111111111111111111.title: Pain split...

choices: It was a weird dinner for teachers,of course...
13111111111111111111111.content:
"I can't believe you afraid of ghost types.You really need to control your fear,sometimes."I said,as I placed Bella on the ground.When I introduced her to Madam and Madame,she instantly panicked and started swinging her hammer like mad!She's afraid of ghosts...or ghost type Pokemon to sum it up.
"I-I-I-I'm sorry,g-guys,I couldn't control mys-self!I-I-I didn't know what came over me!"Bella cried,as I saw her mouth quiver and her eyes watery.
"It's alright,Bella.Some people just can't control their fears."Mushi said,smiling.
"Are you sure...they w-w-won't be mad at me?"
"I'm sure,they won't."
"Actually,we are!"That voice sounded a little too foggy!Like someone was watching us!
"Huh?Who's there?"I asked,placing and arm in front of Bella.Even though it was the least I could do to protect her,she seemed the easiest one the target.
"Whoa!Hey!Help!"Me and Mushi turned towards Bella,which we saw that she was wrapped in some kind of black aura,with a dark portal under her,which she was soon sucked down into,before me or Mushi could do anything.
"Whoa,holy cloak!Bella!"Mushi screamed.Suddenly,Madam appeared from the portal on the ground.
"Madam?What's going on?Where's Bella?"I asked.
"Bella?Is that the girl that almost killed me and my sister?"Madam asked,as she lowered her hat,which Bella slid onto the ground,tied up,and shivering.
"What did you do?"Mushi asked,as she started nibbling on Bella's rope capture,which it soon snapped,and Bella tried hiding in Mushi's wingspan.
"Nothing much.I was going to take her into my dorm,so I could scare that cotton off of her,but with all that kicking she did,I couldn't handle it,so I tied her up.Bye now!"Madam sunk back into the portal,which it vanished behind her.
"Wait!Madam!Ugh...why is she so quick?"I asked,myself.
"I don't know,but Bella seems to be a real squirmy."When I turned to Mushi,Bella was encased in Mushi's wingspan,but she seem to move a lot.It seemed even to much for Mushi.
"Can I have a little help,please."Mushi was kicking on of her leg like a dog.
"-Oh man...how are we going to put up with her?-"
************************
After a long time trying to calm Bella down from the ghost incident,me and Tops were just walking down the hallways,with our feet kicking into the air with each step.Kinda like a cartoon character.
"So,dude.Where are we going,anyways?"I asked.Tops said that he wanted to show me something special.
"Today is Wednesday,so today is the teachers' dinner night."Tops said,as a drop of drool slipped from his mouth.
"What do you mean 'Teacher's dinner night'?Are students not allowed?"Tops rubbed the back of his head.
"Well,yes,but--"I stopped right in my tracks.
"Then what the heck are you trying to do!?Get us in trouble!?"
"Ugh...I knew you were going to say something like that.Dude,i'll only do this one time.I promise I won't drag you into this,ever again."I started thinking things over and over,again.On one hand,this could definitely seal the deal on our friendship,but on the other we could get into major trouble for doing this.I thought...that friendship was more important than getting in trouble.
"Alright,dude.But i'm not going to inspire you in anyway,nor am I going to do this ever again."I said,wiggling a finger.
"Yes!Your the best!All you have to do is wait here,and,if any teacher comes,just bang on the door."Tops entered through a door,which was specifically the Cafeteria doors.I stood next to them,constantly keeping my ears peeked for any kind of footsteps.
***********************
It's been like...what...10 minutes,ever since he started sneaking food?Dang,how long does it take to just sneak food,you're not suppose to be eating!?I'm starting to get really scared now,what if somebody just appeared out of nowhere,and saw me doing this!?What if I get in trouble and get suspended!?What if--
"Jake,what are you talking about?"I snapped out of my thoughts,and I looked up to see...Mily!Oh crap!
"Hey!Eh...what did you say?"I asked,doing a light tap against the door with my foot,hoping Tops had heard it.
"I said,what are you talking about?You were saying something about getting in trouble,and suspension."Was I thinking out loud!?
"Oh,sorry.I was just in my train of thought.Sorry,if I worried you in anyway."I said,rubbing the back of my head.
"It's alright,but you shouldn't be thinking here.There's something secret going on,that you're not suppose to find out."She said,putting a leafy arm to my chest.
"Yeah,well,a little bird told me about it.I wasn't paying that much attention to him."I was trying to refer to my art teacher,which was a Chatot.
"That dang Chatot!I'm going to solorbeam him one day.Anyways,you should probably leave,before someone comes."She said entering the doors to the Cafeteria.I quickly started stepping away,until...
"Jake...can you come here for a second?"I quickly froze in place,and I almost fell over doing it too.I didn't wanna go,but something was forcing me to move my body,and walk into the Cafeteria.The first thing I saw was Mily,and then I turned towards the main tables,which was pretty obvious...
13111111111111111111111.title: Damsel in distress/bad boys...

131111111111111111111111.content:
It was pretty obviuos that this was a weird dinner.There were all sorts of food,of course,but not the kind you would expect.What really caught my eye,was the cake,with electricity pulsing through it.Many other foods were doing the same thing.
"Jake?...Jake,yoo hoo,Jake?"I snapped back,again,and Mily was holding some kind of musical note in her hand.
"Sorry...did you say something?"I asked.Funny,I don't remember,if she said anything.
"I want to you give this note to Mr.Chatty,and don't tell anyone,not even your friends about this,alright?"She said,handing me a floating note.The note was yellow,and it was in the form of a half note,and about half my hand's size.It was floating,too.
"Um...okay.I'll make sure he gets it.See ya."I said,as I exited through the doors,and completely hit my back against the wall,like I was trying to hide from somebody.I looked back at the music note,which I instantly clenched the note in my hand.As soon I unclenched my hand,the music note became crooked and black.It then floated out of my hand,and started moving around a corner.
"BWAGH!EVIL MUSIC NOTE!"I heard,which I soon saw a Chatot fly quickly across the hall in a panic manner,and the note followed slowly behind him.I sweat-dropped.I didn't know that could happen,so I quickly started walking down the halls,opposite from the Chatot.
"Whoops..."I quietly said,trying my best to keep a low profile...which didn't work out too well,for I soon ran into somebody,quickly identifying it as Azu.
"Oh!Sorry,Jake.Didn't see you there."Azu said,as she shoved the last piece of a cupcake in her mouth.
"Oh hi.Look I can't talk right now,I have to get going."I quickly tried to rush past Azu,but I soon found my legs wrapped in her own tail,like I was some kind of cow,making me fall over.
"Whoa,whoa,hold on.Where's the fire?"She asked,placing a foot on my back.
"I can't say Azu,I just can't."
"Hm...something personal,huh?"It's not really personal,just a secret I can't expose.
"Yes.Now,can you please let go of my legs?"I asked,trying to untie myself...which I really regretted,and I slowly looked up,seeing Azu...giggling at my attempt.I was really expecting that...
"Alright,I will,but don't touch my tail,again."She did a quick tug,and her tail unwrapped from my legs,which I kindly picked myself up and started walking towards my dorm again.
"-Ugh...things just keep getting harder and harder...-"
*****************
I finally got into my bed,inside my dorm,and my roommate was siting in her bed,too.She was brushing her buck teeth.
"Hey,Mushi?How are you so use to having buck teeth?"I asked,which she spat out her toothpaste,into a cup.
"It's real easy to get use to them,after being them for 15 years.Not only that,they are more useful than you think."She said,pulling her covers over her bust.
"So,how come your teeth aren't sticking out,and only show when you open your mouth?"I pulled the covers over my chest.
"Not everyone's buckteeth stick out.Seems like I got lucky with mine."
"You won't be lucky,if someone knocks those teeth out."I laughed.
"Hey!"
"I'm just kidding.Anyways,goodnight."
*****************
"J...Ja..."What was that noise?It sounded like someone was calling my name.
"Jak...ge...p..."I couldn't understand what she was saying,which mean only one thing!Someone was trying to wake me up early in the morning...ugh,who's doing this?
"Jake...wake up.Please?"I slowly opened my eyes,and I could see a dull figure.I'm not that really good at anything,when I was awoke too early.
"Jake!Are you awake yet?Hello?HELLO!?"Instantly,I was hit on the head with something,which I quickly srpung out of bed,and onto the floor.
"Ow!What do you want!?"I screamed.That thing hit me pretty hard!When I looked up,I saw Madame holding a cane,like the one's hold people walk with.
"Oh,Good your awake!"Madam said,appearing from the floor.
"Ugh...why are you girls awake,at...12:30 am?"
"Tops kick us out,and we don't have anywhere to sleep.So,we were wondering,can we sleep in this room,for tonight?"Madame looked ready to cry.
"Oh,fine.But,how are you two going to sleep,when both beds are taken?"I asked,rolling my eyes.
"Easy!Like this!"Both Madam and Madame went straight into the ground,with their hats sticking out.Not only that,I heard them snoring,quietly.I rubbed the back of my head in confusion.Did they both just fall asleep?Eh...whatever,anything to make them not make me stay awake.I climbed back into my bed,and pulled the covers back over my bed.
"-Dang...what did they do to get them kicked out?-"I thought,closing my eyes.
131111111111111111111111.title: The smalle note/Nocturnal mishap...

1311111111111111111111111.content:
The next morning,I found myself in art class,as bored as ever.Like the first day,I was awake early,and I had to wait at least an hour before the teacher even got here.Due to the boredom,I was sketching random Pokemon,but more specifically,a Mawile.I was very decent at drawing,getting every detail from the giant mouth,to the bottom of the feet.From every curve,to every bump.It's real easy once you learn and practice.After about...5 minutes I had drawn a Mawile,with it's giant mouth on it's back facing us.It looked real evil with the pencil shading I did on it.
"-Blah...never wanna mess with that.-"I thought,actually chuckling at my mental quote.As soon as I picked up my pencil,I heard the doorknob being turned,which I turned to the door,seeing that...an anthro Mawile walk through the door.
This one had a normal outline for a girl,although she did seem decently busty.Her half brown,half black arms made it look like she had gloves on,and that giant jaw on the back of her head,was in the form of a pony tail,which touched the ground.It looked normal,but I wasn't gonna be fooled by that thing!When she turned to me,she had a surprised face.
"Oh,hi!Your that human boy that got sent to this school,right?Nice to meet you."She said,waving.Even with her waving,I could see that giant pony tail smile,and showed it's razor sharp teeth,before looking like a ponytail,again.It made me shiver.
"I wasn't expecting someone to come to class,this early."
"I've been doing it,ever since school started.It's kinda my habit."I said,do a short wave back to her.
"Really?Me too!"She said.
"Well,then,get comfortable,because the teacher isn't going to be here for a few minutes."I then realized something,I didn't see her on Tuesday,which was the last time i've been in the art room.
"Wait a minute...how come you--"I paused.The moment I looked back at the door,she disappeared!
"Over here.Sorry,for the speedy entry."I looked back at the other side of the table,and saw that Mawile girl,again.
"Yeah,uh...forget what I was saying earlier.How can you move so fast,with that ponytail monster on your head?"I asked.She gave a distasteful look at me.
"For your information,he is not a monster.He's just playful."She said,as the ponytail smiled,again.
"And he's very lightweight.He's no trouble at all."
"Oh I see...well...uh...I don't know what else to say."I said,paying attention to my sketches.
"Oh!Wha'cha drawing?"She asked,as tried to bend over the table to see,which made a creaking noise,while it moved upwards a little.
"YA!D-D-DA!I don't think,you should do that."I quickly said,pushing the Mawile back into her seat,which the table returned to it's normal position.
"Alright,Mrs.curious,here.It's just a random sketch."I handed her my sketch,which she took it,and looked at it very harshly.She must be a little too serious with art.
"Wow!This is very good!How did you know,I looked this evil when I was a baby?"I blushed,as she asked that.
"No,no,no,it's just a random sketch.I just got bored."
"Oh...sorry."
"It's...alright."
"Hey,while we wait here,how's about we draw a picture for trade?"She said,pulling out a sketchbook,and a pencil.
"Uh...what do you mean by trade?"I asked,pulling out a better sharpened pencil.
"It's simple.I draw a picture for you,and you draw a picture for me.Get the picture?"
"Alright...so what do we draw?"
"I don't know...um...how about a random picture of a any Pokemon.By the way,i'm Mali."
"I'm Jake,now let's get drawing."
*****************
"I got to admit,Jake,your picture almost made me puke out of my friend here.That was really scary!"Mali said.
"Whoops...a little bit too much on the eyes and shading,I suppose."I said,as I rubbed my head.Right now,me and Mali were sitting at a lunch table,or the one that my friends like to sit at.
"What hat?"We both heard,turning to the two seats in front of us,which we saw Mushi and Azu sitting in those two seats.Toots was sitting on the tray Azu was using.
"Oh,hi girls,I want you to meet Mali."I greeted,as Mali waved to all three of them.
"Oh my gosh!A Mawile!"Toots said,as she examined Mali's ponytail friend.
"Wait a minute...where's your jaw?"Toots climbed the ponytail.How did she not notice the smile?
"Well,it's good to meet yo--"We were interrupted when we heard something hit hard against the wall.We all turned towards the sound,seeing Spiny just hit her head on a trash can.There was a big bump on her head,and she was rubbing it in pain.
"That girl over there is Spiny."I said.
"She's a little off balanced on everything,just stay out of her way,and you should be fine."Azu said,stuffing a sandwich in her mouth.Soon,something ran straight into Azu's stomach,which made her spit the sandwich out.
"Your ponytail was about bite my tail!"Toots screamed,from under the table.Mali did a shy giggled,as she elbowed the head jaw from behind her.
"Sorry,he has a mind of his own."
"Mind of his own?I thought Mawile's jaws are connected with the body itself."Mushi said,tiling her head in confusion.
"Well...mines have a mind of his own."Mali crossed her arms.
"By the way,where is Cactine and Vile?"I asked.
"They've been training...a little too harshly."Mushi seemed to put on a scared expression,when she said that.
"Ugh...can those two ever get along?"
*************
"U-u-u-u-u-u-u-u-um...n-n-nice t-t-to meet you ma'am..."Bella said,shivering like crazy on Top's shoulder.
"Whoa,jeez!Your gonna make me fall over from shivering!"Tops said,holding Bella in his hands.
"Hm...very shy girl,I see."Mali said.
"Well,anyways,nice to meet you,Mali."Tops greeted.
"Out of the way,jerkbutts!"We all heard,right before we were all tripped,by Cactine,holding a broom.He was in his Human form,and he was moving incredibly fast,too.
"Get back here!"Vile screamed,running past us,but stopped and turned to us.
"Hi strange girl."She waved,as her eyes turned into a happy expression,but then into a very angry one,as she ran through the halls Cactine just ran by.
"See what I mean,Mali?When will those two ever get along?"
1311111111111111111111111.title: Two minds think differently...

13111111111111111111111111.content:
"Jake,do you see it?"Mushi whispered.Right now,me and Mushi were in the library,trying to find a book on Mawiles.I was on this big scrolling ladder,about a few feet off the ground,and I could see why this is useful,because the bookshelves were thick and high,almost taller than the moveable ladder.
"No...we are in the Fighting-types.Move to the left."I whispered,tightening my grip on the ladder.Soon,the ladder started moving to the left,which I already knew Mushi was pushing it on the side.We soon stopped,which I saw many books,filled with a gray like cover,which is the signature color of steel types.I kept looking and looking,until I looked up,seeing a book with a normal Mawile on it,so I climbed higher up the ladder,until I was on the highest step.I could barely reach it,and I had to stand on my tip toes.
"Jake,be careful!"Mushi whispered.
"Don't worry,Mushi,I got it!Plus,I have cat like reflexes!"I replied,as I grabbed the book,but as soon as I did,I heard a tiny crack,which I looked down at my feet,and then...everything thing went black and white.It was like slow-motion all of a sudden,for I could see the bar right under my feet,snapping in half,slowly under my feet.I tried to grab onto the shelves,but I was moving in slow motion,too,meaning that I wasn't fast enough before the bar completely broke under my feet,sending me falling backwards.I closed my eyes,everything went silent...until...
"Cat like reflexes...pfft,my left foot."I opened my eyes,seeing that some kind of was covering my waist.
"Jake!Oh my god,are you okay!?"Mushi screamed,covering her mouth.Luckily,there was no one there.
"Yeah,i'm fine.Uh..."I traced the leaf,towards the top of the bookshelf,seeing that it was a...anthro female Sunflora!?
How come every anthro I meet,are female?Her head was quite large,and that was the only thing I saw about her,for now.How did I know it was an anthro?Her eyes are open,and I could see blue eyes.
"Are you okay,Mr.Whiskers?"She asked.
"Mr.Whiskers?Who's that?"I asked.
"Isn't that you name?You have a lot of whiskers on your head."
"It's just my hair."
"It is!?Whoops...sorry Mr."She then extended her leafy arm,just enough until I could stand on my feet.
"Jake,what's that leaf?"Mushi asked.
"It's her."I pointed upwards,towards the Sunflora,which she waved her other arm in response.
"Thank you for saving Jake."The Sunflora then jumped off the bookshelf,and landed on the ground in between us.
I could see her whole body now.She still had the body of one,and the leafs of one,but I could see a bust,that was noticeable.What made me wonder the most,was her legs...feet...toes?I don't know,they look like giant feet,with no ankles,or legs,and judging by the curve of the bottom,she standing on her tip toes.Even on her tip toes,she about a head taller than me.Why is almost everyone taller then me?
"So you name is,Jake!Nice to meet you,Mr.Jake."She said,grabbing my hand and shaking my hand up and down.
"By the way,you dropped this."The Sunflora handed me the book on Mawiles.
"Thank you.What's your name?"Mushi asked.
"My name is Ms.Fin.Nice to meet you."She said.
"Is it Ms.Fin,or just Fin."I asked.
"It's just Fin.By the way,why do you want that book?You're not a Mawile...or are you?"Flower's green neck stretched behind me head.
"Oh my,you have a long neck,Fin."Mushi said,poking Fin's neck.
"It's not just my neck,it's all my body parts...see?"Fin's leafy arms grew out,too!Even though they already touched the ground,they started pouring onto the ground,almost surrounding our feet.
"Okay...uh...well,besides your over stretching body,let's learn more about Mawiles,Mushi."I said,already heading towards a table,making sure not to trip over Fin's long arms.Mushi soon caught up with me,and we both sat at a round table,quickly opening the book and scanning through the pages.At some moments,I would stop and look at the pictures.One that mostly caught my eye,was the base of the gender differences.It showed a normal one,then it showed the difference,in a boy and girl one,then it showed the difference in a Moemon,which is something I didn't even know about.Finally,we got towards the the part,where it says info on the species.
"Don't be fooled by it's cute looks.It makes the foes loosen the foe's guard and chomps down with it's huge jaw's,when least expected."Mushi read out loud,which,by the looks of her face,she knew that the big jaw was just fooling around when it smiled.
"What's least expected?"Fin appeared,from what seemed to be under the table.
"Fin...uh...ugh,never mind,Mushi can you show Fin here Madam and Madame?"I asked.They both had different expressions.Mushi gave a confused looked,while Fin gave me a really excited,but loving look.Not only that,two oval pink spot appeared near her mouth.
"You really mean it?"They both asked.
"Sure,I mean,she's a great and happy girl,plus she's very useful in some situations that need it,so--"
"Let's go,Mushi!"Fin had already taken Mushi and left...but shouldn't that be the other way around?
"*Sigh*Girls...you never know what to expect from them?"I shrugged,as I tried to follow them,as quickly as possible.
13111111111111111111111111.title: Little Ms.Growth...

131111111111111111111111111.content:
At night,around 8:30,me and Mushi were just now getting into bed,pulling the covers over ourselves.
"So,how was Fin?"I asked.
"She was little too hyper.She was always going in the wrong direction,but besides that,she was alright,a real sweet girl."Mushi replied,turning out the lights on her side of the room.
"Goodnight,Jake."I turned out my lights off as well,but before I could say anything...
"AARRRGGGGGHHHH!!Where's my hat!?"Why am I not surprised,that it was Madame,yelling in very angry manner.
"Sounds like Madame,but...her hat?"I said,turning to Mushi,hoping she knows something.She just shrugged,which she and I quickly opened the dorm's door,seeing Tops was just about to knock on the door.
"Oh,hey...uhh...can you guys help me?Madame lost her hat."Tops said,rolling his eyes.
"She wears a hat?"I asked,still confused.
"Of course.Mismagius are always wearing those hats on top of their heads.What did you think it was?"He asked.
"We thought Mismagius hats were part of it,itself,but not--"Mushi started,but Tops put his stubby hand,on her mouth.
"Alright,I understand that,but I need your help!Madame is going head-over-butt crazy!She going to wake everyone up!"We all heard some kind of thrash can get knocked over.
"For some reason,I feel like I am in a video game,but besides that,we will help find her hat,befo--"We all heard something get smashed down,like a wall or something.
"Before she wakes someone up."I said,rushing out the door,which Mushi and Tops followed.
Turning three corners,we stopped,near the corner,which I looked around the corner,seeing that Madame's back was turned to us.The first thing I noticed,was her hair...it was very fluffy,and spiked around every spot.Two extensions,flowed down,past her shoulders.I could hear her breathing,harshly,and impatiently.
"What's wrong with her?"I asked.
"She's very angry.She always get angry,when she looses her hat.She did this last year,and almost turned to school upside down!"Tops said.
"She did?"
"Yeah.It was brutal."Tops shivered,probably remembering what happened.Madame slowly started turning her head,making a snake like hiss,and her tongue was flailing like one.
"Let me guess...we have to be careful not to get spotted,while finding the hat."Mushi stated to obvious.
"Uh...right..."
"But wait...why isn't she rampaging like she did last year?"I asked.
"Because,it's nighttime.She's not mad,when it's night,but by the looks on her face,she is ticked off.Now,let's stop talking and find that hat,and make sure your not spotted,either."Tops said,giving a very determined expression.
"Right."Me and Mushi said,which we all went in three different directions.
*************************
"Crap,crap,crap!!"I shouted under my breath.I can't believe it...it has been at least 2 hours,before I found myself,hiding under a desk,inside the Art room!Dude,you really don't know how scared I feel.Madame's in the room,and she is constantly looking around,left and right.Luckily,she isn't looking below her,or on the ground,not only that she is constantly moving around.I don't know,when she will leave,but I know,I have to get out,now!As soon,as I tried to lift an arm,I heard some kind of smelling noise.
"I can smell you...your very near...I can tell your scared..."I quickly sneaked towards the door,and quickly opening it,which she turned her head around,which I could see her eyes were completely yellow!
"YOU--"I closed the door behind me,before she could finish.I then pulled on the door as hard as I could,preventing her from escaping.She soon stopped,but she started saying really horrible things.Somehow,a purple hand shot out and grabbed my neck through the door.I quickly realized Madame was doing this.She wasn't choking me,but she did have a firm grip on my neck.A simple punch,made the door shatter into a dozen pieces.
"Where's...my...hat..."She growled,moving closer to me.For some odd reason,there was a second,and darker part of her cloak coming out from the original one.It covered her legs,but I can still make out the wide hips,for it was tightly hugging them,in a heart shape manner.
"I don't know,but if you can calm down,we can--"
"Found it!"We both turned,seeing Mushi holding a circular hat,and waving it happily.Madame's eye turned back to normal,but her cloak didn't.
"My hat!"Madame squealed,letting go of my neck,and tackling Mushi,and retrieving her hat from her.
"Good save...Mushi."I said,rubbing my neck,in pain.
"Jake,are you alright?"Mushi asked,lifting me back on my feet.
"Yeah,i'm fine,and it looks like Madame got a new design on her body."I said,still observing her body,but she was moving around too much.
"Her mom dropped off her 'other' piece of her cloak.She told me when I introduced Fin to her."
"Oh,I see...but where's Tops?"Mushi did a quick gasp.
"Hey,Madame,where's Tops?"Madame stopped flapping her arms.
"Oh...uh...hehe...I think I tied him up...and locked him in a closet..."She started rubbing the back of her head,while I could see a big sweat-drop fall from her head.
"Ugh...Tops was right,you get very angry,when you lose your hat.It makes me think,that the evil side of you is controlled inside you from that hat,like in video games."
131111111111111111111111111.title: The demon inside...

1311111111111111111111111111.content:
"Dude,pay attention!"I barked,as I snapped my fingers,in front of a sleeping Tops.For some odd reason,some kind of bubble kept getting bigger,and smaller each time he inhaled and exhaled.Right now,we are in algebra,and Tops has not helped with a single question,not to mention not copying any notes,that were still on the board.We were all assigned groups,to do several problems.
"Hm?Huh?What?"He asked,blindly,as the bubble popped.
"Your gonna flunk this class,if you don't pay attention,Tops!"Zan said.
"Gragh...why does the world have algebra in it?"Tops groaned,as he laid back in his chair,with his held pointing towards the ceiling.
"Because,doofus,you at least need to know,what humans know."She said,tripping one of the legs of the chair,so Tops can fall on his back.
"Ow!Well,you don't need to enforce it!Besides,algebra is boring as a rock.When will I need to use this junk?"He asked,as he picked himself up.Zan and Tops started angrily staring each other.
"Hey,Tops,did you get new pants?"I asked,hoping to change the subject.
"Oh yeah,I did!I even found a belt with them!"Tops stood upright.Originally,he was wearing black pants,but now,he was green khakis,and a black belt.The pants were a little baggy around his feet.
"Jake,why did you try to change the subject?"Zan said,giving me a look,which I could tell that see knew about it.
"Heh...it was just so you two don't start brawling,in the middle of class.By the way,Tops,did Madame really tie you up,and forced you into a closet?"I asked.
"Yeah,she did.I tried to use pursuit,but that didn't work out well."
"Brutal..."
"You know,you two could have called me to help."Zan's claws become enveloped in a strange black aura.
"Nah...she would have taken you out with one hit,with her focus blast."
"Well,I can at least put up a fight!"Zan banged her fist on the table,almost making the table flip over.
"Alright,calm down.Can we just get on with math?"I said,picking up my pencil off the floor.
*******************
"They really brought gold into the class?"Madam asked,as she took a closer inspection of pyrite,which is fools gold,in earth science class.Bella,and Madame were in the same class as well.
"No,Madam...it's pyrite."Madam tilted her head.
"So...pyrite is gold?"Madame asked,poking the mineral.
"No,it's fools gold!"I barked,which Madame tiled her head.I sighed,as I banged my head on the table.
"He's saying,that pyrite is not gold."Bella explained.The two were still looking at it carefully,not to mention that they weren't sitting in their seats...which is makes sense,because they have no legs...or at least one doesn't.
"Thanks...I hope this makes things easier."I said.I can't believe that she's not afraid of Madam or Madame anymore,but she's still scared of any other ghosts.
"No problem...by the way,did you see what happened in the halls last night?"Bella asked,which I felt a bead of sweat fall down my hair.I can't let her know about that,she would be scared to death!
"Um...no,I didn't...why?"I lied.
"Well...it sounded like something was rampaging through the halls...I even asked the hall monitors...but they said,that they didn't see anything."
"-Wait a minute...-"I started having a flashback to last night.While I was looking around for Madame's hat,I remember a flashlight,being shined through the window...was that a hall monitor!?
"Uh...it was me...I just rushed to the bathroom,because I drank so much water."
"So,you knocked over the trashcan in the hallway?"
"Yeah...sorry,if I startled you."I can't believe that worked...
"It's okay...but please,don't rush yourself too hard next time."
*****************
P.E.
.........
You guys thought me and Tops would go against each other,again?Well,you are off,because me and Tops avoided each other in P.E. class,but this time,I had to face against someone different...Azu.Azu...is more difficult than Tops,because no matter how much I punch her,none of them have affect.In fact,she isn't doing anything,but just standing around.
"What's wrong?Did your mom teach you,not to hit girls?"She asked.
"Is that a joke,or a question!?"I yelled,angrily,as I continued my wave of punches.
"It was a question...you remind me of Toots."
"No!It's probably because...your blubber...is absorbing my attacks...making them...useless..."I punched,every time I paused.
"Are you calling me fat!?"She was instantly in my face with her own,and she was pouting angrily.
"Well...kinda...WHOA!"I was almost hit in the head,with an iron tail!She swung at me again,but this time I jumped back.
"Surprise!"One second,she was a few feet away,then the next,she's right next to me again,giving me no opportunity to dodge the ice punch.She hit right in my stomach,which not only did it hurt,it started turning cold around me,very fast,then all of a sudden,I was frozen in place,IN A BLOCK OF ICE!!No matter how much I tried to move my body,it just wouldn't budge.
"Heew eh..."I manage to muffle.I said:Help me.I can clearly see the world around me,which I can see that Azu was laughing.
"eits aht phueh!"I said:it's not funny!
"Right,right...sorry.Does this mean I win?"She asked.
"es,kow geh eh ow wof er,I haf oh ee!"I said:Yes,now get me out of here,I have to pee!Really,I have to pee!It's been like the moment I froze!
"Alright,hang on."Azu started swinging her tail above her head,which was getting faster and faster with every swing!
"o,ish is ona ur!"I said:Oh,this is gonna hurt!
1311111111111111111111111111.title: Classroom chatting/Frezze fool...

13111111111111111111111111111.content:
After getting unfrozen,and getting a big bandage on my forehead,I was spending time in the halls,just walking around.Maybe if i'm lucky,I may see Chum and Bum again.
"Hey,Jake,wait up!"I looked behind me,which I could see Fin heading this way.
"Oh,hey Fin!What's up?"I greeted,as she joined by my side.
"I heard that you got frozen.How do you feel?"She asked,looking really worried.
"I feel alright.I just had to pee really bad."I said.
"Really?Strange...I didn't know,people had to use the bathroom when frozen."Fin's stem-like neck stretched out,so that her head was on the other side of me.
"Eh...I didn't know either...wait a minute...today is Friday,right?"I asked.
"Yes,of course,but that's not what I really wanted to talk about."Fin's neck returned to normal.
"Well,then talk about it on the way,because I want to get to the pool!"I quickly started running,ahead of Fin...well,she clamped onto me with her leafy arms,and she was following,without her feet touching the ground.I quickly turned a corner,and headed straight for my dorm,which only took about a minute or two.I looked behind me,and I saw Fin's leafy arms...but they were stretching around a corner.
"Jake...are you there...ugh...so...dizzy..."Fin asked,as she stepped out from the corner,with her eyes swirls.
"Yes.What do you want to talk about again?"I asked,which I started to open the door,and I walked right in...uh...
"GET OUT,YOU LITTLE SNEAK!!"
"WHA!!JAKE CLOSE THE DOOR!!I heard,which I instantly ran out of the door,and closed it behind me.
"Mushi...who was that?"A very angrily voice said.
"Oh my wings...that was Jake."Mushi said,from the other side of the door.
"Jake?You mean that human boy?What's he doing peeking into your room?"The voice said.
"He was probably trying to get in,for his swim shorts."Mali knew exactly,why I tried to enter.
"Why is his shorts in here,did you catch him and rip them off?"Why did that voice sounded like it did not like me?
"No!I wouldn't do anything like that,he's my roommate!"
"Oh...well,he should learn to knock once in a while."
"Just wait for us outside,please."
Soon the door flung open,which I saw an anthro Maractus...and boy did she look mad.She had wide chest and hips,was about a head taller,and had a slim waistline.I couldn't see any legs,but the way her body was shaped past the hips,i'd say that she did have legs.The only thing she was wearing was a pink bow with polka dots,behind the yellow thorn on her forehead.
"..."She was giving me a very cold stare.
"Why do you have Fin's arms around your body?"She asked,crossing her arms.
"Fin was just following me,she wanted to explain something to me...but I was a little too fast for her."She shifted her weight to one side,and she was giving a look that said 'I don't believe it'.I heard a rattle like noise as she did.
"Uh...Fin..."I turned to see that Fin is still dizzy,and she was having trouble keeping her balance.
"Right..."She said sarcastically.
"Well...since it seems that you know Mushi,Fin,and Mali...I guess I could trust you...but remember to knock sometimes...I don't like naughtiness."She wagged a thorn,like it was a finger.
"I can see that...what's Mushi and Mali doing?"
"I don't know,probably trying to cool off after your sudden intrusion."She unwrapped Fin's arms off of waist.
"My name is Mary,by the way,and I gotta say,you do know how to make an entrance."As soon as she finished,Tops and Cactine ran past us...only...Tops didn't have his pants...
"HA!I'm going to get there first!Losers!"Tops yelled,as he and Cactine turned a corner.I looked back at Mary,which she was shaking her hips left and right,which I could hear tiny seeds.
"Oooohh...who was that handsome green man."She asked,as those big cactus on her head started flapping up and down.I could already tell,that she wanted him to be her girlfriend.
"Easy...he's already taken."She instantly stopped,and frowned.
"What!?By who!?"Instantly,Vile ran past us,with Tops pants.
"Tops!Put your pants back on!!"As soon as I turned back to Mary,she looked surprised...and mad...her cheeks were red.
"GGGGGGGGGGRRRRRRRRRRRRRR!!!"She growled.
"Now,now,calm down.There's no need to start a fight."I said,trying to calm her down.
"I'm not gonna start a fight...I'm going...to start...A WAR!!"She yelled.She looked ready to dash,which I quickly grabbed her from under her arms,and pulled her close to my body.
"Now,come on,I don't wanna see anyone get hurt,unless it's a battle.I hope you can understand,that Cactine is taken,and he's...possibly not your type."
"What do you mean not my type?He's more than my type!"She said,as she was kicking her legs,very wildly.
"He's too wild,and he gets into trouble every second."She instantly stopped,which she slowly turned her head to me.
"Alright,if you say so.By the way,you are kinda strong."I let go of her arms.
"Yeah,I have moments like that...are you going to the pool too?"
"Of course!I was--"She didn't even finish,before Madam and Madame flew past us.
"Wait a minute,how can Madam swim?"
13111111111111111111111111111.title: Rattle girl...

131111111111111111111111111111.content:
The pool was a great time to be right now.There were many Pokemon that were playing around,splashing,practicing,and doing cool tricks.The one that was having the most fun,was probably Tops...who was spinning a his full speed just above the pool level.He was spinning so fast,he was creating a whirlpool around him,which many Pokemon seemed to enjoy being in...except Toots...who I was trying to teach how to swim.Spiny was helping me.

"See...just use your tail,if you're worried about sinking."I said,as I placed Toot's on her tail.She's a real fast learner.

"Unless,of course,your tail was bitten o--"I placed one of my hands onto Spiny's mouth,so she wouldn't make Toots scared again.

"Okay...thanks Jake."She said,giving a wide smile.I smiled back at her...right before her body started moving on it's own.

"Whoa,what's going on!?"Toots panicked,while her tail was moving towards the whirlpool Tops was creating.

"Your tail got caught in the currents!"I yelled in response...which me and Spiny started moving on our own as well.

"And so are we!"Spiny added,as she held onto my hair out of fear,which really hurt!It didn't take long before we were caught in the whirlpool itself,which we were spinning around in a circle at a very fast speed,and I didn't even try to swim...and I could see that Snitch was having a hard time staying above water.

"This is so stupid...how the heck does...he even do this?"She kept sinking underwater between pauses,which I was laughing every time.Don't worry,Zan was nearby her,so she wouldn't completely drown.

"Hey,Spiny?Can you let go of my hair now?"I asked,which she let go without an answer.When I turned back around,she dived underwater.I don't know why she did that,but I looked ahead of me...and I could see Cactine lazily lying on his back,and the whirlpool seemed to carry him.I paddled my feet to get close to him,avoiding many Pokemon and anthros as I can.As soon as I was next to him,I flicked one of his needles on his chest,which by the way he reacted,seemed to have woke up.

"Hey,sleepy head.Why are you sleeping at a time like this?"I asked.His hat tilted over his left eye,which I could tell he was still drowsy.

"Since,I don't have to worry about moving...*Yawn*...I figured I could sleep for now.Whoa!"He screamed,as he was pulled underwater.I dunk my head under to see where he disappeared to.Turn out,Vile was pulling him from one of his legs.If you were there,you would have laughed.I raised my head,and I could see that Tops was still spinning like crazy...for a while.You see,with each passing second,he was slowing down his spinning,which was slowing down the whirlpool.It didn't take long,before he came to a complete stop,with swirly eyes,before falling into the pool.You can hear the cheers of the people nearby,and saying how fun it was.

"I got him!"Madame yelled,as she dove underwater.The top of her hat was still exposed,as she swam to where Tops fell,and dove deeper,and soon came back up,with a dazed Tops on her hat.

"Yo...that...was cool..."He said,with his eyes still swirling.
****************
"I can't believe you created a whirlpool that took up a quarter of the pool."I said,grinning as I did.

"What can I say...I practiced a lot."Tops replied.Tops was in his Moemon state,because he said felt like it...
(If you don't know what a Moemon is...it's a person that dresses and resembles a Pokemon,in Tops case,it was a Hitmontop.)
"Well,seems that training has paid off for you.That whirlpool was very fast,for a non-water type."

"Alright,alright,I don't need any more praise."He said,as he raised his hands...but we did hear screaming,followed by a short boom,down the hallway.We both looked forward,seeing that many Pokemon were running away.

"Oh electrode,please don't tell me."Tops said,sounding as scared as ever.We soon got our answer,when this girl,who had the colors of an electrode,stopped in between the hallways,and shot a discharge towards the running crowd.The discharge was heading towards us,which we ducked our heads down,to avoid the attack.

"Um...so,yeah,Jake...would you like to come to my room,to play games."I already knew what Tops was getting at...and I was forced to reply,when the girl turned towards me,and raised an eyebrow.

"Yeah,Tops...that would sound swell...run."I quietly said the last part,before me and Tops started running away from the girl,not looking behind us one bit.At some point,Tops had to push me from behind to go faster,because the girl was right behind us.When we got to the cafeteria,the doors instantly opened,and we both slammed straight into it,causing us both to fall on out back.

"What is going on?"We both looked up to see Lily with a worried expression.Me and Tops both started yelling at the same time,which,even I,could not understand.It lasted about a good minute,before Lily tapped both of our mouths closed.

"Calm down you two...now,what's the problem.Jake,you first."She said,as she ripped the tape off of my mouth.

"There was this girl,with an electrode body,chasing down the halls!Ow..."Why did the pain from the tape come in afterwards.Lily ripped off Tops mouth.

"So then we ended up here.Ow..."Seems like Tops had the same problem with the tape.

"Hello..."Me and Tops both jumped up and screamed,when we turned around to see...
131111111111111111111111111111.title: Helicpoter man/Explosive personality...

1311111111111111111111111111111.content:
I could feel me and Tops shiver uncontrollably,as we both stared in the face of an Electrode girl!The same one that chased us down the hall.She was just a head taller than Tops,and she was wearing a red shirt,and white pants.She had red eyes,white hair,with two pony tails coming down from the sides.Even though she looked pretty human,the moment I saw the watch,I could tell this girl could destroy the whole school in a second!

"What are you guys scared about?It's just Alina,the assistant gym teacher."Lily pointed out.Her wide smile seemed to never leave her face.

"But-but,you were chasing all those people before us,Alina!"Tops pointed out.

"That's because everyone else was in the way.I was only after two Pokemon in the entire crowd.Two Pokemon by the name of Chum and Bum."I instantly had a flashback,to the point where me and Tops saw the running crowd.At that point in time,I remember seeing Chum and Bum running scared,along with other Pokemon.However,two more of them I already know,which was Mushi and Mali.

"What did they do?"I asked,not sounding surprised.Even though,I don't know those two,it does sound like they started something to get her ticked off.

"They rigged me with a rubber band,before we started fighting,preventing me to use any electric attacks!"She yelled,with a red vein on her forehead.Wait...electric attacks don't work on Grass-types very well...

"Well,you were at a disadvantage with electric attacks."Lily pointed out.

"Watch it sister."Alina raised up her wrist,and pointing a finger towards her watch."One false word,and I can blow you all into space."Me and Tops heard the cafeteria doors slam behind us.

"Wait a minute...I thought electrode's were a genderless species."I said,looking confused as ever.

"That's the same thing Chum and Bum said...but,it's too complicated for me to explain...you have to ask Principal D. for that kind of stuff."She said,rolling her eyes.

"By the way,are you two new here?I haven't seen you two here."

"Uh...i'm not new...he is."Tops said,pointing to me.I did a short wave...but she didn't believe it.

"Come on now...you can't possibly be a Pokemon."She shaked her head.

"Uh,yeah,I am."Tops raised his fist in anger,probably to show off his watch.Her eye pin pointed to me,then down,then back to me.

"So,you're the new student,eh?"She said,as she pressed a button on her wrist watch,which she instantly blurred out for second,and then became clear with a new image.Her arms disappeared,but two red shield acted like her arms,and her two white pony tail also turned into shields.Apparently,almost every part of her body was half red,half white.

"Now listen here,kid.Tick me off,and I may go boom."She said,as she gave off an evil smile,right before her body started glowing darker,and sparks started flying from her body.Me and Tops panicked and we both but our arms up in fear.

"But sometimes...I just fool around."Her body stopped shaking,and her colors returned to normal,and she was giving a 'just kidding' expression.

"Don't do that!You almost had me whiz my pants!"I yelled,which she giggled in response.

"Don't worry kid,I would never explode for no reason."

"Er...right."Tops said,as he tip-toed his way,around a corner.

"I should get going as well...if you see Chum and Bum again,can you please catch them for me?"I asked,which her wide smile returned to her face.

"Alright,I will,and probably have fun doing it too.See ya!"With a quick wave of her hand,she quickly vanished in thin air...well...I could see small electricity puddles on the ground...but I really didn't care for that...but I really did care for the games Tops mentioned,before we started running.
1311111111111111111111111111111.title: The fastset teacher around...

choices: Later in Me and Mushi's dorm...
13111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Right now,me and Tops were in his room,playing street fighter 4 again.I was winning,if it wasn't obvious.It was 5-1.

"Wow...can this game get any cheaper?"Tops asked,as he lost yet another match.Make that 6-1.

"Ha!It's called skill dude.By the way,how did you manage to find this game?"I asked,because it was beyond me how someone would throw out a system,along with the game.

"I just found it in a garbage can,in the streets.It's funny,because I didn't expect something like this to be found in a dumpster."He said...which I was really surprised,I found myself having my mouth open.I closed my mouth back,when I heard a sudden knock on the door.I was the first to get up,and answer it...seeing Mali and Mushi standing in the doorway.

"Hey,ladies.What's up?"I greeted.Mali's head jaw smiled at me,from behind her back.What was that thing planning.

"Principal D would like to see you in his office."Mushi said.

"What!?What did I do!?"I asked,in response.What did I do...i've never been called to the principals office before!

"Nothing.They caught Chum and Bum,and you requested to see them...so,they wanted for you to meet them in Principal D's office."Mali said.Well that makes sense...and I get to see Chum and Bum in person,for the first time in this school...without them running away.

"Alright.See ya,Tops."I said,as I was about to leave the room,right before Tops tapped my shoulder from behind.

"Hold on.I wanna come,too!"I turned around,seeing that Tops was in his Pokemon form again.How did he change so quickly?Eh...i'm not gonna worry about that.

"Alright,let's go!"And with that,me and Tops had dashed out of the room,and headed towards Principal D's office.
************
"So...why are you two here?"Tops asked.When we got to to Principal D's office,Zan and Snitch were at the door,too.

"We heard that they caught Chum and Bum,so I decided to pay them a little visit."She said,with a an evil smirk.

"So...why is she here?"I asked.Snitch just crossed her arms,and looked away.

"I was dragged into this."She said,in a very angry tone,which she received an elbow to the side.She rubbed her side,in pain.

"Right..."Tops said,as he opened the door to Principal D's office.The first thing,I see was Chum and Bum tied up on Principal D's desk...but Principal D himself was not at his desk.Chum and Bum were tied up,so their heads were the only thing exposed,plus they had tape on their mouths,so they

"Uh...where's Principal D?"I asked,as I stepped into the room.By the way,Chum and Bum's eyes opened,they must have fallen asleep on his desk.

"I don't know...but,at least we can see these two knuckle heads again."Zan said,as she happily skipped towards the desk.The reaction on their faces,show that they were scared at Zan's appearance.

"Don't even think about teasing them,Zan."Tops demanded,as he quickly grabbed Zan by her tail.

"Alright,alright...just calm your horn."

"Nice save."I said,as I approached the desk...getting a closer look at Chum and Bum.Their eyes say 'We ain't saying anythin'.

"So,let's introduce ourselves...shall we?"I asked,as I slowly tore off the tap of Chum and Bum's mouths.

"This is all your fault,you know!"They both screamed,in rage.I felt as if,a question mark popped out of my head.

"Whoa...what do you mean?"

"You're the one who sent Principal D after us!We didn't do anything bad,just peeked into the girl's locker room!"Chum explained...WELL!Such an overreaction...

"But i'm not here,to get you two in trouble...i'm just here to talk about ourselves."Chum and Bum looked at me,with their mouths gaped open.

"Wait a minute,so that was you two!?"Snitch yelled angrily,which Zan and Tops blocked her way,before she had a chance at charging at them.

"Anyways...can you two explain yourselves,like why you keep running away?"I asked.

"We can...but can you untie us,first...please?"Bum gave me the puppy eyes...not working out.I don't fall for these things.

"Look,either you two can explain yourselves,or we can do it Snitch's way?"I turned behind me,seeing Snitch being held back by Tops,but she was flailing her arms wildly.

"Okay,okay.We thought,you were one of the teacher's pet,so we tried to stay away,especially when you ratted us out about painting the walls,with that white and red monster behind you."Chum and Bum cried out.I turned behind me and look at Zan,who just shrugged her shoulders.

"A good police,bad police thing...nice..."Tops whispered,which I rolled my eyes,and ignored it.

"Well,that explains one thing...why do you two cause trouble around every corner?"I asked.

"We just wanted to have fun in school...is that bad?"They both looked up at me,with a stream of tears flowing from their eyes.

"Are you guys...crying?"I did feel a little guilty for making them cry like that...I think I went a little too hard.

"Don't fall for it Jake.They're using Fake tears."Tops said.Fake tears!?That was close...I almost untied them.I shaked my head,freeing it from the guilt.

"That's a really cheap move,you know."I said,which made Chum stop crying.However,Bum tears did not disappear.

"Bum...you can stop now."I said,but his tears did not stop flowing...in fact...he changed back to the original form.(The form before sunny day.)

"Cherrims can't learn fake tears."Bum pointed out,which I slapped myself on the forehead.

"Oh my god...dudes,we make a Cherrim so scared,we made him revert to his normal form."I stepped to the side,to everyone could see.They all gasped at how much Bum was crying.

"Whoa...that's cool."Snitch said,having an elbow present delivered to the stomach,from Tops.

"Um...you two are free to go now..."I said,as I found a knot on the back of the rope,and undid it...or tried to undo it.The knot wouldn't come off...no matter how harshly I pulled.

"Uh...Zan...?"I started,which she quickly swiped her hand across the ropes,cutting them as she did...but the moment the ropes touched the ground...Bum had reverted back to his sunny day form,but with an evil smile.

"Surprise,boss sex!"They both said,as they both instantly vanished...with no trace left behind...how did they do that!?

"A fake-real crying scam?Holy crud...they most of gotten smarter."Snitch said.

"Tops...take notes...when they start crying...remind me not to untie them...ever...but for now,let's get to bed."Zan angrily said,as she stomped out of the room.

"Note taken!"
13111111111111111111111111111111.title: In Top's room...

131111111111111111111111111111111.content:
So,after that incident with Chum and Bum's crying scheme,I decided to go back to my dorm to rest for today.It is getting pretty late.When I arrived at my dorm,I opened the door...to see that Mushi wasn't inside.Weird...even though I started at this school,about a week ago,I knew by heart that Mushi would be asleep right now.However...a black hat was on Top of Mushi's bed.

"~Oh god in a bottle...don't tell me that's Madame's hat!~"I screamed in my head.That event with Madame...I could still remember that night,and I can't get it out of my head.Despite the memory,I carefully stepped closer to the hat,and when it was in reach,I grabbed it...then flinched...strange,for a second there,I thought Madame was going to break the door in half,then throw a shadow ball at me...or something.I sighed in relief,but the noticed a note placed on the hat.

In bold letters,it said...

Dear Jake,
Please take this hat for...um...well...uh...we thought you will look cooler with it.
That is all

Madame and Madam...not to be confused with the other.

Well...at least they tried.After taking off the note,I placed the hat on top of my head.It fit well...but my hair was a problem,for the hat shifted my hair downward,(even though my hair was never that straight,since it is rebel style).and I can barely see past my hair.I wish I had a mirror for this.

"Psst...Jake...Jake!"A voice called.Sounded like Madam...but,why did it sounded like she was right beside me.

"Madam?Where are you?"I asked,looking around.

"Down here."I looked down...and saw that Madam's head was phasing through the floor.

"Oh,hi!Thanks for the hat."I thanked.

"It's our pleasure."She said,with a rather British tone.Didn't know she was part British...but besides that,she dunked her head under the floor board.Probably phased through the floor to get to her dorm.I made sure no one was around,before I changed into my pajamas,and then climbed into my bed,placing my new hat onto the ground,next to my bed.However...I wondered what was Mushi up to...hm...
******************
~Saturday morning...
Ah...a bright Saturday morning...a day with no school to worry about,and a day of relaxation,right?
WRONG!!
Can you believe it?It was raining,and I meant REALLY raining.If I went outside and came back in,I would look like I have taken a shower with my clothes on.Right now,I was looking outside the window,hoping there would be some kind of sunlight.Cactine and Tops were doing the same.

"Great,the one day my girlfriend doesn't bother me,and it's ruined by rain."Cactine sighed.

"Come on guys,it can't be totally ruined."I said,hoping to cheer them up.Apparently,they still looked like what they did 20 minutes ago.

"How can it get any better?"Tops asked.

"Maybe,we can play with Mily's notes."I suggested,mimicking a Lilligant's dance on the DS.

"Dude,those things are dangerous...remember what happened Thursday?"Tops asked...oh,yeah the note that flown towards the music teacher.

"Oh yeah...how's about we find Zan and Snitch and train with them?"I suggested.

"I really don't feel like getting a cut today..."Cactine said,as he set his head on the window sill.Me and Tops did the same,but with our arms crossed under our heads.I can tell by the looks on all of our faces...we needed something to do...and fast.

"Hm...how's about we find Vile and...nah,that's too weird."Cactine started,which Tops and I gave a curious look a Cactine.

"What?"He responded,as he saw our faces.

"What were you thinking?"I asked,raising an eyebrow in question.

"Well...I had an idea...what if we stuffed pepper down Vile's flower hole,you know,the one on top of her head?"I don't know why,but I seemed very interested by the time he finished the sentence.

"I'm in!"Me and Tops both screamed.

"Wait...how are we going to do that,without Vile knowing?Won't she hit us all into the ground?"Tops added.

"And that's why I came up with a plan!"
**************************
So,after searching the halls for Vile,I finally found her in the Cafeteria...with Azu and Mali.Shouldn't be too hard to get her away.

"Hey,Vile."I started,which grabbed the attention to all three."Mind if I speak with you...in private."

"Fine.I'll be right back,girls."Vile said,as she got up from her seat,and walked with me towards the outside of the Cafeteria doors.Even with a straight face,I still can't get over how scary she looks,especially with those flower petals creating a shadow over her face.

"Well...I was a little embarrassed to ask you this in front of everybody,but...can you lift up the petals on your head to show your face?"I asked.You know,whenever I see her,the eyes are the only part I can see on her face.She sighed,and crossed her arms.

"Sorry,Jake,but I can't do that."She said,shaking her head.

"Oh?Why not?"I asked.As soon as I did,I saw Cactine appear behind Vile with Tops on his head,who was holding in his laughs,while holding a pepper shaker.

"Well...because of family traditions,I can not show my face to anyone,unless I flap them for scattering pollen,but it's still pretty hard to see with the air turning yellow..."She said...I didn't really pay attention to the last word,because I was too busy looking at Tops trying to unscrew the top to the pepper shaker.It looked screwed on tight.

"Uh...Jake are you listening?"Vile said,which I faced my eyes towards her.

"Yeah,I was...was I dosing off again?"I asked,hoping she believe my lie.

"Are you sure...it looked like you were looking at somebody else."As she said that,Tops tried even harder getting the top unscrewed.Dang,Max's mom really likes to screw in things tight.

"Don't worry,I wasn't."I can feel a sweat-drop tinkle down my neck.

"Hm..."As Vile seemed to place a stubby arms on her waist...
131111111111111111111111111111111.title: Out of time curfew/Rainy day prank...

1311111111111111111111111111111111.content:
"Jake...do you feel something...funny?"Vile asked,one of her eyes twitched,while she was saying that.When I looked above her,I could see that Tops was pouring pepper in Vile's flower hole.YES!!

"Whatever do you mean?"I asked,ever so innocently.

"*Sniff*Did someone just pour--AACHOO!!"Her sentence was interrupted when she sneezed,very loudly.Not only that,the sneezed caused yellow pollen to shoot out from the top of her head...which looks like Stun spore.I can tell that I shouldn't touch that...but the cloud was quickly spreading around the hallway,with all of her powerful sneezes adding more stun spore to it!Tops and Cactine already left the scene!

"Um...i'll get back to you in a second."I said,walking away.She didn't respond,unless you count sneezing a response.My walk soon turned into a tiny jog,trying to get away from the stun spore cloud.I guess the prank didn't work out as well as I thought...better go tell someone...
******************
"You told Snitch about the Prank!?"Tops yelled at me.We were arguing about how I tattled about our innocent little prank,and how it went wrong.

"Well...not only just her..."I said,shyly.

"Oh come on,who else did you tell?"

"Mali,Madame,Madam,and Azu...and Zan...and Spine...and Mily...and the principal..."My voice got lower and lower with each name.

"You told the principal!Dude,do you know how much we are screwed over right about now!?"He yelled.

"I had to tell someone!If I didn't,the whole school would have been infected by the stun spore!"I yelled back.

"We could have just cleaned it up ourselves!"

"We can't touch stun spores,dude!"

"Why not!"

"Because,we were going to get stunned by a simple touch!"

The argument raged on for about a good 20 minutes.After that,me and Tops went to see Cactine,who was in his room.We told him the whole story...or,at least,I told the whole story.

"Dude,we could have just cleaned it up ourselves!"Cactine yelled,the moment I finished telling the story.

"That's the same thing I said."Tops said,crossing his arms.

"We couldn't just clean up the spores.If we tried to clean it up,we get paralyzed,and your girlfriend would find out."Cactine went silent after I said that.

"Yeah,that's true...but,do you know how much trouble we are in right now?"Cactine asked.

"It's either that,or the whole school gets muscle spasms."

"Hey!Why is this door locked!?"A loud voice screamed from the other side,sounding a lot like Vile.I went straight to the point to tell her about the prank,until Tops suggested...

"Everyone be cool,alright,don't act like we had anything to do with the prank,okay?"Tops suggested,in a low voice.

"Right...but,I need to leave...before I freak out."I whispered,opening the door,and seeing Vile's body towering over me.

"Oh,hey,Vile...I was just..."

"What were you three whispering about?"Vile asked...I gulped harshly.

"Nothing...we were just playing...uh...the quiet game."Cactine said,which gave me a chance to slip by Vile.

"By yeah,Jake and I lost,so...we need to go...wash our hair...because,it's filled with dandruff."Tops said,passing by Vile.Me and Tops calmly walked down the hallways,and took a right,which the walked turned into a full sprint.

"Do you think,Cactine will expose our secret?"I asked,keeping up pace with Tops.

"Nah,he wouldn't do something like th--"Tops...or should I say WE were interrupted when a door suddenly opened,and we both ran face first into,and falling on our backs.I bit my lip.

"Ow..."I groaned,as I looked up to see who opened the door.It was Mushi!

"Oh,sorry about that.Why were you two running?"She asked.

"Uh...running competition," I lied,"Where were you on Friday night?"

"And why did you two pull that prank?"The door opened more,to see Mily...which I quickly jumped up back to my feet,at her sudden appearance.

"Ah,fudge..."I whispered...
*****************
"Well,you deserved it...I wouldn't stoop that low for a prank."Madame said,with her arms crossed.Coming from her,that's really saying something...that,and the fact she told Mushi about it too.I really did it this time,I was punished from leaving the room for the next week,and to make sure I didn't leave,there are two twin female Roserade anthro guards standing on the outside of the door.

"I'm sorry...maybe I should think about the outcomes,before doing something that stupid,ever again.I'm lucky they didn't give me a more worse punishment,than this."I said,lowering my head in shame.

"Jake...you don't have to let yourself down like that."Mushi said,placing one of her fingers on my chin.I looked up into her eyes.I felt like crying...

"Look,we all know you are a great kid,but sometimes,things that seem fun can also be dangerous.You probably didn't know that,when you pulled the prank with Cactine and Tops."She's right,I didn't know.

"Well,your right...I promise never to do something that stupid again..."I said.

"I know you won't...Jake."She said,giving me a deep,affectionate hug.A tear fell from my eye,at the moment of the hug.

"Aw...touching moments are always cute!"Madame cooed.

"You're still here?Can you please exit?"Mushi asked,without turning her head away.Madame tip-toed her way out the door.

"Now Jake,I don't want you to look at this situation so badly.It's only for a week."

"Yeah,but what am I gonna do,while i'm 'Grounded'?"I asked.

"You're not completely grounded."I raised an eyebrow in question.

"You can still do some things,like go see fights,eat in the cafeteria,stuff like that.You just have to ask."

"Alright...does Tops and Cactine have the same punishment as me?"

"Hm...a little worse.They're grounded for three weeks."

"Wait,why three?"

"They've been here longer than you,and should not have brought you into the prank,even though you willingly helped them."She rolled her eyes.

"Well,a week isn't so bad...but what about the Roserade guards?Will they kill me,if I left the room without permission?"

"They may whip you a couple of times..."I gulped harshly.

"I'm just kidding.They will take you back into your room.By the way,they're some fights going on in the gym.Wanna go see?"She asked.

"Depends..."I started,walking up to the doorway turned to face one of the Roserade guards.

"May I go see the fights in the gym?"I asked.

"Sure...but,you'll have to lead the way."One of them said,saying it in a rather stale tone,and rolling her eyes.

"Alright,come on Mushi."I said leaving the room.Mushi soon followed behind,and behind her,the Roserade guards.

As we were walking through the hallways...I got curious...
1311111111111111111111111111111111.title: Prank gone wrong...horribly wrong...

13111111111111111111111111111111112.content:
My mind was starting to fill up with questions,mainly aimed towards the Roserade guards.I couldn't keep my curiosity down,so I decided to get it over with.

"Hey,Roserades,"I started.Their eyes signaled me,that I got their attention."What would happen if a fi--"

"Jake!"I was interrupted by the sound of Cactine rushing down the hall,just to greet me.Wait...if he's 'grounded',then where are his guards?

I quickly perk my attention towards him,answering with a simple "Yes?"

After Cactine took a few breaths to regain his strength to talk again.

"Uh...can I talk to you for a sec'?"He asked,placing one of his spiky arms around my shoulder.The funny thing is,he made sure he was in a position that was facing away from Mushi and the gaurds.Soon,he tried to nudge me forward,however it was a nudge it was more of a push.The looks in his eyes were really getting me questionable about what he wants to talk about and why he is trying to get me away from the others.

"Mr.Cactine!May I ask,where you're guards are?"One of the Roserade asked.Cactine,for some odd reason,flinched when he heard the question.

"They're just around the corner.I'm still under supervision."He said,waving his arms to the Roserade.I took the advantage of the situation to look at Mushi,who was looking at me questionably.I gave her a slight shrug to let her know that I had no idea what Cactine is trying to do.Soon,I used up my advantage time as Cactine moved his arm back to my shoulder,and started pushing me forward,and faster than before.

*************

Soon,me and Cactine were out of sight of the guards and Mushi,and I started to get impatient.

"Alright,Cactine,can you please explain what are you trying to get me into?"I said,rather harshly,even for someone my nature.He quickly put his hands in the air,while he tilted his head down,and his hat slid down past his eyes.I got to admit,that was cool.

"Hey,hey,man.I'm just trying to help you."He said,while readjusting his hat.The holes that form his mouth curved upwards,giving me a very bad sign that something may get me into more trouble. Unfortunately,I couldn't help but to find out the future.

"What do I mean by 'Help'?"I repeated.

"I'm just saying,you should be thankful about getting rid of those pesky guards."He's right,although the guards weren't annoying...at least you don't think they were.

"Isn't that a little harsh for guards,just to...babysit you?"

"Babysit!?You mean you would like to have to ask to go to the bathroom every time?To have to ask when you want to go and have a snack?To have to--"

"Okay,I see your point,"I interrupted"Wait...how did you lose your guards?"

"Easy,ask to go to the bathroom,slip out the window,bam!Easy,peasy,"He said"This isn't the first time I got in trouble for something like this."

He started to walk forward,leaning back a little.I couldn't believe he just said that to me.I'm pretty sure I explained how I never gotten into trouble like this before.At least I think I did.I wanted to just turn back and accept my consequences,but I had no other choice.I had forgotten how massive these hallways are,and I could get lost in them,seeing that he took me to an unfamiliar part,and I really didn't want to travel left and right and make imaginary maps,I can do that next week.As I turned around,Cactine's smile had signaled me that he had planned this the whole time,right before he disappeared behind a corner.I sighed as I found myself mentally cornered,and forced to follow him.

*********

As the clock ticks and as the time passes,my body starts to shiver itself on the inside,not because of the temperature of the air,but out of fear of what may happen next.Right now,me and Cactine were waiting for Tops to enter through what appears to be the back entrance to the school.I managed to hide my shivers,and able to sit with my arms crossed looking at the wall,not baring a small glance at him.I was very ticked off at him,not only at what happened earlier,but what is happening now.

"Well,here he comes."Cactine said.I quickly turned my attention outside,who was not in favor of the rain.He was completely drenched and in a full sprint towards the door.I quickly opened the door in response,and he came rushing in.

"Aw,man!I knew it was raining,but I didn't know it was that harsh!"He complained.He really didn't like the rain,he was shaking his pants like crazy,with him still in it.
