"This is no time to be worrying about your fashion sense.We need to get moving before we get spotted."Cactine said,gesturing his arms to move,as he did himself.Tops and quickly exchanged an unsure look in each others eyes,before following his league.

"So,Tops,where do you think he's leading us to?"I asked Tops.

"I don't know.I've known him for a whole year,and I don't know why he's only doing this to us now."He replied.

Wherever he's taking us,I hope it's not entering us into more trouble.
*************

A few minutes had surely gone by,for Tops,Cactine,and I had too take a quick breather as we came to a stop.Cactine really had my nerves on edge,and I'm usually happy most of the time,but he's just getting me way too curious!

"Alright,Cactine,you better explain yourself."I confronted him.Again,he raised his hands in the air.

"Alright,alright,sheesh.All I wanted to do is to show you off,this little baby right here."He said,as he leaned again a door.

This door...it wasn't ordinary...it was wooden.All of the other door were plastic slated doors,but this one had the old door style.

"Why is this door different from the rest?"I asked.

"Well,take a look."He said softly,as he twisted the door knob.

The moment I looked inside,I couldn't believe my eyes.The room...was so...relaxing...

I have no idea why,but this room is giving off a rather relaxing scent in the room,not to mention a relaxing aura,too.The floors were wooden,the walls were painted yellow,and there were a few decorations scattered about the room.On the far side from where I am,I could see a few refreshments,such as coffee and milk,and a few lit candles too.This room...is just a room I need for when semesters start getting stressful.

"Like what you see?"Cactine asked,taking a seat at a nearby desk.

"I do."Tops responded,following the same action as Cactine.

Even if this place is relaxing to the soul,it feels...'off'...ah,whatever,it's probably nothing.

"I could really get use to a place like this."I said,as I repeated what the other two did.I gave one,long,calm breath of relaxation,until I started hearing footsteps,coming from within the halls!

"Wuh,oh!Someone's coming!"I exclaimed,quickly running towards and shutting the door.Tops turned out the lights,and Cactine flipped over a table.I don't exactly found how that was useful,but in my panic state,I couldn't care less!I just had to hide!I quickly slid behind the table,with Cactine and Tops,crushing my skull in between my head.

I couldn't comprehend what was going to happen next!
13111111111111111111111111111111112.title: Sneaky,Sneaky!

131111111111111111111112.content:
You slowly enter the room after Milly called you in.

"Dammit Tops, couldn't you be a little bit quicker with the food?" you mutter to yourself.

As you walked in, you noticed Tops had heard your warning knock, and tried hiding in the cupboard. Unfortunately, he had left a trail of crumbs leading to his hiding place. You gave him a small glare as you noticed this, and he replied with a 'my fault' look on his face. You then turn your attention to Milly, who you could tell was angry. Those red irises seemed to be getting darker.

"So, care to explain yourselves?" she said, turning to both of you.

"Uh..." the two of you started, neither wanting to put blame on the other. Neither of you wanted to throw yourselves under the bus after seeing Milly beat Bum upside the head with a ruler. It was obvious you and Tops had planned on eating the food.

"I can't believe that you guys, of all the kids in the school, did this. Especially you Jake, you just started a week ago!" she exclaimed, then sighing and putting her hands on her hips, looking at us in disappointment.

"We're really sorry, Miss Milly." Tops said, feeling kind of bad about what he had just done.

Milly went and sat down on one of the chairs in the room, arms crossed on her legs.

"I know you guys are sorry, but what are the teachers supposed to do for desserts tonight? We can't serve food that's been eaten of."

"Well, what they don't know won't hurt 'em, right?" you suggested, trying to fix the situation.

"But I know the food has been touched, and I simply won't hand out food that been bitten out of!" Milly said sternly.
"Well then," you started, "We'll remake those dishes!"
"What!?" Tops and Milly yelled, both in shocked. "What, no, I couldn't have you two do that."
Tops started whispering to relay a message to you privately. "Dude, are you crazy? I have no idea how to cook, let alone any of these desserts!"
"Don't worry, bro, I know enough about cooking that if Milly helps us, we'll be done in no time. Besides, it's either this, or detention or something."
"Alright, Tops replied nervously.
You turned to Milly. "It"ll be no problem Milly, if you walk me through the recipes I should be to cook up something similar to the food Tops ate."
"Okay..." Milly replied reluctantly. "But you have to do exactly what I say, otherwise you two are in a lot of trouble!"
"Deal." you said.
"First thing's first, Tops, go to the janitor's office and grab a broom to clean up the mess you made. Jake, come with me. We're going to start making a Bluk Berry Suprise pie.

A few hours later...
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ---------------------

"And, finished!" you said, after putting the finishing touches on the Nanab's Delight Cake.

"Wow, I'm impressed, Jake." Milly said, admiring your work.
"So am I," Tops added, "Who knew that Jake was such a good cook?"
"Well, I didn't really know what I was doing, Milly walked me through most of the stuff and I just followed her lead." you replied modestly.
"Don't be so reserved, you two did a great job fixing these entrees. In fact, these look better than the first dishes."

You both were about to thank Milly before she pulled the two of you into a bear hug.

"Thank you guys so much, I'm sure the other teachers will appreciate it." Milly told you.
"It's....no....problem..." you managed to squeeze out, since she was hugging you so tightly. She eventually let the two you go.
Alright, well you boys better go. The dinner is starting in about an hour, and I need to finish fixing things up."
"Okay." Tops replied.
"See you, Milly, hope the dinner goes well." you said.
"I know it will, thanks again Jake. Oh! And Tops?"
"Hmm?" Tops questioned, as he turned around, his hand on the doorknob.
"You'd better take the food the food you ate off of. Either you take it or I throw it away"
Tops had pure bliss on his face. He quickly walked up the Milly and received the desserts.
"Thank you so much Milly!" Tops exclaimed, delighted he was going to get to have the desserts after all.
"You deserved it. Now shoo, shoo, I have to get this room fixed up for the dinner!" Milly said, gently pushing the two of you out of the room and back into the hallway. You and Tops run back to your dorm to start eating the delectables. You enter and see Mushi sitting on her bed, reading.

"Oh hey guys, you're back late."
"Yea, we had a long day." you tell her.
"But it was all worth it." Tops says, holding up the desserts with pride.
"What's in the containers? It smells really good." Mushi asks.
"It's desserts from the teacher dinner tonight. I'll explain later." you tell her not wanting to explain a long story to her at the moment. You just wanted to eat.
"All right, Jake, let's eat!" Tops exclaimed announcing the start of a delicious meal.
"Oh wait, Mushi, do you want some?" Tops asked. Mushi looked like she was waiting for him to ask.
"Of course, I love Pecha Pudding!" Mushi said, sitting down next to the two of you. All three of you begin eating when suddenly...

"Hey Mushi, We were wondering if you could help us with some of our home..."

Azu was in the doorway along with Vile staring at the food we eating. All of a sudden the room because an awkward moment.

"..."

"..."

Tops is the first to make a move, running towards the closet of your rooms, while trying to scarf down the rest of the pie he was eating. Pure chaos breaks out from there, with Vile chasing Tops to the closet ("Gimme some of that pie!" "Never!" *slam*), Mushi trying to hide her bed, and you running to a corner of your room, caught in the moment. Azu goes after Mushi first, giving you time to escape.

Or so you think.

Azu's tail quickly wraps around your legs like a rope, and you are dragged towards her. Eventually Mushi and Tops are caught, with Tops comically having bulk berry stains all over his face.

"So, thinking about sharing now?" Azu asks with you hanging upside down from her tail. You just sigh loudly.

It's been a long day.

choices: A male Zorua walking with a Zoroark.

Shoulder Length Dark Chocolate Brown curly hair with Auburn and copper highlights,big Beautiful brown eyes framed by long dark eyelashes,She can be shy at times, but she is also mischievous. usually laid-back and loves to help people. most people thinks she weird but loves her when they get to know her. she loves to give hugs and receive hugs. she always has her camera on her she love to take pictures.

14.title: Girls

151.content:
Alright let's start with Character Description. (man, I hate doing this.)
The name's Steven, a 16 year old kid from the Great Midwest. His apparel is oversized purple khaki shorts, a black shirt saying 'The Chill' on the front and 'Chi Town' on the back. Wears a black SnapBack New Era hat, and black shoes. Stands at 6'0, caramel skin complexion, hazel eyes, dark brown hair shaped into a small fro

(Alright, enough of that. If I forget something, I'll just sneak it into the story as we go along.)
Anyway, on with the story! (I'll leave another choice for another story at the end of this one.)
--------------------------------------------------------------

"Honey, we're almost there!" your mother tells you as the school shows up on the horizon.

You wake up with a start, and quickly wipe off the drool on your face. Five hours of straight driving can put anyone to sleep. You were surprised your mom hadn't driven into a ditch.

"I'm so glad that Mr.D decided to choose you for the transfer program!"

"Yea, well I hope this school doesn't kick me out like the last one."

"Steve, the last school kicked you out being sent that boy into a coma. I'd be surprised if they didn't remove you from the school."

"It wasn't my fault, though. He started fighting me and I just got him to stop."

Your mother sighed.

"Look, I know this is hard for you, but I guess people just don't like how I look or how I act. Even you said that."

"Well, you are different compared to everyone else in those schools, but you're a nice person, and I don't want you growing up in a area where people don't like you because you're just trying to make something out of yourself."

You smiled at your mom, always being your support while you went through all the shit people were giving you in those other high schools, like how you were light skinned but black, making you an outcast. You had to transfer about three times because of fights, and you hoped this was the last time you had to do this. You were barely staying in the same year as everyone else your age (That would mean you are a junior.).

"Well here we are!" mom announced.

Finally, after a boat ride and a five hour drive in a rental car, you made it. The school was amazing. Its architecture was very modern, with a lack of windows on the side of the building you were staring at, which you found odd. You then see the school's logo, PHS with the 'S' having extended endings. You take the two bags of your stuff out of the back of the car.

"Well, Mr.D said to drop you off in front of the main building and he'll handle the rest. So come on, give me a hug."

You walk up to your mom and pull her into a tight embrace. "Love you mom."

"And I love you too." she replied. "Please make sure you set up some sort of transportation to visit on holidays."

"I promise, I won't forget."

"Okay. Well then, I'll see you this Christmas then." she said, wiping a tear off her cheek.

"I'll be there mom, no way will I miss Christmas with the family."

After a few more words and another hug, she got back in the car and drove off.

When she eventually was out of sight, you pick up your bags and head into the building. As you walk in, you head to the front desk, and noticed a girl who looked about twenty sitting behind it. It was sort of odd, her hair was straight and medium length, but it was red with a yellow streak down the side. You take at glance at it, but then quickly ignore it as you walk up to her.

"Excuse me, I'm here to see Mr.D."

"Oh, you must be the new transfer student. Steven, correct?" the red head asks. You nodded.

"Okay, Mr.D is right this way, I'll take you there." she stood up and began walking to the left of you, leading you to apparently Mr.D's office. That's when you noticed that the girl guiding you was about four inches taller than you.

'Wow, never met a girl taller than me before. Kinda weird.' you thought to yourself.

"And we are here! Mr.D, Steven is here to see you!" your guide says cheerily.

"Splendid! Send him in, Mrs. Otill."

Mrs. Otill motions you to go in and she closes the door behind you.

Mr.D looked like any old principal really. Shortish, bald, the only major differences being the clothing he wore. A red suit with a blue button-up, and a green tie.

"Ah, Mr. Sachre (That's you.)! So nice to finally meet you! So I heard you were getting in a little bit of trouble at your other schools, hmmm?"

"Yea, sort of." you told Mr.D.

"Well, it can't be helped," he says decidedly, "but now you're here, and I assure you, you will have a better experience here at PHS!"

"Actually, I'd been meaning to ask about that, what does 'PHS' mean?"

*sigh* "Well I guess now would be to a good time as any to tell you."

Damn, he was making a big deal about it like it has to be a secret or something.

And you quickly understood why.

Right in front of you, Mr.D was transforming into, something. You couldn't quite make out the form until he finished. At that point, you quickly figured it out.

"Y-y-you're a Deoxys!?" you shouted, scared as shit seeing what you just saw.

In front of you was a Speed Form Deoxys, its tentacles stretching to both sides of the room.

"Glad to hear you atleast know what I am." Mr.D said. "But more importantly, yes, I'm a pokemon and yes, you have just enrolled into PHS, or, shall we say, Pokemon High School."

...

You were in shock. Was he serious? This couldn't be happening.

You've been transferred to a high school full of Pokemon!?

"I can see you're a little surprised." Mr.D commented.

"Sort of, yes." you reply.

"It's understandable. It's not everyday you see one of us in real life."

"Just, answer me this," you ask, trying to get a grasp on the situation, "why are pokemon on this planet, I know your not from here, there's just no way."

"To answer your question, no, we are not from Earth. Our planet is hundreds of light years away. We came here as an experiment to see if we could someday meet your species and compromise with them, sharing technologic advancements and bringing the two planets together as a unity."

You thought that actually sound like a pretty cool idea.

"Okay, I'll go through with this, I mean, I'm already here, right, and hell, it should be pretty cool hanging out with Pokemon."

"Excellent! I'm glad you're adapting so well to the situation. I knew we pick the right person to enroll." Mr.D said triumphantly. "Now, I'll have your new roommate show you to your room. Thera!"

A second later, and a girl walks in, wearing black and pink striped pants, a pink long sleeved shirt, and what looked like bunny ears, but after seeing Deoxys, they were probably antennaes. They were yellow and black striped, and on her back were two more antennae-like things protruding from the shoulder blades. She looked really nice, with a hourglass figure, modest C-cups, and she was about your height, maybe an inch shorter. An Ariados anthro or something you guess.

"H-hey, I'm T-Thera." she said holding out a shaky hand.

"Hey, umm... Thera. I'm Steven. Nice to meet you." you were at a loss for words. Damn she was attractive.

You two stare at each other for awhile until both look at the ground the same time, trying to look away.

Mr.D then interrupts the awkward moment. "AHEM. well you two should be heading to your room now, I have to get back to work."

"Oh, sorry Mr.D." Thera says exiting the room. "Steven, umm... follow me to the room, okay?"

"Alright. See you, Mr.D." you say as you pick up your bags.

"Just remember that if you need anything, come to my office. I'm always here to help."

With that, you walk off with Thera to your room. Mr.D goes back to sit at his desk. He contemplates on the situation at hand.

"Yes, I'm sure that boy will have a fabulous year at this school. He'll fit right in with the other students."
-------------------------------------------------------------
(Just letting you know, as author of this story line, I am reserving choice 1 for myself, I will leave choices open for other writers to use, of course.)
151.title: Day 1: The Transfer

152.content:
Student Registration.
Name: Sarah Winter
Age: 16 Gender/Race: Female/ human
Background:
Sarah is part of a bold new student exchange program between humans and Anthro Pokemon. Her excellent grades, matched with her advanced martial arts training made her the best candidate for this program. She will be attending Pokemon High School and moving on to an Anthro Pokemon college to bridge the gap between our two peoples.

"A bold experiment, indeed." frustrated, I whispered. "Not that I was given any choice in the matter."

"Now now, don't be so glum." smiling, the principal, said as he walked with me. "Your parents are still your legal guardians and they were assured that you would be well treated here, as I am assuring you now."

I turned to the principal, Mr Deoxys. He was, in fact, a Pokemon Deoxys, which I found ironic. "How am I supposed to fit in here, I'm the only human student."

"Yes, and my son will be the only Pokemon in your boarding school." serious, Deoxys said. "He is not happy about this either but its for the good of all of us."

I sighed, knowing it was senseless to argue. "Fine."

Deoxys smiled. "You will make friends here, you'll see." stopping at a door, he said. "Here is your dorm. I will leave you to unpack your belongings."

With that, he left and I opened the door and entered to find my roommate, she was an anthro....
152.title: Girl series 3

1521.content:
"Hi there!" seeing me enter the girl said. "I'm Pika, Pika Chu." she offered her hand. "It's a pleasure to meet you, Sarah Winter."

Pika was a tall and slender Anthro Pokemon Pikachu with long spiky hair and a nice feminine figure and closely matched my own. It was a surprise to me but, if she were human or I were a Pikachu, we could have easily pass as sisters.

"Likewise, Pika." accepting the handshake, I said. "I'm a bit nervous so please don't be offended if I seem jumpy at times."

Pika smiled. "Deo was just as nervous when he left here for a human school." softly, she said. "He and I have been friends since what you would call kindergarten."

"What do Pokemon call it?" curious, I asked.

"Intro-grade school." simply, Pika said. "An introduction to grade school."

"Makes sense, I guess." shrugging, I said. "Well, I better get unpacked."

Pika watched me with rising curiosity. Only, when I unpacked my Katana, a gasp escaped her lips. "Sarah, you are not permitted to bring weapons onto campus!" stunned, she warned. "If Principal Deoxys finds out about this..."

"Principal Deoxys recommended I bring this, along with the tools of my martial arts." turning to Pika, I said. "It's a part of who I am, like the defensive abilities of all Pokemon."

"Oh, I see." more softly, Pika said. "Do you think its safe to have it in your room, though?"

I smiled and offered Pika the hilt of my katana sword. "Try to pull it out." I said. "It won't bite you."

Hesitantly, Pika took hold of the sword handler and tried to pull it out of the sheath but it would not come. She pulled harder but the blade refused to come out. "Is it locked in there?" curious, she asked.

"In a way." taking the sword back, I replied. "The handle has fingerprint sensors that will only unlock the blade when I take hold of it."

"So only you can draw the blade." nodding, Pika said. "Impressive."

"These weapons are used for combat." serious, I said. "They are not toys. I only brought them for the dueling classes that are required here."

"What is your signature move?" curious, Pika asked.

"My what?" curious myself, I asked.

"It's a defensive or offensive move that is all your own." simply, Pika replied. "Something you made up yourself to use in duels."

"Oh, well you'll find out in dueling class." giggling, I said. "You and I will be facing each other eventually." I then winked. "Unless you want to share your signature move with me."

Pika giggled. "Okay, you got me on that one." smiling, she said. "You can't blame me for trying, though."

"Not really." smiling back, I said.

I finished unpacking with Pika making note of the tools I had for my martial arts, which I noticed. "This is just a small piece of my fighting style, Pika." once done unpacking, I said. "I can use my hands and feet as weapons as well."

"I can't wait to see it." happy, Pika said. "Everyone is curious about you."

I sighed. "Let me guess, the others found out you would be my roommate and bugged you to dig up some information about me." slightly annoyed, I said. seeing Pika pout, I placed a gentle hand onto her shoulder. "The same thing is going to happen to Deo at my boarding school, I'm not offended."

"I'm glad." sighing herself, Pika said.

She and I exchanged a smile.
1521.title: Pikachu.

153.content:
My name is Ronan Shinonju and I’m 17 years old. I was born in Tokyo, japan and raised in the country side because my family likes the peace and quiet. My father is a martial artist who taught me how to defend myself in fights when I go to school in the closest town, but soon we had to move away to America because my father found a place to teach and my mother also found some work in the gaming industry. I wear the japanese school boy uniform or my karate gi that my father gave to me when we are doing my lessons. I do have a black shirt with red kanji on it means noble heart with a dragon on the back, white pants with tiger claw marks prints on the pant legs, a long coat with a fox on the back and it is a japanese style coat, and black and white striped shoes. These clothes I wear when my parents bought them for me to start a new life. My skin color is like having a perfect tan all over your body, my hair is medium length black, and eyes are gold like wolf eyes. I’m a good 5 foot 9 inches and I’m still growing like any other young boy.

============================================================================

It was Monday morning as my parents were driving me to the new school that accepted me and it was a long drive from our new house.

“A new school with new problems.” I said as we were driving to the school

“Son, I know that you are different from the other boys and I taught you to defend yourself if and when you got into a fight.” My father said smiling

“They did come in handy when I was out numbered in those fights.” I said as I was smiling

“Ronan, you are smart, kind, and willing to protect those who could not defend themselves.” My mother said and I nodded

“You are also a very hard worker we both know this when you are in your lessons or working on your school work.” Dad said

“I know a few girls were following you, but I wonder why.” My mother said

In my other school, I never had friends or I never asked anyone to be my friend. The bullies that picked fights with me were over commenting about my looks and I brushed them off because I had schoolwork to do, but they decided to be stupid and attack me from behind and I dodged their attacks without looking. Soon they got tired and I walked away from them feeling fine, but there was some girls who liked my looks. These same girls followed me to my class and I knew they were there, but why they followed me is one thing I didn’t understand. They were talking to me about my looks and saying I was cute, but they wanted to be my friends. I smiled and I took their friendship, but now I had friends to protect from people like the bullies that wanted to fight with me.

“Mom, those girls wanted to be my friends and I was happy about that.” I said smiling

“My son no longer the lone wolf.” My father said joking and we started laughing

Before I left with my family, I told the only friends that I had the news and that was when I had my last fight with the fights and the bullies. I’m slow to anger, but that only clouds my thinking so I’m controlling my anger and I used the same tactics that worked from the other time, but the teachers were expecting me to fight because they knew my father. Soon I blocked their attacks and jabbed them in their foreheads because it was enough to force them to the ground.

“Dad, I kept my anger in check in that last fight and I only jabbed them in the forehead.” I said and he nodded

“That’s good son, but you understand what happened when you don’t keep your anger in check.” He said as I hang my head

I was walking home from school with my friends when we got surrounded by a gang and I was their only target and they were looking at my friends. I started the fight and I was able to give my friends an opening to run away from the fight and get my father. They got away free and I smiled before I started my plan to send those punks away. My anger was rising, but I kept it in check till something happened and it happened so fast. One of them said the wrong thing and I lost control of my rage and I attacked them like an animal. They were lucky enough to be alive when my father came to help me regain control and they were sent to the hospital.

“That only happened once and I was glad that my friends were not there when that happened.” I said darkly

“I know how you felt.” He said

“It happened to me before and it was how I met your mother.” He added and I nodded

Soon the school I will be attending has finally came into our view and it was a big boarding school with the red initials PHS above the door and the gates were gold and pokÃ©ball statues holding the gate. Other than that, it looks any other boarding school and we are getting close to the school gate.

“We know that you will do your best and try to make friends here.” My father said and I nodded before getting out of the car

While I was getting my bags, a man with sky blue hair, wearing red and blue suit, and a pale green tie came to see us.

“You must be Ronan and his parents.” The man said and we nodded

“Yes that would be us.” My father said

“It must be hard to adjust into a new setting.” He and my parents nodded in agreement

“Yeah, but hopefully we can stay in one place so our son can be taught in school.” My mother said

“Pardon me, I seem to forgotten to introduce myself. I’m the principal of the school, Mr. D.” the principal said and we nodded

Soon my bags are with me and my parents left me with the principal.

“Alright ronan, grab your things and follow me to my office.” He said and I did what he asked

When we came into the school, I noticed the students here are humans wearing clothes with pokÃ©mon styles on them and all of them including the principal are wearing watches. Soon we enter his office and his secretary closed the door behind us.

“Okay, I need to get out of this disguise.” Principal D said as he was playing with his wait

His form was distorted for a moment and stood in his place a deoxys in his normal form.

“That feels much better.” He said and I was shocked to see a living pokÃ©mon, but I know that meant the others here are also pokÃ©mon

“I know this is quite surprising, but there is nothing to worry about.” He said and I nodded

“I wondered why you could relate to my parents.” I said and he nodded

“You are the only human that has been accepted into this school.” He said and I nodded

“I’ll be honored.” I said and he smiled

“Alright, here is your schedule and a map of the school.” He said as he handed me two pieces of paper

“Ronan, I know what happened and you can talk with me about it if you want or speak with some of the teachers here.” He said and I smiled knowing that they could help me

“Thank you.”

“Now I have to show you your guide.” He said as the door opened to reveal another pokÃ©mon
153.title: Boy series 4

1531.content:
“A guide?” I asked slightly confused

“You will have a guide to show you around till you can get settled in.” he said as the pokÃ©mon came in

“Ronan, meet your guide, Rosalyn Shimatsu.” He as the pokÃ©mon bowed and I did as well

Rosalyn is a gardevoir who is six inches shorter than I am, short green here covering one eye, red eyes, pale white skin and she looks like she was wearing a ball gown. She has a red protrusion in the center of her chest and it is at very good size for her, but I was only looking into her eyes.

“Hello ronan.” She said and I nodded

“Rose, you will show him around and that will be all.” Our principal said as we left his office so he could get back to work

We were in the halls and we were getting close to the dorm rooms.

“What classes do you have?” she asked me

“Math, Gym, History, English, and some others.” I answered

“Your dorm number is number 216.” She said

“Is there a pokÃ©mon in that room?” I asked her

“Yeah and you will like her.” She said smiling

“Oh, please call me rose.” She added and I nodded

“Alright.” I said as I smiled

“You’re a psychic type and you are able to read thoughts or a person’s feeling so you know if you can trust that person.” I said surprising her

“How did you know that?” she asked

“I’ll explain later I need to unpack my bags.” I said and she nodded

We got to my dorm room and she knocked on the door. We heard something from the other door and the door opened to reveal a pikachu.

“Hi rose.” The pikachu said before noticing me

“Who is this?” she asked

“This is the new student, a human named ronan.” Rose said and I smiled

“Oh, you are my roommate.”

“Yes, it’s very nice to meet you.” I said

“I’m Fiona.” The pikachu said and shook my hand

Fiona had a large hourglass figure with a lightning bolt tail, red circles on her cheeks, and black eyes. She has yellow fur with brown stripes on her back and her ears are black tipped and slightly longer than a male pikachu.

“Ronan, she is quite friendly and protective of me with her other friends.” Rose said and I smiled with a nod

“I understand. Before my family left japan, I had a few friends and I was protective of them too.” I said

“I’m sure we will get along great.” Fiona said as rose closed the door and left

“Yeah.” I said remembering what happened before I left japan on that day

~Hopefully that won’t happen here.~ I thought

I put my clothes in my dresser from one bag and I put my other bag underneath my bed.

“What’s in the other bag, ronan?” Fiona asked

“Something to help me pass the time.” I said

“Can you help me with my schedule?” I asked and she nodded

After explaining that I have certain classes on certain days like Math, History, and English on Monday and creative writing, Gym, and Metal Shop on Tuesday, I can also take extra classes like art when I’m done with my classes.

“Thanks for the help Fiona.” I said

“You’re welcome.” She said

I had the map I was given and I make to my first class early and it was math taught by a minun and plusle pair. Introduced myself to the class and went back to my seat ignoring the glares, stares, and other strange looks. The teachers are Miss Plus and Miss Minus are subbing for the real teacher of the class, Mr. Kazam, an alakazam. I was able to solve the equations after doing the work and getting the answers right. When the bell rang, the subs wanted to see me.

“Ronan, we think that Mr. Kazam will happy to see you when he comes back and it’s nice to know that you are able to solve the equations.” Miss minus said and I smiled

“I’m a hard worker and my parents wanted me to do my studies before I could do anything else.” I said and they nodded

“Well, keep doing the great work and maybe you will be able to challenge Mr. Kazam himself.” Miss plus said joking and I laughed with them before leaving to my next class

“Next is History with Mr. Ancient.” I said as I walked through the hallways

I noticed more stares and I ignored them as I made my way to the classroom. I have gotten there early as I did with my math class and the teacher was a xatu. My classes started and finished with me introducing myself to the class and I did the work that needed to be done. I took notes in my classes and I took into account which student would be a possible friend. I was on my way to the cafeteria when I met Fiona and rose.

“Ronan, how was your classes?” Fiona asked

“They were fine.” I said thinking about my other classes

“Ronan.” Rose said knowing what I’m thinking and she frowned

“Sorry.” I said

“What is it, ronan?” Fiona asked

“I was thinking of my other classes from my other school and something else that happened.” I said

“Let’s get something to eat.” I said and they nodded

We each got each something different for lunch and we are only allowed five things for lunch. I had gotten beef stir-fry, chicken ramen, herbal tea, spring rolls, and miso soup. I met with them at a table and we started to eat our lunch.

“How is it, ronan?” rose asked

“Amazing.” I said after eating everything I gotten to eat

“How did you eat that fast?” Fiona asked

“I forgot to eat breakfast this morning.” I said

“Ronan, you should meet our friends some time.” Rose said and I nodded

“Sure, how does Saturday sound?” I asked and they nodded

“Okay Saturday it is then.” I said as I walked to the dorm room

I finished my classes before lunch and I just wanted to rest before started on the schoolwork I have. I used my resting time to meditate and I practiced the stances my father taught me. Soon I started to do the homework I have received and in a few hours I completed the assignments and I put them in my books.

“There now I can kill time before I need to turn in for bed.” I said as I pulled the bag from underneath my bed and I was playing the pokÃ©mon games that my mother gave me

Most of my games are in my room at home; I played some of the games I had in my bag before putting them back inside the bag under my bed. I pulled out some of my notebooks and started to draw a gardevoir and a pikachu as how I saw them and I draw another version of them as they were like rose and fiona. I had drawn another alteration of rose and Fiona with more curves making their bodies even more beautiful. I put the drawings in binder that was in my other bag.

“I hopefully their friends are the ones I’m thinking of.” I said as I was getting ready for bed

Soon Fiona came in and we got ready for bed.

“What did you do in here?” she asked

“Did my homework and just killed some time.” I said as I got in my bed

Sleep took us quickly and I had a good dream to end my first day in PokÃ©mon High School.
1531.title: Surprise 1

choices: Metal shop, luch, and writing, last is art
15311.content:
I woke up before dawn and started getting ready for my classes while fiona was still sleeping in her bed. I have memorized the map, but I kept it in cased if I need a reference and I left a note for fiona so she would know I left early. Gym was first, then creative writing, and last was metal shop; but the art class would be kind of fun and I can hone on my skill there. When I got to the gym, it was empty and I don’t think that the teachers are here; but I could be wrong. I went into the guys locker room to change into my training gi and put on my rising sun headband on before walking out and I saw a lucario walking into the gym.

“Hello.” I said to the lucario

“Ah, you must be ronan.”

“Yes, are you teacher or student in this class?” I asked

“Student and you can trust me.”

“How?” I asked

“I can read your aura and I’m a friend of rose and fiona.”

“You know my name, but I don’t know yours.” I said and she smiled

“It’s Aura.” She said

Aura is a female lucario with a modest hourglass figure, red eyes, and blue and black hair.

“Who is the teacher here?” I asked

“Mrs. Kenichi.” She said

“Let me guess, she is a blaziken.” I said

“Yep.” I wasn’t surprised

“Why are you dressed like that?” she asked

“These are my training clothes and I used them for my lessons with my father.” I said walking over to a mat

“You are only telling me what I want to hear and not the whole story.” She said and I smiled

“I have my reasons and I will you and the others when I feel the time is right.” I said and she nodded

“Until then I can wait.” She said as she walked onto the mat I was standing on

We got into our fighting stances and I waited to for her to make the first move.

“You make the first move.” I said to her and she smiled

“Thank you.” She said as she charged at me

She tried to punch me, but I sidestepped and flipped her over my right shoulder. She tried to sweep kick me and I jumped over her landing on my hands and doing a back flip.

“Your very good for human.” Aura said and I smiled before vanishing to get close to her and I palm strike her chest sending her off the mat and she had the look of surprise

“My father was the best and he taught me everything he knew.” I said as Mrs. Kenichi walked in

“Aura, you have done well; but both of you were holding back.” Our teacher said and I nodded

“I have a good reason for holding back.” I said

“Ronan, I could tell that you have more power than you were using and you have very good control over it.”

“I’m not psychic, but I can tell how good a fighter is.” She said

“The other students will be here soon as far as class goes and both of you will be my top students.” She said and we both nodded

Soon the other students came to class and I introduced myself, I recognized some students from yesterday’s classes and I stood by aura.

“Alright class, today we will begin sparring.” Mrs. Kenichi said and I looked around at the students

I noticed one Student was a weavile and I had the feeling when I was fighting those bullies at my old school. Aura looked at me in concern because my aura was turning red and my anger was rising on its own. Mrs. Kenichi had the other students go first and I was trying to control my anger before something bad happened. The weavile student was the only other student besides me who had not sparred and aura was doing her match as we watched.

“Winner is aura.”

“This will be the last match, the human ronan vs. Thorn.” Our techer said as we head out onto the mat

“So I get to break the human in.” thorn said as I got into my stance and waited for him

“Begin!” was heard as he charged at me and I smiled

I was still angry, but I was using it as my power and I was calm as I could be. He tried to punch me, but I caught his fists and twisted his arms before kicking him in the face sending him to the edge of the mat.

“You going to let a human get the best of you? I have fought bullies stronger than you and they were lucky to be alive.” I said darkly and he was mad

He was getting reckless and I was beating him with my skill, which result me striking him in the chest before grabbing his body and flip him over my shoulder.

“Winner, Ronan.” Was heard as I jumped before thorn could sweep kick me and I dropped kick him

“Stay down. You will live longer if you do.” I said as I walked to aura

All of the students were surprised with how I could beat thorn and I smiled, but I looked at thorn.

“Don’t cheat.” I said as I was holding a poison barb

“You will regret this.” Thorn said as I yawned

“Heard that before and they still regretted fighting me.” I said bored

“I think I only used about ten percent of my real power.” I said while thinking about the fight

Class was over and I went back to the dorm room to change my clothes before going to metal shop. I took a hot shower before putting my sword smith clothes on for the class.

“Aura must be telling rose and fiona about my fight.” I said as I finished gotten ready

“I have a break for lunch before creative writing and art class and I can use that time to change clothes again.” I said as I left for class

~Aura or any other pokÃ©mon could have beaten a normal human, but I’m not normal.~ I thought as I smiled and I noticed that the other students were looking at me with smiles

“I don’t care what you think of me as a human and just because I beat someone like thorn doesn’t mean anything.” I said

“Besides I won’t be your friend if you don’t ask me.” I said smiling

They nodded and I went on my to class, but I notice two pokÃ©mon following me.

“A gengar and a skunktank. Thorn must still be in pain or thought he could trap me.” I said as I dodged and ice punch from thorn

“Thorn that is enough.” Was heard as the principal appeared and used psychic on them

“Ronan, I heard about your sparring match and I’m proud of you. You three know that fighting is held in the arena on the weekends.” He said as he let them go, but I gave thorn a glare

"I need to speak with you, ronan and your teachers have been informed.” He said and I nodded

We were teleported to his office and we both sat down in the chairs.

“Your father taught you well to use that kind of power.” He said and I nodded

“He was the best and he told me that control is everything when dealing with power.” I said

“Rose, aura, and I felt your emotions when you first noticed thorn; but you did well to control your feelings and control your power.” He said

“I wasn’t kidding about those bullies and they were very lucky to be alive.” I said darkly and I hang my head from the memory

“To you, thorn was like one of them.”

“Yes, I noticed that some of the other students had fought with him and lost.”

“I’m going to fight thorn and his two friends on Saturday.” I said

“I have to use half of my real power.” I added

“If you can control it.”

“I don’t want anyone to help me in the fight. That is the only condition I have for the fight.” I said and he nodded

“Not taking any chances of that happening again.” I said referring to that day

“Alright. I can do that, but are you going to be able to handle it?”

“Yeah.” I said smiling
15311.title: The next day.

153111.content:
He gave me a pass to get back to class and I left his office before walking to class. I used about five percent power to get to class and I was about a few minutes late. The teachers for the class are Mr. Char, charizard and Mr. Hammer, a machoke. I showed them my pass and I introduced myself to the class.

“We heard about your sparring match with thor and we were surprised that you could defeat him like he was a rookie fighter.” Mr. hammer said

“That was practice, but Saturday will be the real fight and it will be three on one.” I said and I smiled

“I need to teach them a lesson and I have to do it alone.” I added

There are steel type pokÃ©mon here and in the other room, but they are learning to repair themselves and we are learning to using metal to make things like swords, shields, and other things. Mr. hammer is in the other room so we have mr. char teaching us. The other students in the class are a Empoleon, aggron, an anthro skaromy, and another lucario to name a few.

“You are going to make a weapon, a sword; but it could be any kind of sword.” Our teacher said

“I will help and so will Leon.” He added as an Empoleon stood up and nodded

All of us got our metal and my piece of metal was a small thick piece, but it was fine with the sword I had in mind. I was going to make a katana like in the old days of the samurai. The other students are working on their own ideas for their swords and I heated my metal so I could make my masterpiece. I hammered out the metal to form the katana blade and I reheated the blade to make it stronger before hammering it again. Soon I found some water to cool the metal and reheated the metal before folding it, hammering, and cooling it. This process is long, but the work is worth it and soon my blade is done so I need a hilt and to sharpen it. I looked around seeing the other students finishing up, but I don’t let that bother me and continuing working. Leon gave me the hilt for my sword and I went to the grinding stone to sharpen my best work. Soon I turned in my katana for grading and I was very proud of my work. Mr. char picked up the others and graded them before picking my katana up for grading.

“This can look like the worst sword made or the best, but its looks are not important; how it cuts is the most important.” Mr. Char said as he cut a metal pole clean in half

“I say that this was the best made.” He said

Mr. Hammer came in to see the swords and noticed my work and he smiled.

“Ronan worked on another surprise.” He said and the other students were happy for me, but I made that katana for another reason

“Mr. Char.” I said

“Yes, ronan?”

“I was wondering if I could send the katana I made home to my father.” I said

“Well, we make weapons like this to help the school bring in money.” Mr hammer said

“We will see about it later and I might have you make another one and compare which one gets sent home and the other gets sold.” Mr. Char said smiling and I smiled as well

When the class was over, I walked to the dorm room to change clothes again and I went to lunch. I got a chicken sandwich, potato wedges, bottle of Dr. Pepper, a container of broccoli coleslaw, and some yogurt. I went to sit down in my usual spot when I noticed the students that have fought with thorn came to sit with me and my three friends.

“I don’t want to sound rude, but I don’t like being the popular student and I only beat thorn because he had it coming when he made fun of the human.” I said and they nodded

“Ronan, your more than that.” Rose said

“Oh? How so?” I asked

“Your past helps us understand you so that you not just a human to us.” Rose said

“Only a few have heard of my past to understand me and I will tell you after my fight with thorn and his two flunkies.” I said as they were surprised

“You’re going to fight them?” rose said

“Yep, the principal and I talked it over about it and this Saturday is the fight. Three on one and I can handle them.” I said smiling

“He didn’t get the hint during the sparring match so I have to turn up the heat.” I said

“I was in a fight when I was with some friends and we were surrounded. I was able to fight them off easily, but my friends were there so I had to give them a way to escape. They got away to get my father and that was when something bad happened. While I was fighting them, one of them said the wrong thing to say and I was mad as possible. I attacked them like an animal and my father came in time to stop me they were still alive. They were very lucky to be alive. I barely remembered what happened after walking up, but I quickly remembered what happened and I was not proud of it.” I said as I hang my head and started to eat my lunch

They were quiet and most of them were eating as well, but they were thinking about what I said and I won’t blame them for leaving right now. I felt something on my shoulder and looked to see my three friends looking at me.

“See you dealt with something that we also have been dealing with, but we will still stand by you as your friends.” Rose said with fiona and aura nodded

I turned to see the other students at our table and they nodded as well.

“We know what it’s like to fight bullies like thorn, but humans must face the same problem.” A golem said as I nodded
153111.title: Metal shop and lunch

1531111.content:
We ate our lunch and I went to art class before going to creative writing.

~They are like everyone else.~ I thought

“There is no line between pokémon and human.” I said to myself

I walked to the classroom for my class and I was early, but the teacher is a mismagius.

“Hello, ronan.” The teacher said and I nodded

“Hello.” I said

“I’m Mrs. Shade.” She said and I nodded

“You’re early for class.” She added

“I don’t like to be late.” I said

Soon class started and I introduced myself before answering some questions that were about the sparring match. Class went fairly well and I revealed my artistic skill with a paintbrush, but I did a mountain landscape of japan and I add the rising sun for some beauty.

“Whoa!” a smeargle said surprised

“What?” I asked

“Oh this, I was thinking of something from home.” I said as I add some white pain for snow

Mrs. Shade came by to see my work or art and she smiled.

“From the way you paint it, it looks like you saw it before.” She said

The other students came by to see my painting and they were glad to have some friendly competition.

“Alright, but don’t surprised when I paint my best.” I said with a smile

For the rest of the class, I was painting the finishing touches on my painting and painting another one to be sent home to my parents. When the bell signaled the end of class, I just finished my second painting and gave them both to mrs. Shade so they would be dry and the second one would be ready to mailed to my parents. I was leaving the classroom when the smeargle from class was walking to me and I smiled at it.

“Ronan.” It said and I nodded

“Yes?” I asked

“Where did you learn to paint like that?”

“I used to paint when I was little and my parents took me into the mountains before we moved to America.” I said

“I’m Jack.” He said

“Nice to meet you.” I said as we walked to the main hallway

We were talking when I noticed thorn looking at me and I just crack my knuckles.

“Thorn, you and your cronies will be given the worst beating you will ever get.” I said with a smile and jack was looking at me like I was crazy

“We’ll see Saturday.” He said and he left

“Before you say anything, I have a bone to pick with him and you with everyone else in the school will what I can do on Saturday.” I said and he nodded

“I hope you know what you are doing.” He said and I nodded

I left jack in the cafeteria before heading to my dorm to see rose and fiona. I only came by to get my notebook and pen for creative writing, but I told them that I will talk with them later. They must have known about the fight on Saturday and I saw the look in their eyes. My past will come back in that form during the fight, but I have to teach thorn a lesson and show them how strong a human like me can be. I see students looking at me, but I can see that they will be cheering for me at the fight and I nod with a smile. I like to have true friends like the girls I knew before I left and now rose, aura, and fiona.

~Some of them think thorn will win, but that won’t happen.~ I thought as I found my last class for the day

I walked inside the classroom to see a delcatty as the teacher and I come in the classroom.

“Ronan, I heard that you like to come early to class.” She said and I nodded

“Yes, that is true.” I said

“Mrs. Cadel is my name.” I nodded before the rest of the class came in and I picked my seat close to the window

Soon I introduced myself for the last time in my last class and many asked about the fight Saturday. I smiled and told them to wait and see because I will only show what I can do then and not before. I returned to my seat and I noticed jack is in the class. I made some notes and we were given an assignment to make a story, but I had an idea though it might be hard for me to deal with. I pulled out my ink pen and I started to a haiku about my friends back in japan while thinking of a nice day in the park where the sakura trees bloom. With my mind set on what I was doing for the assignment, I looked at jack to give him a smile before returning to my work and I finished my free form haiku, but I started working on a fixed haiku with it being centered around that day.

“Class, your assignment will be due at the end of class.” Our teacher said and I nodded before finishing up my second haiku

Soon class was over and we turned in our work, but I last and jack was waiting for when mrs. Cadel wanted to speak with me about both haikus and I told him I would meet with him later.

“Ronan, these two haikus are from your past.” She said and I nodded

“Both filled with emotion, but one with friendship and the other the will to fight and protect.” I hang my head before saying anything

“I wanted to write something and that’s what I came up with.” I said and she smiled

“I know you will do well in this call ronan, but maybe you can try to write something like your first haiku, but some of your second to make it more balanced out. She said and I nodded
1531111.title: Creative writing and art

choices: time passed to saturday; its saturday - fight time
skip the fight to the winners
15311111.content:
I left the classroom so I can head to my room and I went to get another shower before I put my things away for tomorrow, but I noticed fiona, rose, and aura in the room on my bed.

“How was your day, ronan?” rose asked

“It was fine, thanks.” I said as I got my things ready for my shower

“Something is bothering you.” Aura said and I stopped

“It’s the memory of that day, isn’t it?” fiona asked and I stayed silent

“Yes and no.” I said before leaving to take my shower

The air is silent as I was thinking about my next thing to say, but one of them can read my thoughts while the other can read my aura. A few minutes had gotten away when I came back into the room wearing my pajamas and I had gotten to my bed.

“I care for my friends and your three are a part of the group that are my friends, but that memory isn’t the only thing that is brothering me.” I said with me facing them

“Those friends I had before I left was something I felt that I had to protect them.” I added before turning over

“We will need our sleep for class tomorrow.” I said before falling asleep

“He is right about the sleep part, but this other stuff has me worried about him.” Rose said and aura nodded

Rose and aura left the room, but not before giving me a hug good night and I smiled in my sleep. Fiona slept in her bed tonight and it was peaceful, but not in mind as thoughts were flying in my head and they were about that day.

~How did I do that to those jerks and idiots?~

~What caused me to do that?~

~I hope that they are still doing alright without me.~

My mind is like in a twister, but I see that my mind has put me in a dream and it was the day before I had to leave. Everything was the same as that day and I looked around to see why I was put here, but I felt something close to me.

“I’m here to talk.” a voice said as I turned around to see a person that dressed like me during the day

“Did you bring me here?” I asked him

“I did in a way, but I’m not here to fight you.” It said

This person looked like me, but he sound like he is calmly angry and his eyes are like a golden red.

“You know what I am.” It said and I nodded

“You are the rage I that I felt on that day.” I said and he showed a small smile

“I was only protecting those who are your friends.”

“You almost killed those punks.”

“You have to admit that you let your rage get out of hand and I came into form of that rage.” He said and I sadly nodded

“We both were trying to control the rage and anger you felt, but it was the first time you snapped like that so your father had to stop you.” He explained

“Since you have been training and have a fight on Saturday with these other punks that need to be taught a lesson, maybe I can help you with holding back your rage.” He said and I looked at him

“Thanks, but no. Not till the time is right besides I have something to prove during the fight.” I said as I felt my body waking up so I can get ready
15311111.title: Later

153111111.content:
The days were the same like my first day and yesterday; Mr. Kazam is back teaching his class and he heard about my work in his class. It was near the end of class when he wanted to talk with me about something.

“I heard good things about you.” He said and I nodded

“I try my best.” I said and he nodded

“I was sort of surprised to hear that you are going to fight Saturday against three students.” He said and I smiled

“My past is coming back and they should know what I have been trying to control since my family came to america.” I said and he nodded

“I sensed something about you and it’s quite interesting.” He said and I had to get to my next class

I ate different things for lunch to try some new foods and I looked around the normal table I sit at with my friends to see them looking at me. Some of them are thinking about the fight and the others are thinking how I could beat him or lose to him, but rose, aura, and fiona are thinking about me in general and I know they care about me. During my break between classes, I worked on my drawings while thinking of my next haiku and I play some of my games to make some progress before I do my meditation.

“Ronan, we need to talk about something serious.” I heard rose said as she, aura, and fiona comes into the room

“Alright, what is it?” I asked without breaking my concentration

“Why are you fighting thorn and his minions?” fiona asked and I sighed deeply

“He made fun of the human, I felt like I have to knock some sense into them, and to show that I have control over my beastly strength.” I said

“You told Mr. D that you will have to use about half your real power; what did you mean by that?” rose asked and I stood up before sitting on my bed with them sitting on fiona’s bed

“My emotions can be my strength or be used to control my strength. When I saw thorn in the gym, my rage was almost out of my control and nearly had a relapse of what happened.” I said darkly and they hugged me

“Why do you not want help in the fight?” aura asked

“It’s something I need to do it alone and I don’t want you or anyone else getting hurt.” I said with a real concerned voice with a bit of sorrow

“Your answers are based on that day.” Rose said and I nodded

“I fight to protect. Or kill to protect if I have too.” I said

“My father stopped me before that happened and I’m glad it didn’t happen.” I said with sorrow in my voice

“They didn’t have to see me become a monster or a killer.” I added as I hang my head

I was able to make an even better katana than the first and it’s the first one that will be sold and the second will be sent home to my parents. The room is silent as I was thinking of the girls that were my first friends and what they must been thinking when they saw my father stop the beast that might been ready to kill those jerks.

~That was the past and you have been controlling it since that day and even now you are getting stronger controlling it.~ the voice from my dream said and rose looked me with curiously

~You will be able to handle those punks and handle the beast within.~ he said and I nodded

~I bet your friends are thinking about you and wanting to know how you are doing since you left.~ he added before I give another nod and a smile

~Your right, but you know that one of my friends is reading my mind and she heard you giving me a pep talk.~ I said and I heard a chuckle

~Yes, I know about her and the other two that care about you; but I want you to fight with a clear head and fight like thorn.~ he said before I nodded at rose

“Who was that, ronan?” she asked

“A person I met in a dream.” I said and aura with fiona looked at us confused

“Met who in what dream?” fiona asked

“Last night, I was dreaming about certain things and my emotions were in a twister before I met a person that looked like me, but he was calmly angry and he was too trying to hold back the rage that I felt back then.” I explained to them

“If it will help go to the principal and ask if two of you would be my back up incase something goes wrong.” I said and they smiled

“Like you acting like an animal?” aura asked and I nodded

“I think that fighting and psychic types might be enough to hold you back.” Rose said

We kept talking and fiona with aura will be my backup with several other teachers that might be able to hold me down if my rage gets out of hand. Mr. Kazam, Mr. D said he would like to see the fight and he would join in being my backup, Mr. hammer and his brother, Mr. Champ while there are others willing to help me stay in check. I was given a choice to either to use a weapon of my choice or no weapon and I was taken to see what I can use for a weapon. I smiled before getting a wooden sword like I used during my lessons and I went to sleep so I can be ready for the big day.

~You think your ready to teach them a lesson?~ the other ronan asked as we met in my dream again

~I know I’m ready.~ I said ready and confident

~Good, I’ll be ready to help when you decide to fight hard.~ he said before my body decides to wake up and the dream ends

I wake up early and fiona is already awake with black gloves on her hands.

“Let’s see what you can do.” She said as I smiled before changing into my sparring outfit that I was wearing while I was sparring against thorn the first time and we walked out in the hall

“Miss Kenchi has your weapon at the arena waiting for you.” Aura said and I nodded before I started walking to the arena with my friends and teachers backing me up

It was a short run to the gym since I running to shorten the time to get there and I used about 5% power to get there even faster, but I turned to see their surprised faces and I just smiled. Soon I’m holding my weapon while I see my backup in the hall as Mr. D came out to announce the fighters. Thorn and his two minions were waiting to see if I would not show up, but he started to growl when saw me walking.

“I thought you would run like a scared human.” He said and I just shook my head with a smile

“This challenge was requested by ronan to fight thorn and his two friends.” The principal said and I nodded

“There is a first knockout fight, you may use one item, and when your opponent is knocked out the fight is over the and the winner will be declared.” He explained the rules and I know that there is a little bit more to that

“This is a special fight and ronan has let two of his friends will be his teammates if he needs them, but there is a team to stop the fight if anything goes wrong.” He added and I pointed to the team behind me

“You must be weak enough to let them stop the fight when you are losing to me.” Thorn said and I just smiled before laughing

“You are an idiot. They are to stop me from hurting you permanently and I’ll show you how strong I’m really am.” I said and he started to growl from the idiot comment

“Ready.” I took my stance and let my rage raise without losing control

“Begin!” Mr. D said before backing away and they formed a triangle to surround me

The skuntank used acid spray for an opening move and I dodged it using the same 5% of power before appearing behind torn and I hit him with my wooden sword on the head. I kicked him in the back landing in the acid spray and the gengar used shadow claw. I smiled before grabbing the shadow and pulling it toward me making it fly towards me and I punch him in the face sending him into the skuntank. They got up and a shadow ball was fired at me and I noticed thorn was going to use fling to throw his poison barb at me.

“Swing batter.” I said and I hit the shadow ball like a baseball and it deflected the poison barb

“Still think I’m a weak human?!” I asked as I was raising the percentage of power used

“Yeah.” Thron said and I just smiled before running towards the gengar and skuntank

“Heh well, this is your wakeup call.” I said before landing a palm thrust in the gengar’s chest and he was sent flying into the wall of the fighting arena before the bleachers

Everyone was speechless just from that and I was far from done, but I stand between thorn and his other friend smiling.

~How are you holding up?~ I asked

~I still have more control than the rage, but you might want calm a bit before going all out.~ the voice said and I gave a nod sidestepping the charge from both sides

I look at them rubbing their heads and I noticed the gengar was still trying to get up from that palm strike. I used some of my energy and I hit the skuntank like another baseball and it hit the gengar knocking both of them out, but I used a little bit more to throw my weapon into the wall next to the hall and it embedded itself in the wall.
153111111.title: time passed to saturday; its saturday - fight time

1531111111.content:
I’m looking at thorn cracking my knuckles and I slam my fist into the ground making a small crater showing my real strength. I see him throwing an ice punch and I caught it before flipping him over my shoulder as I did the same thing before and I dropped kicked him without using any real power.

“Without your friends and anything to cheat with, you are fool and a coward. You should fight with honor and be a humble fighter; not a bully.” I said as my fist glowed red and I hit the ground next to him

I started to walk away letting him getting up on his own and I noticed something was weird. I felt him smiling and charge at me with a night slash ready, but I jumped over him and I kicked him across the face sending him flying hitting the wall.

“Stay down this time.” I said as I started to walk to get my weapon out of the wall

“Like I’m going to listen to you!” he yelled before running and launching an ice beam at me again

“You should listen to me.” I said darkly and he fired another ice beam, but he was aiming at rose

I took the hit and I was having a flashback of what happened on that day. He walked over to my now frozen solid body knocking on it.

“Not so tough are you, human.” He said mocking me and rose was shocked to see me do that for her and she was reading my mind

~Ronan, calm down!~ the voice said and I’m trying, but my body started to glow red and my eyes are glowing red

The ice started to crack and thorn started to back away from me.

“If you tried that again, I will make sure that you lose that arm.” I said as I broke free of the ice and I noticed my backup is coming to me

“What are you?” thorn asked afraid of me

I stood there smiling beastly before I charged at him and I punched him a few times. I felt someone’s hand on my shoulder and it was rose.

~Good, keep trying.~ the voice said and I nodded

“He will live like the others, but he shouldn’t have tried to attack you.” I said as I was calming down

Soon the glow disappeared and I was back to normal, but they were still wondering about what happened.

“What just happened was something that I couldn’t control at first, but I was able to control it now and it happened this time because I was only protecting my friends. When it happened the first time, I was fighting like a beast and berserker against a group of thugs like thorn; but my father stopped me from killing them. That incident was what caused my family to move to America and me to come here for school, but I made myself a promise that I wouldn’t let that happen again. Well, it did happen again and I was able to control it before anyone gotten seriously hurt.” I explained and everyone was silent, but Mr. D looked at me with a smile

“Thank you ronan for the explanation and you are the winner of the fight.” He said as everyone started cheering for me

I walked over to thorn and I helped him up.

“Humans and pokÃ©mon are the same; there is no line between them.” I said and they clapped for me

“That is a good way of looking at it.” Mr. D said before teleporting thorn and his two friends to the nurse’s office

~Good job, they would be proud of you.~ the voice said and I nodded before I passed out and fell to the ground

They surrounded me and tried to wake me up, but soon I fell asleep and I was brought to the nurse’s office as well.
1531111111.title: Part two - the real fight

15311111111.content:
~Ronan, are you alright?~ a voice asked and I noticed it was rose in my mind

~Yeah, I’m just tired from the fight.~ I said and she smiled

~I saw your old friends and they looked cute, but I know why they thought you were cute.~

~Why?~

~Because of your eyes and you are just being yourself.~

~It would be nice to see them again.~

~Maybe your father can help with that.~

Soon I opened my eyes and I see rose, fiona, and aura standing next to me as I was in one of the bedroom in the nurse’s office.

“So that was what you had waiting to be unleashed.” Fiona said with a joking tone and I smiled

“I’m just glad that I had it under control this time.” I said and they nodded

“Did you hear on anything about those three?” I asked

“As you said, they are going to be alright and they have injuries form your attacks.” Fiona said and I nodded

I start to get up in the bed so I can sit up and they were sitting on the bed looking at me.

“The nurse said that you can leave when you are ready.” Aura said and I nodded before I tried to get up from the bed to see if I can stand

They were standing up ready to catch me if I start to fail and it took me a few minutes to get my balance so I started to wake away from the bed. As I took a step, I started out slow and careful so I couldn’t hurt myself and I was doing fine.

“Do you think thorn will change his ways?” I asked

“It’s hard to say. I mean challenged and beaten by a human that had to hurt his ego and gave him a lesson in humility.” Rose said

“He had it coming.” I said

“What did it felt like after you broke the ice?” aura asked

“I wanted to hurt him for even thinking of using rose as a target or thinking of attacking her. I wanted to beat him into a bloody pulp or knock some sense into him, but I remember what my father taught me and my promise.” I explained

The principal came in smiled at me noticed that I’m trying to stand on my feet and he is holding something in his left hand.

“Well, that fight was the best in the school that I have seen and the students know what thorn really is thanks to you; but I think your parents should see the fight and know how far you come in your training.” He said and I went to sit on the bed

“That is a bad idea.” I said they tilt their head in confusion

“If they see or know that happened again, I’ll guarantee it that they will come get me out of school and move to somewhere else again.” I said and I hang my head

~You really think that?~ the voice asked and I nodded

~What if your wrong?~ he asked

~I know for a fact that is what they will do.~ I said

There is a brief silence before the voice stopped talking to me and I shook my head.

“I don’t want to move again.” I said hitting the bed in a slight anger tone

“They will want to speak with me, you and rose or anyone else when it happened.” I added with distain

“We will see about that and maybe you won’t have to be pulled out of school.” He said with a smile and I nod

Soon I walked back to my room with rose, aura, and fiona making sure that I have no problems and don’t fall. When we get inside, I walk over to my bed and pulls my game bag from underneath.

“I know you an explanation for something rose.” I said as I pulled my game and I turned it on letting them hear the music

“What is that music?” fiona asked

“It’s part of a game that my mother designed and it’s a pokémon game.” I said showing them the screen on my game console and I start to play a little before opening the game’s pokedex

I show them the entry for rose as a gardevoir and I see the surprised look on her face, but I turn the game off and put it back in the bag.

“I have more games at home, but I don’t think that you can come over since that had to happen.” I said

My cell phone started to ring and it’s my father.

“Hello.” I said to him

“Hello son. Have you gone into that form again at the school?” he asked and I noticed that he was calm about it and I think that mom would be worried if I was talking to her

“Is mom worried about it?” I asked

“She is on the borderline on the subject.” He said and I noticed my friends trying to listen in

“Yes, I went into the form again; but this time it was different.” I said and it caught his interest

“How was it different?”

“I took an attack for one of my friends and it was triggered that way; but I did some minor damage to her attacker and I had it under control even before I went into the form.” I explained and he was thinking

“That is different and better.” He said

He spent a few minutes telling mom what I told him and I could tell that she was worried for me and happy that the outcome was different.

“Did we have to move again?” I asked him knowing the answer

“Hmm, do you think we have too?” he asked and I could tell he has a smile

“So we don’t have to move?” I asked hoping

“No, we are not going to move and I think that you should see your old friends.” He said

“How did you know that I went into the form?” I asked and I heard him chuckle

~Your father heard the same voice you are hearing right now.~ the voice said with a chuckle

I was shocked to believe it and almost dropped my phone.

“Your mother has been working on a new game and she would like for you to test it.” He said shaking me out of my shock

“Have it in my room and I’ll see about it later.” I said and he nodded

“I will have to come to the school and see the principal about it. You know that I trust you, but even minor damage can be deadly.” He said and I hang my head

“I really don’t want to move again.” I said

“And we won’t, but I have to make sure that your opponent is fine.” He said

“Alright.” I said as I felt I lost the fight of will

“Son, trust me I would feel better checking on him myself.” He said and I know he is right

We talked for a little bit longer before I ended the call.

“Rose, get to the principal and tell him that my father is coming to check on thorn and maybe his friends.” I said and they looked scared, shocked, and surprised

She quickly walked to the door and out to his office to send my message to him.

“Attention everyone, all students except for thorn and this two friends are to be in their human forms since ronan’s father is coming to check on them from the fight and to make sure they’re alright. The same is for the staff as well and that is all.” The principal said
15311111111.title: Aftermath

153111111111.content:
Aura and fiona are wearing their watching and a quick flash blinded me for a few seconds. Soon I see two human girls wearing their pokémon colors on their clothes.

“It’s us, ronan.” Said a girl wearing the pikachu clothing

“Fiona and Aura.” I said and they smiled

Fiona is wearing a yellow sundress with a brown belt, a pikachu hat, has a lightning bolt tattoo on her back, and yellow ankle boots; she has light brown skin, black eyes, and sunny yellow hair. Aura is wearing a blue training gi with a light brown belt, a pair of gloves with spikes on them, black shin guards on her legs, and a black mask hiding her eyes; she has raven black hair, red eyes, and has a full body tan.

“So this is what you look like as humans.” I said looking at them and they smiled

“Don’t they look hot, ronan?” said rose behind me and that surprised me since I jumped

“Don’t tease him rose.” Fiona said and I turned to see rose in her human form

Rose is wearing a white dress with red bows on the front and back, white gloves, white dancing shoes; she has green hair which covers one of her red eyes and light tan skin.

“You look good too, rose.” I said and she blushed

“Pikachu and gardevoir are my most favorite.” I said and I noticed aura pouting from that comment

“Lucario are cool with how they can use aura in their attacks.” I said and that got her to smile before hugging me

The principal came in his human form and he motioned me to follow him.

“Thanks for the word of warning about your father coming here.” He said as we walked out of the room and started to head for the front of the school

The other students are in their human forms and the same is for teachers with the rest of the staff, but they were smiling at me. I gave them a small smile before I looked forward toward the doors as we walked out of the school. It was a clear sunny day, but I felt like it was cloudy day with a small chance of rain and we stood near the curb. Soon we see the car pulling up the road and dad was in front of the school walking towards us.

“So how are you?” he asked me

“Still a little tired, but I’m ok.” I said

“How are they?” he asked Mr. D

“Stable, breathing, and sore.” He said

“I’m going to need to see a video of the fight if you have it and I will have to speak with your friend who you took the hit for.” He said and mr. d nodded

“I’m going to get the video so you can watch it in my office.” He said and dad nodded

We went inside the school and we walked pass the other students till we got to his office, but I lead dad to my dorm room and we walked inside. When we came in the room, I noticed rose, fiona, and aura were sitting on my bed so dad went to sit on fiona’s bed.

“You must be his father.” Rose said and dad nodded

“Yes, you must his new friends.” Dad said

“Some of them.” I said and I sit next to rose

“How are you feeling?” he asked rose

“Good.”

“What about after he took the strike for you?” he rephrased the question

“I was surprised that he did that, but his opponent was fighting dirty.” Rose said and he nodded

The door opened as the principal came in and we looked at him.

“The video of the fight is ready for you.” He said to dad who nodded

“Son, you always had a good heart.” He said as he left and fiona looked at me confused

“What did he mean by that?” she asked

“I protect the people I care about.” I said before I left the room catching up with dad and the principal

Soon we are in his office and the video just started as we are watching it on the screen mounted on the wall behind the principal.

“He is smart when he is outnumbered.” Dad said

“That is how he took care of the first two in the match.” Mr. D said

“He knows how to trick a trickster.” Dad said as we watched the part where I used the shadow to deflect the poison barb

“So this time it is different.” Dad said as he saw me breaking the ice and started minor assault on thorn

After the video was finished, we left to head to the nurse’s office to check on the three there. When we came into their room, they were awake and aware of my father’s visit.

“So you are the three that my son fought off and won against that fight I just finished watching.” Dad said as he walked over to the gengar and skuntank first

“Hmm, your injuries are minor; but a little internal bleeding and that should be taken care of.” Dad said as he did his examination on those two

He placed his hands on their abdomen as they started to glow and soon they were fine.

“Now, do whatever the nurse said and I will give her advice on what to.” He said and they nodded before he walked over to thorn

“Well, you are the dirty fighter.” Dad said to him and thorn gulped near scared of him knowing what I did and what he could do to him

“You are very lucky that my son had control or otherwise you would have to be in deeper trouble.” Dad said with a little dread as he fixed thorn up

“Son, I’m going to give the nurse some tips on fixing injuries like theirs; I’ll be back in a moment.” Dad said as he left me with them

“During that sparring match between us, you were telling the truth?” thorn asked as the other two were listening

“Yes, I was and you must have thought that was I mocking you.” I said and he nodded

“Maybe now you three can start over by fighting fair.” I said before I was walking to the door

I left the room to see dad talking with the nurse and I walked over to him.
