“Ok son, I guess I should get going and let your mother know.” He said as we left the office and walked to the front of the school

Soon we reached the car and he got in the car and messed with my hair.

“Maybe you and some of your friends can visit us for dinner.” He said and I smiled with a nod

“Ok, but I don’t want any surprises at home.” I said and he smiled

“Alright. Just keep doing your best.” He said before driving off back home

I walked back inside with the principal waiting with everyone minus three in the nurses office looking at me.

“He just left.” I said as they returned to their pokémon forms
153111111111.title: Father is coming and gone

1531111111111.content:
After my dad left, I walked back to my dorm and the girls were there sitting on fiona’s bed and I laid down on mine.

“My dad had the same power and I have till he met mom.” I said thinking out-loud

My phone started to ring and it was a familiar ringtone that I set for my friends before I left for the states. I stared at the caller id and it was her from back then; they noticed my face and they started to get concerned for me.

“Hello?” I asked

“Hello ronan.” Was heard on the other end of the line

“It has been too long since I heard that voice.” I said sitting up on my bed

“I agree it has been too long since you left and I was thinking of coming to see you with our other two friends.” The voice said

“Did you hear anything about that gang I fought?” I asked

“They are still breathing and they won’t be doing any bullying.”

“What about him?” I asked as my voice grew darker and more serious

“He heard about you defending me and our friends, but seems almost scared of you when you were like that.”

“How is school over there?”

“Very interesting for the most part and the students are friendly, but I had to fight a group of three alone.” I said looking over at rose

“You are not leaving that school are you?”

“No, I’m not. I’m staying here and working on getting better control.” I said

“I was able to choose a weapon for my fight.”

“What was it?”

“A wooden sword used for practice and sparring matches.”

“Maybe we three should come over to your house and see how you are really doing.”

“You know your parents should talk it over with my parents before you do anything like that.” I said feeling better

“Maybe your new friends and old friends should meet and compare notes about you.” She said giggling

A smile started to grow on my face and I started to chuckle.

“Do you still have that self-proclaim love for me?” I asked mocking her with a slight tease

The girls heard this and aura was getting the feeling of me in a playful mood so they thought I was bantering.

“It’s not love.”

“Then what is it?” I asked smiling

“You being a good friend.” She said

“Besides we treat each other like brother and sister with my friends.” She added

“So it’s sisterly love.” I said and she agreed

“I might move to your neighborhood and go to a different school for a change of pace.” She said and I’m slightly surprised

“Are you that close to finishing high school and looking into college?” I asked

“Hmm, no; but dealing with idiots are annoying.” She said and I chuckled

“You sounded like me right now.” I said and we share a laugh

I looked at the time and I noticed that it was around 4:30. I wanted to draw before I worked on some of the personal stuff in my other bag.

“I’m sorry to leave you like this, but I have some things to do and I might draw you as your favorite pokémon.” I said smiling knowing what she likes

“Was it wolf or fox that I like?” she asked testing me

“Wolf.” I said shaking my head

“Black and silver or dark blue and yellow?”

“Black and silver.”

“So you know that my favorite pokémon is a mightyena.” She said and I agreed

“I’ll keep in touch.” She said

“Yeah, my parents know if you and them are coming over for a visit.” I said before ending the call

I put my phone on my side table before hooking it up to the charger and I got up from my bed.

“Who was that?” rose asked tilting her head slightly

“An old friend and sister.” I said before pulling a bag that has some of drawing stuff in it

“I was surprised when she called me and I wasn’t really expecting it.” I added as I spread out my drawing stuff on my bed

I open my drawing pad before getting to a fresh page and I started to draw her drawing. They noticed the drawing stuff and their curiosity was sparked. I started to hum a tune that was in my head and started to draw out an outline of a pokémon. I wanted to at least get something started before going to sleep. I felt them looking at me wanted to know what I’m drawing and seen what I have drawn, but I thinking about it on the backburner in my mind.

“Want to see the drawings I made?” I asked them and they nodded

“Sure.” They said

I smiled before pulling out my drawing folder and hand fiona the folder. She opened the folder to see realistic drawings of pokémon, people, and various landscapes; she showed the others and they gasped from surprise and shock.

“These are amazing.” Aura said

“So realistic.” Rose said

“I can see why you have such skill.” Fiona said remembering she was in the art class

“I think it’s more of a natural talent.” I said

“Or skill.” Rose said smiling

They were looking through my pokémon drawings mostly their normal form and with their other forms if that have them. It was a few minutes as I heard them flipping through pages and I put some of my more recent drawings in the back of the folder. I have my drawings of them are in my pad that I’m drawing her as a mightyena with her hair and eyes. I’m about done with their drawings before today so I should be done by Monday.

“The poses you draw the pokémon are natural.” Fiona said

“You could be a prodigy.” She added

“I don’t think so.” I said

“Why?” rose asked

“I’m not that smart or that creative.” I said

“Judging by your skill in both your drawing and the fight it is clear that you are that smart and creative.” Aura said with a smile

“Yeah it was cool to see you fight like that.” Fiona said

I focused on my drawing as they were still looking through the drawings and I heard them stop before pulling three drawings out.

“These three are of us.” Rose said with awe and I smiled

“Yep.” I said

“I have been working on them during the week and I’m working on several others before I put them in the folder.” I added

“Can we see them?” aura asked

“Not till I get them finished.” I said and they frowned, but knowing I won’t change my mind

~Their special ones are in my pad, but that won’t know that.~ I thought blocking rose from hearing my thoughts

I was thinking of my old friend and how she would look like after so much time has passed since I left japan. Her voice from the call sounded like an angel and I would like to see her again, but my parents would have to talk with her parents and our friend’s parents as well. I turned to see the clock on the wall for the time and it was about 4:55. I looked at her drawing and I grinned at the portrait as it turned out to be beautiful.

“Maybe.” I said thinking about something and they look at me

“What do you mean?” rose asked

“You three will meet my old friends when we go to my home for dinner one night.” I said

~One done, three left to finish.~ I thought

I went to finish the other drawings when I heard my phone started to ring and I noticed my mother is calling me.

“Hi mom.” I said to her smiling

“Hello dear.” She said

“I’m guessing you know.” I said feeing sort of sad

“Your father told me when he got home.” She said

“But you wanted to stay there and not have a repeat.” She said and I smiled

“So how is work?” I asked

“Same old same old.” She said and I nodded knowing

“I do have some games that I wanted you to test for me when you have a chance.”

“Dad told me that you have one that you wanted me to test anyway.” I said

“Your friend called us and her parents talked to us about visiting you.” She added

“Well?” I asked getting excited

“She and her friends will be coming when you and your new friends come over for dinner.” She said

“When is the dinner?”

“It will be a few days, but we will text you to let you know.” She said and I nodded

“Ok.” I said before ending the call
1531111111111.title: Later

154.content:
Your name is Pi Kachu, you are very small for your age of thirteen with long, spiky blond hair, blue eyes, and naturally tanned skin. You also have a very rare condition that allows you to generate and fire short but powerful bursts of focused static electricity. It had been dubbed Electra-kinesis Because of your unusual appearance, condition, and name, your friends had jokingly called you Pikachu. It was not far from the truth as it was your name. However, unknown to you, it caused a mix up in your transfer papers, sending you to Poke-high; a private school for Anthro Pokemon.

Again, due to your appearance, condition, and name, no one bothered to disguise themselves and you were stunned to find yourself at a school for Human Pokemon! You immediately walked to the principal's office to find the principal a Deoxys, which was also ironically his name. "Um.... I don't think I belong here, Principal Deoxys." fearful, you said. "I'm a human, not a Pokemon."

Principal Deoxys looked at you with his large white eyes and gave a smile, or what you believed to be a smile. "Your first day and you already want to skip school, Pikachu?" amused, he asked.

"Please sir, there has been a mistake!" begging, you said. "My first name is Pi; my last name Kachu! I just look like a real Pikachu, look at my papers!"

Principal Deoxys sighed. "Very well... Pi." patiently, he said. "I will look."

With a wave of his tentacled arm, he opened a file drawer and sifted through the P section before pulling out your file. Upon opening it, his white eyes grew wide with surprise. "Well, it seems there has been a clerical error." softly, he said. "You were supposed to be transferred to Pokes-high private school on the other side of the country. Only the transfer was changed as they must have misread your name."

"So I can be moved to Pokes-high soon?" hopefully, you asked.

"Unfortunately, no." motioning to the window, Deoxys replied. "This school was built in the high mountains in order to isolate it from the rest of the world for our students' protection."

"What does that have to do with me?" fearful, you asked.

Deoxys sighed. "This is the winter season, Pi." patiently, he replied. "By the time this is all straightened out, the roads will be impassible." he shook his head. "That and I know of Pokes-high, you would be ill treated there by your looks alone; not to mention your very name and rare condition."

You began to sob and Deoxys placed a gentle tentacle onto your shoulder. "There, there." cooing, he said. "You may not be a Pokemon, physically but I sense you have the heart of one."

"I- I don't know h-how to be a Poke- Pokemon." stammering, you said.

"Just be yourself." gently, Deoxys said. "I will assign an upperclassmen Pikachu to help you, her name is Pika." he then gave you what looked like a smile. "Just sit tight while I summon her."

Dan being a 16 year old male with short messy black hair and his bright blue eyes, wearing a green sleeveless shirt with black jeans and sneakers just laughed. "Who are you calling a girl?" the Venusaur yelled in Dan face as he tumbled down.

"Umm, Saur, why is there a human in our school?" the Ivysaur sighed as he exited the room to join the two.

The only different is that the Ivysaur eyes were purple along with a pink flower on his back and with Venusaur was a even bigger flower.

info.brief_description: A human gets accepted into a new strange school. What does he/she have to deal with?
info.description:
A human is transfered to a new school. Little does he/she know, it is a school for anthro Pokemon!

Rules:
You are the only human in the entire school

The school is a boarding school, where they stay in a dorm. (Can be alone or with another Pokemon, just cannot be another human.)

The principal is a Deoxys

When other humans come, each student has a small watch-like device that allows them to look like a human.

There are some classes like a regular school, but three classes that are given the most attention to are battling, contests, and Gym

Please, no sex

Author's note: For all who are planning on adding chapters, please leave the first slot alone. I want to add myself in the story. I will include more slots, do not worry.
